Summary: Zoey Miller, a super smart computer nerd who is uninterested in romantic love, has her life turned upside down when Zack, the school's soccer star, gets amnesia and mistakes Zoey for his girlfriend.

Title: The Fifth Element
Summary: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

Title: Fantastic Four
Summary: One of Marvel's most iconic families makes it back to the big screen, the Fantastic Four.

Title: A Man Called Otto
Summary: Otto is a grump who's given up on life following the loss of his wife and wants to end it all. When a young family moves in nearby, he meets his match in quick-witted Marisol, leading to a friendship that will turn his world around.

Title: Saving Private Ryan
Summary: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

Title: American Pie
Summary: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

Title: The Gentlemen
Summary: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

Title: Aliens
Summary: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

Title: Last Night in Soho
Summary: Aspiring fashion designer Eloise is mysteriously able to enter the 1960s, where she encounters dazzling wannabe singer Sandie. But the glamour is not as it seems, and the dreams of the past crack and splinter into something darker.

Title: American Psycho
Summary: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

Title: CODA
Summary: As a CODA (Child of Deaf Adults) Ruby is the only hearing person in her deaf family. When the family's fishing business is threatened, Ruby finds herself torn between pursuing her passion at Berklee College of Music and her fear of abandoning her parents.

Title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
Summary: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Title: Prisoners
Summary: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

Title: Love at First Sight
Summary: Hadley and Oliver begin to fall for each other on their flight from New York to London. The probability of ever finding each other again seems impossible, but love - and London - may have a way of defying the odds.

Title: No Country for Old Men
Summary: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

Title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
Summary: The fragile peace between apes and humans is threatened as mistrust and betrayal threaten to plunge both tribes into a war for dominance over the Earth.

Title: Legend
Summary: Identical twin gangsters Ronald and Reginald Kray terrorize London during the 1960s.

Title: The Social Network
Summary: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

Title: My Fault
Summary: Noah has to leave her town, boyfriend and friends behind and move into the mansion of her mother's new rich husband. There she meets Nick, her new stepbrother. They fall madly in love in secret.

Title: Focus
Summary: In the midst of veteran con man Nicky's latest scheme, a woman from his past - now an accomplished femme fatale - shows up and throws his plans for a loop.

Title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
Summary: When the discovery of an ancient artifact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must join forces to protect their home and save the world from a second ice age.

Title: War for the Planet of the Apes
Summary: After the apes suffer unimaginable losses, Caesar wrestles with his darker instincts and begins his own mythic quest to avenge his kind.

Title: Wingwomen
Summary: Tired of the risks involved in a life of crime, two expert thieves and best friends recruit feisty Sam to assist them with one last job before they move to a new, and less stressful, line of work.

Title: Triple Frontier
Summary: Loyalties are tested when five friends and former special forces operatives reunite to take down a South American drug lord, unleashing a chain of unintended consequences.

Title: Spider-Man
Summary: After being bitten by a genetically-modified spider, a shy teenager gains spider-like abilities that he uses to fight injustice as a masked superhero and face a vengeful enemy.

Title: Léon: The Professional
Summary: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

Title: Stand by Me
Summary: After the death of his childhood best friend, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

Title: Miracle on 34th Street
Summary: A lawyer and a little girl must prove that a man claiming to be Santa Claus is the real thing.

Title: Captain Marvel
Summary: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

Title: Eyes Wide Shut
Summary: A Manhattan doctor embarks on a bizarre, night-long odyssey after his wife's admission of unfulfilled longing.

Title: Shutter Island
Summary: Teddy Daniels and Chuck Aule, two US marshals, are sent to an asylum on a remote island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient, where Teddy uncovers a shocking truth about the place.

Title: Good Will Hunting
Summary: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

Title: It
Summary: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.

Title: Beau Is Afraid
Summary: Following the sudden death of his mother, a mild-mannered but anxiety-ridden man confronts his darkest fears as he embarks on an epic, Kafkaesque odyssey back home.

Title: JFK
Summary: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

Title: Drive
Summary: A mysterious Hollywood action film stuntman gets in trouble with gangsters when he tries to help his neighbor's husband rob a pawn shop while serving as his getaway driver.

Title: Free Guy
Summary: When Guy, a bank teller, learns that he is a non-player character in a bloodthirsty, open-world video game, he goes on to become the hero of the story and takes the responsibility of saving the world.

Title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
Summary: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.

Title: John Wick
Summary: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters who killed his dog and stole his car.

Title: There Will Be Blood
Summary: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Summary: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Summary: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.

Title: Uncharted
Summary: Street-smart Nathan Drake is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor "Sully" Sullivan to recover a fortune amassed by Ferdinand Magellan, and lost 500 years ago by the House of Moncada.

Title: The 355
Summary: When a top-secret weapon falls into mercenary hands, a wild-card C.I.A. agent joins forces with three international agents on a mission to retrieve it, while staying a step ahead of a mysterious woman who's tracking their every move.

Title: In Time
Summary: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Here, Will Salas finds himself accused of murder and on the run with a hostage - a connection that becomes an important part of the way against the system.

Title: The Godfather Part II
Summary: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

Title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Summary: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.

Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
Summary: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

Title: Ghost Ship
Summary: A salvage crew discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea, and soon notices that its long-dead inhabitants may still be on board.

Title: Wildflower
Summary: A girl navigates life with two intellectually-disabled parents and an extended family that can't quite agree on the best way to help.

Title: The Danish Girl
Summary: A fictitious love story loosely inspired by the lives of Danish artists Lili Elbe and Gerda Wegener. Lili and Gerda's marriage and work evolve as they navigate Lili's groundbreaking journey as a transgender pioneer.

Title: High Fidelity
Summary: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

Title: Lou
Summary: A storm rages. A young girl is kidnapped. Her mother teams up with the mysterious woman next door to pursue the kidnapper, a journey that tests their limits and exposes shocking secrets from their pasts.

Title: Terminator Salvation
Summary: In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?

Title: Before We Go
Summary: Two strangers stuck in Manhattan for the night grow into each other's most trusted confidants when an evening of unexpected adventure forces them to confront their fears and take control of their lives.

Title: The Apartment
Summary: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

Title: The House
Summary: Across different eras, a poor family, an anxious developer and a fed-up landlady become tied to the same mysterious house in this animated dark comedy.
Director: Paloma Baeza(segment III: Listen Again and Seek the Sun),Emma De Swaef,Niki Lindroth von Bahr,Paloma Baeza,Niki Lindroth von Bahr(segment II: Then Lost Is Truth That Can't Be Won),Emma De Swaef(segment I: And Heard Within a Lie Is Spun)

Title: Faithfully Yours
Summary: Best friends Bodil and Isabel, apparently happily married, sneak off for secret affairs using each other as an alibi. But when Isabel is killed when they were supposed to have been together. Bodil gets caught up in her own web of lies.

Title: Norbit
Summary: A mild-mannered guy, who is married to a monstrous woman, meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her.

Title: REC
Summary: A television reporter and cameraman follow emergency workers into a dark apartment building and are quickly locked inside with something terrifying.

Title: The Mule
Summary: A ninety-year-old horticulturist and Korean War veteran turns drug mule for a Mexican cartel.

Title: Dangal
Summary: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

Title: Days of Thunder
Summary: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

Title: 1492: Conquest of Paradise
Summary: Christopher Columbus' discovery of the Americas and the effect this has on the indigenous people.

Title: Cry-Baby
Summary: In 1950s Baltimore, a bad boy with a heart of gold wins the love of a good girl, whose boyfriend sets out for revenge.

Title: Strange Days
Summary: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.

Title: Teddy's Christmas
Summary: Christmas peace falls over the small town, but at the Christmas market there's hectic activity. Mariann discovers a teddy bear at the top shelf. Is he alive? Mariann must get the teddy whatsoever. But Teddy wants to get to a rich family.

Title: Mangalavaaram
Summary: Fear engulfs a village as murders pile up mysteriously. Shailu, a young woman is the heart of the story and the enigmatic tale unravels with a suspenseful cinematic journey.

Title: The BFG
Summary: An orphan little girl befriends a benevolent giant who takes her to Giant Country, where they attempt to stop the man-eating giants that are invading the human world.

Title: Shrek the Third
Summary: Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming.

Title: Vertical Limit
Summary: A climber must rescue his sister on the peak of K2, the second highest mountain in the world .

Title: Bad Boys for Life
Summary: Miami detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett must face off against a mother-and-son pair of drug lords who wreak vengeful havoc on their city.

Title: Daredevil
Summary: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.

Title: The 5th Wave
Summary: Four waves of increasingly deadly alien attacks have left most of Earth in ruin. Cassie is on the run, desperately trying to save her younger brother.

Title: Hang 'Em High
Summary: When an innocent man barely survives a lynching, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the vigilantes to justice.

Title: Kaathal - The Core
Summary: The story of Mathew and Omana. Mathew, a retired bank secretary, reluctantly enters politics for a by-election. The movie delves into their marriage dynamics, justice, and personal fulfillment amidst a tight-knit village community.

Title: Flushed Away
Summary: The story of an uptown rat that gets flushed down the toilet from his penthouse apartment, ending in the sewers of London, where he has to learn a whole new and different way of life.

Title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
Summary: An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.

Title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
Summary: When Hiccup discovers Toothless isn't the only Night Fury, he must seek "The Hidden World", a secret Dragon Utopia before a hired tyrant named Grimmel finds it first.

Title: Rio Bravo
Summary: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

Title: The Brothers Grimm
Summary: Will and Jake Grimm are traveling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires true courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

Title: Set It Up
Summary: Two corporate executive assistants hatch a plan to match-make their two bosses.

Title: We Bought a Zoo
Summary: Set in Southern California, a father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo.

Title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
Summary: After picking up a traumatized young hitchhiker, five friends find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chainsaw-wielding loon and his family of equally psychopathic killers.

Title: Rocky II
Summary: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

Title: Kick-Ass 2
Summary: Following Kick-Ass' heroics, other citizens are inspired to become masked crusaders, but Red Mist leads his own group of evil super-villains to get revenge, kill Kick-Ass, and destroy everything he stands for.

Title: Flipped
Summary: Two eighth-graders start to have feelings for each other despite being total opposites.

Title: Mystery Men
Summary: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillain threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

Title: The Beastmaster
Summary: A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.

Title: Fiddler on the Roof
Summary: In pre-revolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant with traditional values contends with marrying off three of his daughters with modern romantic ideals while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.

Title: Hitch
Summary: A smooth-talking man falls for a hardened columnist while helping a shy accountant woo a beautiful heiress.

Title: Final Destination 2
Summary: Death is stalking Kimberly Corman and multiple survivors of a deadly highway accident.

Title: The Stepford Wives
Summary: The secret to a Stepford wife lies behind the doors of the Men's Association.

Title: Draft Day
Summary: At the NFL Draft, General Manager Sonny Weaver has the opportunity to rebuild his team when he trades for the number one pick. He must decide what he's willing to sacrifice on a life-changing day for a few hundred young men with NFL dreams.

Title: The New Mutants
Summary: Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.

Title: Onward
Summary: In a magical world full of technological advances, elven brothers Ian and Barley Lightfoot set out on an adventure to resurrect their late father for a day.

Title: Tumbbad
Summary: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

Title: Octopussy
Summary: A fake Fabergé egg, and a fellow Agent's death, lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel-smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.

Title: Suburra
Summary: A gangster known as "Samurai" wants to turn the waterfront of Rome into a new Las Vegas. All the local mob bosses have agreed to work for this common goal. But peace is not to last long.

Title: The Circle
Summary: A woman lands a dream job at a powerful tech company called the Circle, only to uncover an agenda that will affect the lives of all of humanity.

Title: Six Days Seven Nights
Summary: Robin Monroe, a New York magazine editor, and the gruff pilot Quinn Harris must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island.

Title: Pet Sematary
Summary: Dr. Louis Creed and his wife, Rachel, relocate from Boston to rural Maine with their two young children. The couple soon discover a mysterious burial ground hidden deep in the woods near their new home.

Title: Endless Love
Summary: Parental disapproval of a passionate romance between two teenagers leads to arguments, circumstance, insanity and tragedy.

Title: The Negotiator
Summary: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

Title: Christmas in the Smokies
Summary: Christmas in the Smokies is a modern-day Christmas classic set in the beautiful Smoky Mountains that tells the story of one family's journey to save their historic berry farm against all odds during one fateful holiday season.

Title: Summer of Sam
Summary: Spike Lee's take on the "Son of Sam" murders in New York City during the summer of 1977 centering on the residents of an Italian-American Northeast Bronx neighborhood who live in fear and distrust of one another.

Title: Ernest Saves Christmas
Summary: Ernest helps Santa Claus as he searches for his successor.

Title: Evil Dead II
Summary: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

Title: Paths of Glory
Summary: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

Title: The Best Offer
Summary: A lonely art expert working for a mysterious and reclusive heiress finds not only her art worth examining.

Title: Beast
Summary: A father and his two teenage daughters find themselves hunted by a massive rogue lion intent on proving that the Savanna has but one apex predator.

Title: The Beast
Summary: The plot is set partly in a near future in which artificial intelligence is in control of everyone's lives and human emotions are perceived as a threat.

Title: Malcolm X
Summary: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam and his eventual assassination.

Title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
Summary: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna.

Title: The Assistant
Summary: A searing look at a day in the life of an assistant to a powerful executive. As Jane follows her daily routine, she grows increasingly aware of the insidious abuse that threatens every aspect of her position.

Title: Pain & Gain
Summary: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida get caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.

Title: Americana
Summary: When a rare Lakota Ghost Shirt falls onto the black market in a small town in South Dakota, the lives of local outsiders and outcasts violently intertwine.

Title: Deliver Us from Evil
Summary: New York police officer Ralph Sarchie investigates a series of crimes. He joins forces with an unconventional priest, schooled in the rites of exorcism, to combat the possessions that are terrorizing their city.

Title: The Haunted Mansion
Summary: A realtor and his wife and children are summoned to a mansion, which they soon discover is haunted, and while they attempt to escape, he learns an important lesson about the family he has neglected.

Title: Save the Last Dance
Summary: A white midwestern girl moves to Chicago, where her new boyfriend is a black teen from the South Side with a rough, semi-criminal past.

Title: Cool Hand Luke
Summary: A laid-back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

Title: This Boy's Life
Summary: The story about the relationship between a rebellious 1950s teenager and his abusive stepfather, based on the memoirs of writer and literature Professor Tobias Wolff.

Title: A Dog's Purpose
Summary: A dog looks to discover his purpose in life over the course of several lifetimes and owners.

Title: Death Wish
Summary: Dr. Paul Kersey is an experienced trauma surgeon, a man who has spent his life saving lives. After an attack on his family, Paul embarks on his own mission for justice.

Title: Paprika
Summary: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

Title: A Fistful of Dollars
Summary: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

Title: Hoosiers
Summary: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small-town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the state championship in 1950s Indiana.

Title: Annabelle: Creation
Summary: Twelve years after the tragic death of their little girl, a doll-maker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from a shuttered orphanage into their home, where they become the target of the doll-maker's possessed creation, Annabelle.

Title: Staying Alive
Summary: Five years later, Tony Manero's Saturday Night Fever is still burning. Now he's strutting toward his biggest challenge yet: succeeding as a dancer on the Broadway stage.

Title: The Host
Summary: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about.

Title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
Summary: Based on the true story of a real-life friendship between Fred Rogers and journalist Lloyd Vogel.

Title: Fear the Night
Summary: Follows Iraqi war veteran Tess, as she prepares to strike back after a group of home invaders attack during her sister's bachelorette party, and she discovers that they are hellbent on not leaving any witnesses behind.

Title: Black Christmas
Summary: A group of female students is stalked by a stranger during their Christmas break. That is until the young sorority pledges discover that the killer is part of an underground college conspiracy.

Title: The Homesman
Summary: Three women who have been driven mad by pioneer life are to be transported across the country by covered wagon by the pious, independent-minded Mary Bee Cuddy, who in turn employs low-life drifter George Briggs to assist her.

Title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
Summary: Alice wakes up in the Raccoon City hospital after the area has been overrun by zombies, and must now make it out of the city before a nuclear bomb is dropped.

Title: Almost Christmas
Summary: A dysfunctional family gathers together for their first Christmas since their mom died.

Title: The Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society
Summary: In the aftermath of World War II, a writer forms an unexpected bond with the residents of Guernsey Island when she decides to write a book about their experiences during the war.

Title: Legend of the White Dragon
Summary: In the Aftermath, the city was left decimated. A past reminder of the great battle and fall of heroes. The heroes were blamed, stripped of their titles and hunted.

Title: The Conjuring: Last Rites
Summary: Plot under wraps.

Title: Official Secrets
Summary: The true story of a British whistleblower who leaked information to the press about an illegal NSA spy operation designed to push the UN Security Council into sanctioning the 2003 invasion of Iraq.

Title: Before the Devil Knows You're Dead
Summary: When two brothers organize the robbery of their parents' jewelry store the job goes horribly wrong, triggering a series of events that sends them, their father and one brother's wife barreling towards a shattering climax.

Title: True Story
Summary: When disgraced New York Times reporter Michael Finkel meets accused killer Christian Longo - who has taken on Finkel's identity - his investigation morphs into a game of cat-and-mouse.

Title: Jarhead
Summary: A psychological study of Marine's state of mind during the Gulf War. Told through the eyes of a U.S. Marine sniper who struggles to cope with boredom, a sense of isolation, and other issues back home.

Title: Jumper
Summary: A young man with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

Title: Shark Tale
Summary: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

Title: My Own Private Idaho
Summary: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

Title: The Party
Summary: A clerical mistake results in a bumbling Indian film star being invited to an exclusive Hollywood party instead of being fired.

Title: Only the Brave
Summary: Based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, a group of elite firefighters who risk everything to protect a town from a historic wildfire.

Title: The Call
Summary: Two people live in different times. Seo-Yeon lives in the present and Young-Sook lives in the past. One phone call connects the two, and their lives are changed irrevocably.

Title: A Separation
Summary: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

Title: The Monuments Men
Summary: An unlikely World War II platoon is tasked to rescue art masterpieces from German thieves and return them to their owners.

Title: Land
Summary: Edee, in the aftermath of an unfathomable event, finds herself unable to stay connected to the world and retreats to the wilds of the Rockies. After a local hunter brings her back from the brink of death, she must find a way to live again.

Title: The Sea Gull
Summary: Film adaptation of Anton Chekhov's story of life in rural Russia during the latter part of the 19th century.

Title: The First Omen
Summary: A young American woman is sent to Rome to begin a life of service to the church, but encounters a darkness that causes her to question her faith and uncovers a terrifying conspiracy that hopes to bring about the birth of evil incarnate.

Title: Dark Victory
Summary: A young socialite is diagnosed with an inoperable brain tumor, and must decide whether or not she'll meet her final days with dignity.

Title: How It Ends
Summary: In the midst of an apocalypse, a man struggles to reach his pregnant wife, who is thousands of miles away.

Title: Jason and the Argonauts
Summary: The legendary Greek hero leads a team of intrepid adventurers in a perilous quest for the legendary Golden Fleece.

Title: Tower Heist
Summary: When a group of hard-working guys find out they've fallen victim to their wealthy employer's Ponzi scheme, they conspire to rob his high-rise residence.

Title: There's Something Wrong with the Children
Summary: A family takes a weekend trip with longtime friends and their two young children, but, they suspect something supernatural when the kids behave strangely after disappearing into the woods overnight.

Title: The Babysitter: Killer Queen
Summary: Two years after Cole survived a satanic blood cult, he's living another nightmare: high school. And the demons from his past? Still making his life hell.

Title: Emily
Summary: "Emily" imagines the transformative, exhilarating, and uplifting journey to womanhood of a rebel and a misfit, one of the world's most famous, enigmatic, and provocative writers, who died, too soon, at age 30.

Title: School Ties
Summary: In 1959, a star quarterback from a working-class family is given an opportunity to attend an elite New England preparatory school, but he is conflicted about whether or not to tell his Evangelical classmates that he is Jewish.

Title: The Pledge
Summary: A retiring police detective pledges to catch the killer of a young child.

Title: The Electrical Life of Louis Wain
Summary: English artist Louis Wain rises to prominence at the end of the 19th century for his surreal cat paintings that seemed to reflect his declining sanity.

Title: The 13th Warrior
Summary: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled in a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

Title: Wij
Summary: Eight teens - four guys and four girls - are the best of friends. One summer, out of boredom they experiment with all manner of new means to entertain themselves. This degenerates into some extreme behaviour and will lead to tragedy.

Title: Sophie's Choice
Summary: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

Title: The Square
Summary: A prestigious Stockholm museum's chief art curator finds himself in times of both professional and personal crisis as he attempts to set up a controversial new exhibit.

Title: Mavka: The Forest Song
Summary: Mavka must choose between love and duty to protect the Heart of the Forest.

Title: Chained
Summary: A young man held prisoner by a cab-driving serial killer must make a life or death choice between following in his captor's footsteps or breaking free.

Title: Swimming Pool
Summary: A British mystery author visits her publisher's home in the South of France, where her interaction with his unusual daughter sets off some touchy dynamics.

Title: The Book of Life
Summary: Manolo, a young man who is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart, embarks on an adventure that spans three fantastic worlds where he must face his greatest fears.

Title: Gemini Man
Summary: An over-the-hill hitman faces off against a younger clone of himself.

Title: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey 2
Summary: Plot under wraps.

Title: Halloween
Summary: Laurie Strode confronts her long-time foe, Michael Myers, the masked figure who has haunted her since she narrowly escaped his killing spree on Halloween night four decades ago.

Title: Wanderlust
Summary: Rattled by sudden unemployment, a Manhattan couple surveys alternative living options, ultimately deciding to experiment with living on a rural commune where free love rules.

Title: Love Story
Summary: A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.

Title: All Fun and Games
Summary: A group of Salem teens discover a cursed knife that unleashes a demon that forces them to play gruesome, deadly versions of childhood games where there can be no winners, only survivors.

Title: Ken Park
Summary: Ken Park is about several Californian skateboarders' lives and relationships with and without their parents.

Title: Spy Kids 3: Game Over
Summary: Carmen's caught in a virtual reality game designed by the Kids' new nemesis, the Toymaker. It's up to Juni to save his sister, and ultimately the world.

Title: He's All That
Summary: A teenage girl sets out to give a nebbish classmate the ultimate high school makeover. An updated remake of the 1999 film, 'She's All That.'

Title: Oracle
Summary: Follows a young woman who accepts a job on a property with a traumatic past. Upon her arrival, she soon realizes that the nightmares of her childhood are connected to the evil in the house.

Title: Meander
Summary: A woman finds herself locked in a series of strange tunnels full of deadly traps.

Title: Godland
Summary: At the end of the 19th century, a young Danish priest is sent to a remote part of Iceland. The deeper he travels into the Icelandic landscape, the more he loses a sense of his own reality, his mission and his sense of duty.

Title: Bitter Moon
Summary: After hearing stories of her, a passenger on a cruise ship develops an irresistible infatuation with an eccentric paraplegic's wife.

Title: Lyle, Lyle, Crocodile
Summary: Feature film based on the children's book about a crocodile that lives in New York City.

Title: Pandorum
Summary: Two crew members of a spaceship wake up from hypersleep to discover that all their colleagues are missing. Despite this, it appears that they are not alone.

Title: Doctor Zhivago
Summary: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

Title: The Bank Job
Summary: Martine offers Terry a lead on a foolproof bank hit on London's Baker Street. She targets a roomful of safe deposit boxes worth millions in cash and jewelry along with a treasure trove of dirty secrets.

Title: Assassin
Summary: A man dies as part of an experimental military program. A former black-ops soldier takes his place to find who killed him.

Title: Reign of Fire
Summary: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting everything ablaze, establishing dominance over the planet.

Title: Borders of Love
Summary: Petr and Hana, who after years together share their unspoken erotic fantasies. What begins as an innocent conversation gradually turns into experimentation with a non-monogamous approach to their relationship.

Title: Joy Ride
Summary: Three young people on a road trip from Colorado to New Jersey talk to a trucker on their CB radio, then must escape when he turns out to be a psychopathic killer.

Title: The Vampire Lovers
Summary: Seductive vampire Carmilla Karnstein and her family target the beautiful and the rich in a remote area of late eighteenth-century Gemany.

Title: Crocodile Dundee
Summary: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

Title: Stuart Little
Summary: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

Title: Notes on a Scandal
Summary: A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her fifteen-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond a platonic friendship.

Title: All Hallows' Eve
Summary: A babysitter finds a VHS tape which features various sinister murders performed by a psychotic clown.

Title: From Hell
Summary: In Victorian-era London, a troubled clairvoyant police detective investigates the murders of Jack the Ripper.

Title: Little Nicky
Summary: After two of the devil's three sons escape Hell to wreak havoc on Earth, the devil must send his third son, the mild-mannered Nicky, to bring them back before it's too late.

Title: Capricorn One
Summary: When the first manned flight to Mars is deemed unsafe and scrubbed on the launch pad, anxious authorities must scramble to save face and retain their funding - and so an unthinkable plot to fake the mission is hatched.

Title: Halloween
Summary: After being committed for 15 years, Michael Myers, now a grown man and still very dangerous, escapes from the mental institution and immediately returns to Haddonfield to find his baby sister, Laurie.

Title: House of Wax
Summary: A group of teens are unwittingly stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit.

Title: Absolutely Anything
Summary: A group of eccentric aliens confers a human being with the power to do absolutely anything, as an experiment.

Title: Mechanic: Resurrection
Summary: Bishop's most formidable foe kidnaps the love of his life in order to make him complete three impossible assassinations and make them look like accidents.

Title: The Way
Summary: A father heads overseas to recover the body of his estranged son who died while traveling the "El camino de Santiago," and decides to take the pilgrimage himself.

Title: The Night House
Summary: A widow begins to uncover her recently deceased husband's disturbing secrets.

Title: Love & Mercy
Summary: In the 60s, Beach Boys leader Brian Wilson struggles with emerging psychosis as he attempts to craft his avant-garde pop masterpiece. In the 80s, he's a broken, confused man under the 24-hour watch of shady therapist, Dr. Eugene Landy.

Title: No Exit
Summary: During a blizzard and stranded at an isolated highway rest stop in the mountains, a college student discovers a kidnapped child hidden in a car belonging to one of the people inside.

Title: The Green Hornet
Summary: Following the death of his father, Britt Reid, heir to his father's large company, teams up with his late dad's assistant Kato to become a masked crime fighting team.

Title: Lights Out
Summary: Rebecca must unlock the terror behind her little brother's experiences that once tested her sanity, bringing her face to face with a supernatural spirit attached to their mother.

Title: The Hangover Part II
Summary: Two years after the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Phil, Stu, Alan, and Doug jet to Thailand for Stu's wedding. Stu's plan for a subdued pre-wedding brunch, however, goes seriously awry.

Title: The Taking of Deborah Logan
Summary: An elderly woman battling Alzheimer's disease agrees to let a film crew document her condition, but what they discover is something far more sinister going on.

Title: Baahubali: The Beginning
Summary: A child from the Mahishmati kingdom is raised by tribal people and one day learns about his royal heritage, his father's bravery in battle and a mission to overthrow the incumbent ruler.

Title: American Reunion
Summary: Jim, Michelle, Stifler, and their friends reunite in East Great Falls, Michigan for their high school reunion.

Title: Rampage
Summary: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago.

Title: Rotting in the Sun
Summary: Sebastián Silva is detached from life, struggling to succeed in the art world and habitually taking ketamine. When he meets social media influencer Jordan Firstman at a nudist beach, the two discuss collaborating, but fate has other plans.

Title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
Summary: Five siblings are left alone all summer when their mom leaves town and the evil babysitter bites the dust.

Title: Ghost World
Summary: With only the plan of moving in together after high school, two unusually devious friends seek direction in life. As a mere gag, they respond to a man's newspaper ad for a date, only to find it will greatly complicate their lives.

Title: Cube
Summary: Six complete strangers with widely varying personalities are involuntarily placed in an endless maze containing deadly traps.

Title: The Replacements
Summary: During a pro football strike, the owners hire substitute players.

Title: Brimstone
Summary: From the moment the new Reverend climbs the pulpit, Liz knows that she and her family are in great danger.

Title: The Great Wall
Summary: In ancient China, a group of European mercenaries encounters a secret army that maintains and defends the Great Wall of China against a horde of monstrous creatures.

Title: Hot Summer Nights
Summary: In 1991, a sheltered teenage boy comes of age during a wild summer he spends on Cape Cod getting rich from selling pot to gangsters, falling in love for the first time, partying and eventually realizing that he is in over his head.

Title: Escape Room: Tournament of Champions
Summary: Six people unwillingly find themselves locked in another series of escape rooms, slowly uncovering what they have in common to survive. Joining forces with two of the original survivors, they soon discover they've all played the game before.

Title: Bhagavanth Kesari
Summary: Nelakonda Bhagavanth Kesari is adamant about getting even with a powerful businessman who cost him money. He is prepared to square off against the formidable foe and resolve their issues amicably.

Title: In the Name of the Father
Summary: A man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

Title: Possessor
Summary: An agent works for a secretive organization that uses brain-implant technology to inhabit other people's bodies - ultimately driving them to commit assassinations for high-paying clients.

Title: Time Bandits
Summary: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

Title: The Movie Critic
Summary: The story of an irreverent critic in 1970s California who reviews mainstream movies for a porno magazine called The Popstar Pages.

Title: RocknRolla
Summary: When a Russian mobster orchestrates a crooked land deal, millions of dollars are up for grabs, drawing in the entire London underworld into a feeding frenzy at a time when the old criminal regime is losing turf to a wealthy foreign mob.

Title: Space Jam: A New Legacy
Summary: A rogue artificial intelligence kidnaps the son of famed basketball player LeBron James, who then has to work with Bugs Bunny to win a basketball game.

Title: Tron: Ares
Summary: Showcases Ares, Leto's computer program, on a journey from the digital world to the human one.

Title: Shotgun Wedding
Summary: Darcy and Tom gather their families for the ultimate destination wedding but when the entire wedding party is taken hostage the bride and groom must save their loved ones--if they don't kill each other first.

Title: Goodnight Mommy
Summary: Twin brothers arrive at their mother's house and begin to suspect that something isn't right.

Title: The Invasion
Summary: As a Washington, D.C. psychiatrist unearths the origin of an alien epidemic, she also discovers her son might be the only way it can be stopped.

Title: Last Seen Alive
Summary: Will's soon-to-be ex-wife mysteriously vanishes at a gas station. He delves into the town's criminal underbelly while running from the authorities in a race against time to find her.

Title: Black Snake Moan
Summary: A God-fearing bluesman takes to a wild young woman who, as a victim of childhood sexual abuse, looks everywhere for love, never quite finding it.

Title: The Choice
Summary: Travis and Gabby first meet as neighbors in a small coastal town and wind up in a relationship that is tested by life's most defining events.

Title: Dirty Grandpa
Summary: Right before his wedding, an uptight guy is tricked into driving his grandfather, a lecherous former Army Lieutenant Colonel, to Florida for Spring Break.

Title: The Crying Game
Summary: A British soldier kidnapped by the IRA soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

Title: If You Were the Last
Summary: Adrift in their broken-down space shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts argue over whether they're better off spending their remaining days as friends or something more.

Title: Enemy of the State
Summary: A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.

Title: 8MM
Summary: A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.

Title: Last Vegas
Summary: Four friends take a break from their day-to-day lives to throw a bachelor party in Las Vegas for their last remaining single pal.

Title: Maverick
Summary: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

Title: Little Italy
Summary: A young couple must navigate a blossoming romance, amidst a war between their families' competing pizza restaurants.

Title: Macbeth
Summary: Macbeth, the Thane of Glamis, receives a prophecy from a trio of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland. Consumed by ambition and spurred to action by his wife, Macbeth murders his king and takes the throne for himself.

Title: Bedazzled
Summary: Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted seven wishes by the Devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul.

Title: Sweet November
Summary: A workaholic executive, and an unconventional woman agree to a personal relationship for a short period. In this short period she changes his life.

Title: A Room with a View
Summary: Lucy Honeychurch (Helena Bonham Carter) shares a brief romance with George Emerson in Florence. Yet as she tries to move on with her life and look for marriage elsewhere, can she truly forget the events of that summer?

Title: Castle in the Sky
Summary: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

Title: On the Waterfront
Summary: An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.

Title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass
Summary: Declassified files related to President Kennedy's assassination in a far larger context, aiming to shine more light on what really happened in 1963.

Title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
Summary: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, Oceanographer Steve Zissou (Bill Murray) rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

Title: Blacklight
Summary: Travis Block is a government operative coming to terms with his shadowy past. When he discovers a plot targeting U.S. citizens, Block finds himself in the crosshairs of the FBI director he once helped protect.

Title: Horizon: An American Saga
Summary: Chronicles a multi-faceted, 15-year span of pre-and post-Civil War expansion and settlement of the American west.

Title: The Mission
Summary: 26-year-old American missionary John Chau was killed as he attempted to make contact with an Indigenous group off the coast of India, one of the last communities on the planet still living in isolation.

Title: Audition
Summary: A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, arranged for him by a friend to find him a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be after all.

Title: Solace
Summary: Psychic John Clancy (Sir Anthony Hopkins) works with the F.B.I. in order to hunt down a serial killer.

Title: Howard the Duck
Summary: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop an alien invasion with the help of a nerdy scientist and a struggling female rock singer.

Title: The Angry Birds Movie
Summary: When an island populated by happy, flightless birds is visited by mysterious green piggies, it's up to three unlikely outcasts - Red, Chuck and Bomb - to figure out what the pigs are up to.

Title: Barb Wire
Summary: During the Second American Civil War in 2017, Barb Wire owns a nightclub called the Hammerhead. Things become complicated when her ex-lover Axel Hood, who is married to the fugitive Corrina Devonshire, re-enters her life.

Title: Let Me In
Summary: A bullied young boy befriends a young female vampire who lives in secrecy with her guardian.

Title: Tom & Jerry
Summary: A chaotic battle ensues between Jerry Mouse, who has taken refuge in the Royal Gate Hotel, and Tom Cat, who is hired to drive him away before the day of a big wedding arrives.

Title: But I'm a Cheerleader
Summary: A naive teenager is sent to rehab camp when her straitlaced parents and friends suspect her of being a lesbian.

Title: Lust, Caution
Summary: During World War II era, a young woman, Wang Jiazhi, gets swept up in a dangerous game of emotional intrigue with a powerful political figure, Mr. Yee.

Title: Revenge
Summary: Never take your mistress on an annual guys' getaway, especially one devoted to hunting - a violent lesson for three wealthy married men.

Title: Drop Dead Gorgeous
Summary: A small-town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

Title: Locke
Summary: Ivan Locke, a dedicated family man and successful construction manager, receives a phone call on the eve of the biggest challenge of his career that sets in motion a series of events that threaten his carefully cultivated existence.

Title: Bee Movie
Summary: Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey and subsequently decides to sue them.

Title: Alice, Darling
Summary: A young woman trapped in an abusive relationship becomes the unwitting participant in an intervention staged by her two closest friends.

Title: The Vow
Summary: A car accident puts Paige in a coma, and when she wakes up with severe memory loss, her husband Leo works to win her heart again.

Title: Cyberbunker: The Criminal Underworld
Summary: A group of hackers powered the darkest corners of the internet from a Cold War-era bunker in a quiet German tourist town.

Title: High Noon
Summary: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at "high noon" when the gang leader, an outlaw he "sent up" years ago, arrives on the noon train.

Title: The Farewell
Summary: A Chinese family discovers their grandmother has only a short while left to live and decide to keep her in the dark, scheduling a wedding to gather before she dies.

Title: The Parent Trap
Summary: Teenage twin sisters swap places and scheme to reunite their divorced parents.

Title: The DUFF
Summary: A high school senior instigates a social pecking order revolution after finding out that she has been labeled the DUFF - Designated Ugly Fat Friend - by her prettier, more popular counterparts.

Title: Going in Style
Summary: Desperate to pay the bills and come through for their loved ones, three lifelong pals risk it all by embarking on a daring bid to knock off the very bank that absconded with their money.

Title: King Richard
Summary: A look at how tennis superstars Venus and Serena Williams became who they are after the coaching from their father Richard Williams.

Title: Irugapatru
Summary: Follows three couples, navigating inevitable challenges, and seeking self-discovery to salvage their relationships

Title: Allied
Summary: In 1942, a Canadian intelligence officer in North Africa encounters a female French Resistance fighter on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of war.

Title: Inside Llewyn Davis
Summary: A week in the life of a young singer as he navigates the Greenwich Village folk scene of 1961.

Title: The Wizard
Summary: A boy and his brother run away from home and hitch cross-country, with help from a girl they meet, to compete in the ultimate video-game championship.

Title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
Summary: The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

Title: Saw V
Summary: Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests.

Title: The Way Way Back
Summary: Shy 14-year-old Duncan goes on summer vacation with his mother, her overbearing boyfriend, and her boyfriend's daughter. Having a rough time fitting in, Duncan finds an unexpected friend in Owen, manager of the Water Wizz water park.

Title: Scrooge
Summary: A musical retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about an old bitter miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

Title: Holy Spider
Summary: A journalist descends into the dark underbelly of the Iranian holy city of Mashhad as she investigates the serial killings of sex workers by the so called "Spider Killer", who believes he is cleansing the streets of sinners.

Title: Frozen III
Summary: Anna, Elsa, Olaf, Kristoff, and Sven go on another adventure.

Title: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
Summary: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

Title: Running Scared
Summary: A low-ranking thug is entrusted by his crime boss to dispose of a gun that killed corrupt cops, but things get out of control when the gun ends up in wrong hands.

Title: Short Term 12
Summary: A 20-something supervising staff member of a residential treatment facility navigates the troubled waters of that world alongside her co-worker and longtime boyfriend.

Title: Babes in Toyland
Summary: Mary Contrary is set to marry Tom Piper when he is kidnapped by Roderigo and Gonzorgo, two goons working for the evil Barnaby who wants to marry Mary for her inheritance.

Title: South Pacific
Summary: On a South Pacific island during World War II, love blooms between a young nurse and a secretive Frenchman who's being courted for a dangerous military mission.

Title: Get Hard
Summary: When millionaire James King is jailed for fraud and bound for San Quentin, he turns to Darnell Lewis to prep him to go behind bars.

Title: Christopher Robin
Summary: A working-class family man, Christopher Robin, encounters his childhood friend Winnie-the-Pooh, who helps him to rediscover the joys of life.

Title: DogMan
Summary: A boy, bruised by life, finds his salvation through the love of his dogs.

Title: The Guest
Summary: A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence.

Title: The Lost City of Z
Summary: A true-life drama, centering on British explorer Major Percival Fawcett, who disappeared whilst searching for a mysterious city in the Amazon in the 1920s.

Title: The Specialist
Summary: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

Title: Spellbound
Summary: Spellbound follows the adventures of Ellian, the tenacious princess who must go on a daring quest to save her family and kingdom after a mysterious spell transforms her parents, the King and Queen of Lumbria, into monsters.

Title: Horton Hears a Who!
Summary: Horton the Elephant struggles to protect a microscopic community from his neighbors who refuse to believe it exists.

Title: Mysterious Skin
Summary: A teenage hustler and a young man obsessed with alien abductions cross paths, together discovering a horrible, liberating truth.

Title: I Am Dragon
Summary: In the midst of the wedding princess Miroslava is kidnapped by a dragon and carried away into his castle on the remote island.

Title: Serpico
Summary: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

Title: We Have a Ghost
Summary: Finding a ghost named Ernest haunting their new home turns Kevin's family into overnight social media sensations. But when Kevin and Ernest investigate the mystery of Ernest's past, they become a target of the CIA.

Title: Bully
Summary: A pack of naïve teenagers conspire to murder a mutual friend, whose aggressive demeanour has proven too much.

Title: Togo
Summary: The story of Togo, the sled dog who led the 1925 serum run despite being considered too small and weak to lead such an intense race.

Title: The Last Starfighter
Summary: High schooler Alex Rogan conquers the Starfighter video game, only to find out it was just a test, and is transported to another planet. He has been recruited to join a team of the best starfighters to defend their world from the attack.

Title: I'll Be Home for Christmas
Summary: A college student faces an impossible journey when he is left stranded in the desert, thousands of miles from home, with no money and only a few days left until Christmas.

Title: Papillon
Summary: A French convict in the 1930s befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence in the South American penal colony on Devil's Island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

Title: Popeye
Summary: The adventures of the famous sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

Title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
Summary: Through his bond with his owner, aspiring Formula One race car driver Denny, golden retriever Enzo learns that the techniques needed on the racetrack can also be used to successfully navigate the journey of life.

Title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
Summary: Singer Dewey Cox overcomes adversity to become a musical legend.

Title: Looking for Her
Summary: Taylor is headed home for the holidays and her family is finally ready to meet her girlfriend Jess--but Jess isn't her girlfriend anymore. Taylor holds open auditions for someone to play the part for the holidays.

Title: The Dirt
Summary: Based on the bestselling autobiography from Mötley Crüe, the film is an unflinching tale of success and excess as four misfits rise from the streets of Hollywood to the heights of international fame.

Title: Ek Tha Tiger
Summary: India's top spy Tiger and his love Zoya battle the dark world of intelligence and espionage that forbids its soldiers from loving the enemy.

Title: El Dorado
Summary: Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher that is trying to steal their water.

Title: Poker Face
Summary: A tech billionaire hosts a high-stakes poker game between friends, but the evening takes a turn when long-held secrets are revealed, an elaborate revenge plot unfolds, and thieves break in.

Title: Footloose
Summary: City teenager Ren MacCormack moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

Title: The Longest Yard
Summary: A sadistic warden asks a former pro quarterback, now serving time in his prison, to put together a team of inmates to take on (and get pummeled by) the guards.

Title: Unknown
Summary: When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is.

Title: Spoiler Alert
Summary: The story of Michael Ausiello and Kit Cowan's relationship, which takes a tragic turn when Cowan is diagnosed with terminal cancer.

Title: Terminal
Summary: A film noir taking place in a train terminal at night. Add two male assassins, a female assassin, a waitress, a teacher, a janitor, and a crime boss. Add revenge. Who says mystery is a lost art?

Title: I Am Number Four
Summary: Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.

Title: Riddick
Summary: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators. Activating an emergency beacon alerts two ships: one carrying a new breed of mercenary, the other captained by a man from Riddick's past.

Title: The Brady Bunch Movie
Summary: The original 1970s TV family is now placed in the 1990s, where they're even more square and out of place than ever.

Title: Street Fighter
Summary: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

Title: Original Sin

Title: Kiss the Girls

Title: Superfast!

Summary: A losing coach and his underdog football team face their giants of fear and failure on and off the field, with surprising results.

Summary: With his carefree lifestyle on the line, a wealthy charmer poses as a ranch hand to get a hardworking farmer to sell her family's land before Christmas.

Title: The Eternal Daughter
Summary: Returning to a hotel now haunted by its mysterious past, an artist and her elderly mother confront long-buried secrets in their former family home.

Title: Parenthood
Summary: Four Buckman siblings attempt to raise their children - each in their own different style - and deal with the joys and sorrows that the process brings.

Title: The Old Guard 2
Summary: Plot Unknown. Sequel to The Old Guard (2020).

Title: Deepwater Horizon
Summary: A dramatization of the disaster in April 2010, when the offshore drilling rig called the Deepwater Horizon exploded, resulting in the worst oil spill in American history.

Title: Bros
Summary: Two men with commitment problems attempt a relationship.

Title: Christmas in Connecticut
Summary: A food writer who has lied about being the perfect housewife must try to cover her deception when her boss and a returning war hero invite themselves to her home for a traditional family Christmas.

Title: Badlands
Summary: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town, and her older greaser boyfriend, embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota Badlands.

Title: Vesper
Summary: Struggling to survive with her father after the collapse of Earth's ecosystem, 13-year-old Vesper must use her wits, strength and bio-hacking abilities to fight for the future.

Title: A Goofy Movie
Summary: When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

Title: Confess, Fletch
Summary: After becoming the prime suspect in multiple murders, Fletch strives to prove his innocence while simultaneously searching for his fiancé's stolen art collection.

Title: No Escape
Summary: In their new overseas house, an American family soon finds themselves caught in the middle of a coup, and they frantically look for a safe escape from an environment where foreigners are being immediately executed.

Title: The Straight Story
Summary: An old man makes a long journey by lawnmower to mend his relationship with an ill brother.

Title: Spenser Confidential
Summary: When two Boston police officers are murdered, ex-cop Spenser teams up with his no-nonsense roommate Hawk to take down criminals.

Title: Target
Summary: The protagonist who reports the seller of a broken washing machine to the police, only to realize he's a psychopathic serial killer. It makes one rethink the purchase of second-hand items via online apps

Title: Sorry to Bother You
Summary: In an alternate present-day version of Oakland, telemarketer Cassius Green discovers a magical key to professional success, propelling him into a universe of greed.

Title: Stripes
Summary: Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

Title: Happiness
Summary: The lives of several individuals intertwine as they go about their lives in their own unique ways, engaging in acts which society as a whole might find disturbing in a desperate search for human connection.

Title: Story of White Coat: Indecent Acts
Summary: Shinobu, a beautiful nurse works in a hospital. Junior, a patient recovering from alcohol poisoning, notices her. He is the son of the hospital's main financiers and is used to "getting his own way".

Title: Peter Pan
Summary: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

Title: The Dirty South
Summary: When the small town big shot goes after the deed to her family's bar, a heartbreaking bartender takes extreme measures to keep it.

Title: Behind Enemy Lines
Summary: A disillusioned pilot shot down over war-torn Bosnia goes on the run from the local military and an assassin, as his commanding officer risks all to save him.

Title: The Addams Family

Title: Rebecca
Summary: A young newlywed arrives at her husband's imposing family estate on a windswept English coast and finds herself battling the shadow of his first wife, Rebecca, whose legacy lives on in the house long after her death.

Title: Appendage
Summary: A young fashion designer's life spirals as her darkest inner thoughts manifest into something gruesome- that won't stop growing.

Title: Top Secret!
Summary: An American rock and roll singer (Val Kilmer) becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist (Michael Gough) imprisoned in East Germany.

Title: Snakes on a Plane
Summary: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly venomous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

Title: Spawn
Summary: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

Title: Burlesque
Summary: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

Title: Rambo III
Summary: Rambo mounts a one-man mission to rescue his friend Colonel Trautman from the clutches of the formidable invading Soviet forces in Afghanistan.

Title: Hatari!
Summary: A group of men trap wild animals in Africa and sell them to zoos before the arrival of a female wildlife photographer threatens to change their ways.

Title: Sleeping with Other People
Summary: A good-natured womanizer and a serial cheater form a platonic relationship that helps reform them in ways, while a mutual attraction sets in.

Title: 48 Hrs.
Summary: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him in order to track down a killer.

Title: Videodrome

Title: Candyman
Summary: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

Title: Playing with Fire
Summary: A crew of rugged firefighters meet their match when attempting to rescue three rambunctious kids.

Title: Midnight Lace
Summary: In London, a recently-wed American woman's sanity comes into question after she claims to be the victim of a threatening stalker.

Title: Alice's Restaurant
Summary: A cinematic adaption of Arlo Guthrie's classic song story.

Title: C'mon C'mon

Title: Antlers
Summary: In an isolated Oregon town, a middle-school teacher and her sheriff brother become embroiled with her enigmatic student, whose dark secrets lead to terrifying encounters with an ancestral creature.

Title: The Dead Don't Die
Summary: The peaceful town of Centerville finds itself battling a zombie horde as the dead start rising from their graves.

Title: Mr. Deeds
Summary: A sweet-natured, small-town guy inherits a controlling stake in a media conglomerate and begins to do business his way.

Title: The Midnight Sky
Summary: This post-apocalyptic tale follows Augustine, a lonely scientist in the Arctic, as he races to stop Sully and her fellow astronauts from returning home to a mysterious global catastrophe.

Title: No Sudden Move

Title: The Break-Up

Title: How to Train Your Dragon 2

Title: The Maltese Falcon

Title: The Karate Kid Part II

Title: Asterix & Obelix: The Middle Kingdom
Summary: The only daughter of the Chinese emperor Han Xuandi, escapes from a strict prince and seeks help from the Gauls and the two brave warriors Asterix and Obelix.

Title: Havoc
Summary: After a drug deal gone wrong, a bruised detective must fight his way through the criminal underworld to rescue a politician's estranged son, unraveling a deep web of corruption and conspiracy that ensnares his entire city.

Title: Rare Exports

Title: Hunger
Summary: Irish republican Bobby Sands leads the inmates of a Northern Irish prison in a hunger strike.

Title: Snitch
Summary: A father goes undercover for the DEA in order to free his son, who was imprisoned after being set up in a drug deal.

Title: The King of Staten Island

Summary: Hard-nosed, hard-living Marine Gunnery Sergeant Tom Highway clashes with his superiors and his ex-wife as he takes command of a spoiled recon platoon with a bad attitude.

Title: Baby's Day Out
Summary: After three kidnappers lose the baby they have kidnapped, both the cops and kidnappers go looking for the baby.

Title: The Last Letter from Your Lover

Title: Kiss Me
Summary: A young woman engaged to be married finds herself in an affair with her soon-to-be stepmother's lesbian daughter.

Title: Wolfs
Summary: Follows two lone wolf fixers who are assigned to the same job.

Title: That Awkward Moment
Summary: Three best friends find themselves where we've all been - at that confusing moment in every dating relationship when you have to decide "So...where is this going?"

Title: Luckiest Girl Alive
Summary: A woman in New York, who seems to have things under control, is faced with a trauma that makes her life unravel.

Title: Unthinkable

Title: Hocus Pocus 2
Summary: Two young women accidentally bring back the Sanderson Sisters to modern day Salem and must figure out how to stop the child-hungry witches from wreaking havoc on the world.

Title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows

Title: Dawn of the Dead
Summary: During an escalating zombie epidemic, two Philadelphia SWAT team members, a traffic reporter and his TV executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

Title: God's Crooked Lines
Summary: Follows a woman checking into a psychiatric ward to investigate a homicide.

Title: Snow White and the Evil Queen
Summary: A story about beauty and vanity, a princess and a prince, and about love and its power to raise from death to life.

Title: Charade
Summary: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

Title: Patriots Day
Summary: The story of the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing and the aftermath, which includes the city-wide manhunt to find the terrorists responsible.

Title: Glengarry Glen Ross
Summary: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

Title: Night Teeth
Summary: A college student moonlighting as a chauffeur picks up two mysterious women for a night of party-hopping across LA. But when he uncovers their bloodthirsty intentions - and their dangerous, shadowy underworld - he must fight to stay alive.

Title: Open Range
Summary: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

Title: Anaconda
Summary: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who forces them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

Title: Date Night
Summary: In New York City, a case of mistaken identity turns a bored married couple's attempt at a glamorous and romantic evening into something more thrilling and dangerous.

Title: Carmen Jones
Summary: Contemporary version of the Bizet opera, with new lyrics and an African-American cast.

Title: The Nightingale
Summary: Set in 1825, Clare, a young Irish convict woman, chases a British officer through the rugged Tasmanian wilderness, bent on revenge for a terrible act of violence he committed against her family. On the way she enlists the services of an Aboriginal tracker named Billy, who is also marked by trauma from his own violence-filled past.

Title: Never Been Kissed
Summary: A newspaper reporter enrolls in high school as part of research for a story.

Title: The Night of the Hunter
Summary: A self-proclaimed preacher marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real dad hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

Title: Jane Eyre
Summary: A mousy governess who softens the heart of her employer soon discovers that he's hiding a terrible secret.

Title: The Tank

Summary: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

Title: 28 Days
Summary: A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine.

Title: Without a Paddle
Summary: After their friend dies, three men decide to fulfill their childhood dream by going on a camping expedition for the lost D. B. Cooper bounty, with calamitous results.

Title: A Star Is Born
Summary: A has-been rock star falls in love with a young, up-and-coming songstress.

Title: Centurion
Summary: A splinter group of Roman soldiers fight for their lives behind enemy lines after their legion is devastated in a guerrilla attack.

Title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
Summary: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

Title: Blood Simple
Summary: The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies, and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered.

Title: The Professionals
Summary: An arrogant Texas millionaire hires four adventurers to rescue his kidnapped wife from a notorious Mexican bandit.

Title: Night of the Living Dead
Summary: A ragtag group of survivors barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the Northeast portion of the United States.

Title: War and Peace
Summary: The Russian aristocracy prepares for the French invasion on the eve of 1812.

Title: Persona
Summary: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

Title: Jackass Forever
Summary: After 11 years, the Jackass crew is back for another crusade.

Title: High Tension

Title: No One Lives

Title: Halloween II
Summary: While Dr. Loomis hunts for Michael Myers, a traumatized Laurie is rushed to Haddonfield Memorial Hospital, and The Shape is not far behind her.

Title: Horns
Summary: In the aftermath of his girlfriend's mysterious death, a young man awakens to find strange horns sprouting from his forehead.

Title: Vacation Friends 2
Summary: A couple who meets up with another couple while on vacation in Mexico sees their friendship take an awkward turn when they get back home.

Title: Wet Hot American Summer
Summary: Set on the last day of camp, in the hot summer of 1981, a group of counselors try to complete their unfinished business before the day ends.

Title: Coming 2 America
