Summary: Roman J. Israel, Esq., a driven, idealistic defense attorney, finds himself in a tumultuous series of events that lead to a crisis and the necessity for extreme action.

Title: I Don't Feel at Home in This World Anymore
Summary: When a depressed woman is burgled, she finds a new sense of purpose by tracking down the thieves alongside her obnoxious neighbour. But they soon find themselves dangerously out of their depth against a pack of degenerate criminals.

Title: The Fox and the Hound
Summary: A fox named Tod and a hound named Copper vow to be best friends forever. But as Copper grows into a hunting dog, their unlikely friendship faces the ultimate test.

Title: The Deepest Breath
Summary: A champion and expert safety diver seemed destined for one another. Despite different paths taken, they meet at the pinnacle of the free-diving world, experiencing the thrilling rewards and inescapable risks of chasing dreams through the depths of the ocean.

Title: Puss in Boots
Summary: An outlaw cat, his childhood egg-friend, and a seductive thief kitty set out in search for the eggs of the fabled Golden Goose to clear his name, restore his lost honor, and regain the trust of his mother and town.

Title: Stowaway
Summary: A three-person crew on a mission to Mars faces an impossible choice when an unplanned passenger jeopardizes the lives of everyone on board.

Title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants
Summary: Four best girlfriends hatch a plan to stay connected with one another as their lives start off in different directions: they pass around a pair of secondhand jeans that fits each of their bodies perfectly.

Title: The Card Counter
Summary: Redemption is the long game in Paul Schrader's THE CARD COUNTER. Told with Schrader's trademark cinematic intensity, the revenge thriller tells the story of an ex-military interrogator turned gambler haunted by the ghosts of his past.

Title: The Guns of Navarone
Summary: A team of Allied saboteurs is assigned an impossible mission: infiltrate an impregnable Nazi-held Greek island and destroy the two enormous long-range field guns that prevent the rescue of 2,000 trapped British soldiers.

Title: Your Highness
Summary: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.

Title: A Most Violent Year
Summary: In New York City 1981, an ambitious immigrant fights to protect his business and family during the most dangerous year in the city's history.

Title: Halloween Kills
Summary: Surviving victims of Michael Myers form a vigilante mob and vow to end his reign of terror.

Title: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
Summary: The murderous fisherman with a hook is back to once again stalk the two surviving teens, Julie and Ray, who had left him for dead, as well as cause even more murder and mayhem, this time at a posh island resort.

Title: Harrison's Flowers
Summary: When a Newsweek photojournalist disappears in war-torn Yugoslavia, his wife travels to Europe to find him.

Title: Martha Marcy May Marlene
Summary: Haunted by painful memories and increasing paranoia, a damaged woman struggles to re-assimilate with her family after fleeing an abusive cult.

Title: Wild Wild West
Summary: The two best special agents in the Wild West must save President Grant from the clutches of a diabolical, wheelchair-bound, steampunk-savvy, Confederate scientist bent on revenge for losing the Civil War.

Title: Flatliners
Summary: Five medical students experiment with "near death" experiences, until the dark consequences of past tragedies begin to jeopardize their lives.

Title: Transcendence
Summary: A scientist's drive for artificial intelligence takes on dangerous implications when his own consciousness is uploaded into one such program.

Title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules
Summary: Back in middle school after summer vacation, Greg Heffley and his older brother Rodrick must deal with their parents' misguided attempts to have them bond.

Title: The Adults
Summary: The plan to make a trip back home as short as possible begins to unravel as Eric finds himself balancing the challenging relationship with his two sisters and his addiction to a local poker game.

Title: The Commitments
Summary: Jimmy Rabbitte, an unemployed Dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the Irish working class.

Title: Judgment at Nuremberg
Summary: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

Title: Real Life
Summary: A film crew sets out to record a year in the life of an average family, but things quickly start going wrong.

Title: The Story of O
Summary: Photographer O's lover takes her to a Château, where she is, like other women there, naked, humiliated by whipping, sexual abuse by men etc. When O leaves, her lover gives her to his much older step-brother.

Title: In the Realm of the Senses
Summary: A passionate telling of the story of Sada Abe, a woman whose affair with her master led to an obsessive and ultimately destructive sexual relationship.

Title: Big Stan
Summary: A weak con man panics when he learns he's going to prison for fraud. He hires a mysterious martial arts guru who helps transform him into a martial arts expert who can fight off inmates who want to hurt or love him.

Title: Leviathan
Summary: Perched on the hull of a wrecked Soviet freighter, a team of deep-sea miners led by head oceanographer Steven Beck comes face to face with a mutant creature that's the product of a failed genetic experiment.

Title: The Pagemaster
Summary: A cowardly boy, who buries himself in accident statistics, enters a library to escape a storm, only to be transformed into an animated illustration by the Pagemaster. He has to work through obstacles from classic books to return to real-life.
Director: Joe Johnston(live action sequences),Pixote Hunt,Joe Johnston

Title: Outward Bound
Summary: Later remade as "Between Two Worlds."

Title: John Q
Summary: John Quincy Archibald takes a hospital emergency room hostage when his insurance won't cover his son's heart transplant.

Title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
Summary: A town's Sheriff and regular patron of a historical whorehouse fights to keep it running when a television reporter targets it as the Devil's playhouse.

Title: War on Everyone
Summary: Two corrupt cops set out to blackmail and frame every criminal unfortunate enough to cross their path. Events, however, are complicated by the arrival of someone who appears to be even more dangerous than they are.

Title: Blockers
Summary: Three parents try to stop their daughters from losing their virginity on prom night.

Title: The Kitchen
Summary: In a dystopian future London where all social housing has been eliminated, Izi and Benji fight to navigate the world as residents of The Kitchen, a community that refuses to abandon their home.

Title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
Summary: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

Title: Days of Heaven
Summary: A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.

Title: Breakdown
Summary: A man searches for his missing wife after his car breaks down in the middle of the desert.

Title: Dinosaur
Summary: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sanctuary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

Title: The Grudge
Summary: An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.

Title: The Postman
Summary: A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.

Title: Bull
Summary: Bull mysteriously returns home after a 10 year absence to seek revenge on those who double crossed him all those years ago.

Title: Paprika
Summary: A young country girl comes to town and works in a brothel in order to help her fiance get the money to start his own business. "Paprika" is the name given to her by the madam.

Title: The Boat That Rocked
Summary: A band of rogue DJs that captivated Britain, playing the music that defined a generation and standing up to a government that wanted classical music, and nothing else, on the airwaves.

Title: Dead Silence
Summary: After his wife meets a grisly end, Jamie Ashen returns to his hometown of Ravens Fair to find answers. His investigation leads him to the ghost of a ventriloquist named Mary Shaw who seems to have ties to his entire family tree

Title: I Heard the Bells
Summary: The inspiring story behind the writing of the beloved Christmas carol and its author, Henry Wadsworth Longfellow.

Title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
Summary: The comic "Bluntman and Chronic" is based on real-life stoners Jay and Silent Bob, so when they get no profit from a big-screen adaptation, they set out to wreck the movie.

Title: Mousehunt
Summary: Two stumblebum inheritors are determined to rid their antique house of a mouse who is equally determined to stay where he is.

Title: Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist
Summary: Two newly acquainted music-lovers spend the night scouting the streets of New York City in search of their favourite band's surprise secret show. All the while, they're both being chased after by their tempting but devious exes.

Title: U.S. Marshals
Summary: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan, who has been accused of a double-murder.

Title: My Sister's Keeper
Summary: Anna Fitzgerald looks to earn medical emancipation from her parents who until now have relied on their youngest child to help their leukemia-stricken daughter Kate remain alive.

Title: Endless
Summary: When madly in love high school graduates Riley and Chris are separated by a tragic car accident, Riley blames herself for her boyfriend's death while Chris is stranded in limbo. Miraculously, the two find a way to connect.

Title: So I Married an Axe Murderer
Summary: A San Francisco poet who fears commitment suspects his girlfriend may have a knack for killing off her significant others.

Title: Peter Rabbit
Summary: A rebellious rabbit tries to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden.

Title: Bull Durham
Summary: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

Title: Sister Act 3
Summary: Third installment of the 'Sister Act' comedy franchise.

Title: Madea's Family Reunion
Summary: While planning her family reunion, a pistol-packing grandma must contend with the other dramas on her plate, including the runaway who has been placed under her care, and her love-troubled nieces.

Title: The Channel
Summary: After their bank heist goes wrong, a desperate criminal, his out-of-control brother, and their motley crew of ex-marines must escape New Orleans and the determined FBI agent who pursues them.

Title: La Belle Noiseuse
Summary: The former famous painter Frenhofer revisits an abandoned project using the girlfriend of a young visiting artist. Questions about truth, life, and artistic limits are explored.

Title: The Colony
Summary: Set in the distant future, a female astronaut, shipwrecked on the long-decimated Earth, must decide the fate of the wasteland's remaining populace.

Title: Pumpkinhead
Summary: After a tragic accident, a man conjures up a towering, vengeful demon called Pumpkinhead to destroy a group of unsuspecting teenagers.

Title: The Humans
Summary: During one evening, the Blake family gathers to celebrate thanksgiving in a broken-down flat newly rented by the daughter and her new man. As the darkness falls, we find that all have less to be thankful about.

Title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
Summary: A captured mustang remains determined to return to his herd no matter what.

Title: Spies Like Us
Summary: Two bumbling government employees think they are U.S. spies, only to discover that they are actually decoys for Nuclear War.

Title: Awake
Summary: A wealthy young man undergoing heart transplant surgery discovers that the surgical team intend to murder him.

Title: Why Did I Get Married?
Summary: The big-screen adaptation of Perry's stage play about the trials of marriage and what happens to one family when a sexy young temptress arrives on the scene.

Title: Marathon Man
Summary: After the shocking murder of his older brother, a New York history student finds himself inexplicably hounded by shadowy government agents on the trail of a Nazi war criminal who is trying to retrieve smuggled diamonds.

Title: Lady Macbeth
Summary: In 19th-century rural England, a young bride who has been sold into marriage discovers an unstoppable desire within herself as she enters into an affair with a worker on her estate.

Title: Detention
Summary: As a copycat killer named after movie villain Cinderhella stalks the student body at Grizzly Lake High School, a group of co-eds band together to survive while serving detention.

Title: Shaolin Soccer
Summary: A young Shaolin follower reunites with his discouraged brothers to form a soccer team using their martial art skills to their advantage.

Title: Blue Ruin
Summary: A mysterious outsider's quiet life is turned upside down when he returns to his childhood home to carry out an act of vengeance. Proving himself an amateur assassin, he winds up in a brutal fight to protect his estranged family.

Title: Alpha
Summary: In the prehistoric past, a young man struggles to return home after being separated from his tribe during a buffalo hunt. He finds a similarly lost wolf companion and starts a friendship that would change humanity.

Title: The Transporter Refueled
Summary: In the south of France, former special-ops mercenary Frank Martin enters into a game of chess with a femme-fatale and her three sidekicks who are looking for revenge against a sinister Russian kingpin.

Title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
Summary: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.

Title: Die Hart
Summary: Kevin Hart - playing a version of himself - is on a death-defying quest to become an action star. And with a little help from John Travolta, Nathalie Emmanuel, and Josh Hartnett - he just might pull it off.

Title: The Wandering Earth
Summary: As the sun is dying out, people all around the world build giant planet thrusters to move Earth out of its orbit and sail Earth to a new star system. Yet the 2500-year journey comes with unexpected dangers, and in order to save humanity, a group of young people in this age of a wandering Earth fight hard for the survival of humankind.

Title: Marley & Me
Summary: A family learns important life lessons from their adorable, but naughty and neurotic dog.

Title: Drive Me Crazy
Summary: Nicole and Chase used to be BFFs, then junior high happened. The high school centennial dance is coming but Nicole gets dumped. So does Chase. They stage a relationship to get at their exes. They visit each other's worlds. Love in the air?

Title: How to Be Single
Summary: A group of young adults navigate love and relationships in New York City.

Title: Invictus
Summary: Nelson Mandela, in his first term as President of South Africa, initiates a unique venture to unite the Apartheid-torn land: enlist the national rugby team on a mission to win the 1995 Rugby World Cup.

Title: About Fate
Summary: The romantic comedy is a tale of two people who believe in love, but seem to never be able to find its true meaning. In a wild twist of events, fate puts each in the other's path on a stormy New Year's Eve and comedy and chaos ensue.

Title: Don't Say a Word
Summary: When the daughter of a psychiatrist is kidnapped, he's horrified to discover that the abductors' demand is that he break through to a post traumatic stress disorder suffering young woman who knows a secret...

Title: The House of Yes
Summary: A mentally unbalanced young woman - who is convinced she is Jackie Kennedy - flies into a murderous rage when her brother returns home to reveal he is engaged.

Title: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar
Summary: Three drag queens travel cross-country until their car breaks down, leaving them stranded in a small town.

Title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
Summary: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

Title: October Sky
Summary: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

Title: Lost Girls and Love Hotels
Summary: Disillusioned with the world she knows, a woman searches for meaning and affirmations of life with a dashing Yakuza gangster in Tokyo.

Title: Oliver!
Summary: After being sold to a mortician, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor in 1830s London.

Title: Parker
Summary: A thief with a unique code of professional ethics is double-crossed by his crew and left for dead. Assuming a new disguise and forming an unlikely alliance with a woman on the inside, he looks to hijack the score of the crew's latest heist.

Title: Crossroads
Summary: A wannabe blues-guitar virtuoso finds an old blues player and hopes he can teach him a long-lost song by legendary musician Robert Johnson.

Title: A Thousand and One
Summary: After unapologetic and fiercely loyal Inez kidnaps her son Terry from the foster care system, mother and son set out to reclaim their sense of home, identity, and stability, in a rapidly changing New York City.

Title: Go
Summary: The aftermath of a drug deal as told from three different points of view.

Title: Sex and the City 2
Summary: While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha for a trip to Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), where Samantha's ex is filming a new movie.

Title: Paycheck
Summary: What seemed like a breezy idea that would net an engineer millions of dollars ends up leaving him on the run for his life and trying to piece together why he's being chased.

Title: Yes Day
Summary: A mom and dad who usually say no decide to say yes to their kids' wildest requests with a few ground rules on a whirlwind day of fun and adventure.

Title: Meatballs
Summary: Wacky hijinks of counselors and campers at a less-than-average summer camp.

Title: Freaks
Summary: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of side-show performers, but his deformed friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.

Title: Señora Influencer
Summary: Fatima becomes one of the most famous influencers of the moment. Cami and Sofi, young influencers, try to take advantage of Fatima's sudden popularity by pretending to be her friends.

Title: Elephant
Summary: Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent.

Title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
Summary: When Sid's attempt to adopt three dinosaur eggs gets him abducted by their real mother to an underground lost world, his friends attempt to rescue him.

Title: Squaring the Circle: The Story of Hipgnosis
Summary: The story of the album art design studio, Hipgnosis, who created some of the most iconic album covers of all time.

Title: Peggy Sue Got Married
Summary: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

Title: The Dark Crystal
Summary: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

Title: Black Book
Summary: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.

Title: Mistress America
Summary: A lonely college freshman's life is turned upside-down by her impetuous, adventurous stepsister-to-be.

Title: Cyborg
Summary: A martial artist hunts a killer in a plague-infested urban dump of the future.

Title: Out of Africa
Summary: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

Title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde
Summary: Elle Woods heads to Washington, D.C. to join the staff of a Representative in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing.

Title: Catwoman
Summary: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

Title: Mallrats
Summary: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

Title: Heartbreakers
Summary: A mother and daughter con team seduce and scam wealthy men.

Title: SAS: Red Notice
Summary: A small army of well trained criminals led by Grace Lewis have hijacked a train deep beneath the English Channel.

Title: Friday After Next
Summary: Working as security guards, Craig and Day-Day run into the thief who stole their Christmas presents.

Title: Married to the Mob
Summary: A mobster's wife hates her lifestyle, but gets a chance to change it when her husband is killed - if the Long Island mob and the FBI let her.

Title: Hearts in Atlantis
Summary: Widowed Liz Garfield and her son Bobby change when mysterious stranger Ted Brautigan enters their lives.

Title: The Dressmaker
Summary: A glamorous woman returns to her small town in rural Australia. With her sewing machine and haute couture style, she transforms the women and exacts sweet revenge on those who did her wrong.

Title: Hobo with a Shotgun
Summary: A homeless vigilante blows away crooked cops, pedophile Santas, and other scumbags with his trusty pump-action shotgun.

Title: The Watchers
Summary: Follows Mina, a 28-year-old artist, as she gets stranded in an extensive, immaculate forest in western Ireland. After finding shelter, she becomes trapped alongside three strangers, stalked by mysterious creatures each night.

Title: Gamer
Summary: In a future mind-controlling game, death row convicts are forced to battle in a 'Doom'-type environment. Convict Kable, controlled by Simon, a skilled teenage gamer, must survive thirty sessions in order to be set free.

Title: A Simple Plan
Summary: Three blue-collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash and make a plan to keep their find from the authorities, but it isn't long before complications and mistrust weave their way into the plan.

Title: The Paperboy
Summary: A reporter returns to his Florida hometown to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.

Title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
Summary: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

Title: Birth
Summary: A young boy attempts to convince a woman that he is her dead husband reborn.

Title: The Squid and the Whale
Summary: Follows two young boys dealing with their parents' divorce in Brooklyn in the 1980s.

Title: Kaithi
Summary: Dilli, an ex-convict, endeavours to meet his daughter for the first time after leaving prison. However, his attempts are interrupted due to a drug raid planned by Inspector Bejoy.

Title: Scanners
Summary: A scientist trains a man with an advanced telepathic ability called "scanning" to stop a dangerous Scanner with extraordinary psychic powers from waging war against non scanners.

Title: Case 39
Summary: A social worker fights to save a girl from her abusive parents, only to discover that the situation is more dangerous than she ever expected.

Title: Tears of the Sun
Summary: A Special-Ops commander leads his team into the Nigerian jungle in order to rescue a doctor who will only join them if they agree to save 70 refugees too.

Title: Poolman
Summary: Follows a hapless dreamer and would-be philosopher who spends his days looking after the pool of the Tahitian Tiki apartment block in sunny LA. When he uncovers the greatest water heist, he does what he can to protect his precious LA.

Title: Frivolous Lola
Summary: Set in the 1950s Italian countryside, the film tells the story of Lola and Masetto, a young couple whose views on premarital sex differ drastically.

Title: Three to Tango
Summary: A rich businessman's assumption that his new colleague is gay leads him to ask the man to keep an eye on his mistress. However, the man is not gay, and begins to fall for the woman himself.

Title: House of Tolerance
Summary: At an elegant Parisian bordello at the dawn of the 20th century exists a cloistered world of pleasure, pain, hope, rivalries--and, most of all, slavery.

Title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
Summary: Jack Ryan, as a young covert C.I.A. analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.

Title: Three Men and a Baby
Summary: Jack Holden and his friends, Peter and Michael, spend most of their time having flings with several women in their apartment. Their life changes when a mysterious baby appears at their doorstep.

Title: Brüno
Summary: Flamboyant, gay Austrian Brüno looks for new fame in America.

Title: Cooties
Summary: A mysterious virus hits an isolated elementary school, transforming the kids into a feral swarm of mass savages. An unlikely hero must lead a motley band of teachers in the fight of their lives.

Title: The Sisters Brothers
Summary: Eli and Charlie Sisters, an infamous duo of gunslinging assassins, chase a gold prospector and his unexpected ally in 1850s Oregon.

Title: Force Majeure
Summary: A family vacationing in the French Alps is confronted with a devastating avalanche.

Title: Il migliore dei mondi
Summary: Ennio Storto suddenly finds himself in an alternative 2023, in which technology has stopped in the 1990s. But what begins as a disastrous event can evolve into an extraordinary adventure, in which Ennio will discover a new side of himself.

Title: 13 Minutes
Summary: Four families in a Heartland town are tested in a single day when a tornado hits, forcing paths to cross and redefining the meaning of survival.

Title: The Voyeur
Summary: A troubled college professor becomes obsessed with the idea that his emotionally distant wife is having an affair with his invalid father.

Title: Miami Vice
Summary: Based on the 1980s TV action/drama, this update focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined.

Title: A Perfect World
Summary: A kidnapped boy strikes up a friendship with his captor, an escaped convict on the run from the law, while the search for him continues.

Title: Going Overboard
Summary: A struggling young comedian takes a menial job on a cruise ship hoping for his big chance to make it in the world of cruise-ship comedy.

Title: The Cat Returns
Summary: After helping a cat, a seventeen-year-old girl finds herself involuntarily engaged to a cat Prince in a magical world where her only hope of freedom lies with a dapper cat statuette come to life.

Title: The Passion of the Christ: Resurrection - Part I
Summary: A sequel to The Passion of the Christ (2004) focuses on the events that occurred three days between the crucifixion and resurrection when Jesus Christ descended to Abraham's Bosom to preach and resurrect Old Testament saints.

Title: Wings of Desire
Summary: An angel tires of his purely ethereal life of merely overseeing the human activity of Berlin's residents, and longs for the tangible joys of physical existence when he falls in love with a mortal.

Title: Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood
Summary: A parody of several U.S. films about being in the 'Hood', for instance Boyz n the Hood (1991), South Central (1992), Menace II Society (1993), Higher Learning (1995) and Juice (1992).

Title: Payback
Summary: After a successful heist, Porter is left for dead. Once he recovers, he seeks vengeance and wants his share of the money.

Title: La Dolce Vita
Summary: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering tabloid journalist living in Rome.

Title: Little Man
Summary: A wannabe-dad mistakes a vertically-challenged criminal on the lam for his newly-adopted son.

Title: Peninsula
Summary: A zombie virus has in the last 4 years spread to all South Korea. 4 Koreans in Hong Kong sail through the blockade to Incheon for USD20,000,000 on a truck.

Title: A Walk in the Clouds
Summary: A married soldier returning from World War II poses as a pregnant woman's husband to save her from her father's anger and honor.

Title: Last Night of Amore
Summary: A police lieutenant named Franco Amore on the night before his retirement is called to investigate a crime scene where his best friend and long-time partner Dino has been killed during a diamond heist.

Title: Armageddon Time
Summary: A deeply personal coming-of-age story about the strength of family and the generational pursuit of the American Dream.

Title: Near Dark
Summary: A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is bitten by a beautiful drifter.

Title: The Hand of God
Summary: In 1980s Naples, young Fabietto pursues his love for football as family tragedy strikes, shaping his uncertain but promising future as a filmmaker.

Title: A Night in the Life of Jimmy Reardon
Summary: A charming womanizer must find a way to get $80 to elope to Hawaii with his one true love, or else go to his father's chosen business school.

Title: Incantation
Summary: Six years ago, Li Ronan was cursed after breaking a religious taboo. Now, she must protect her daughter from the consequences of her actions.

Title: The Vault
Summary: Follows a genius engineering graduate who is interested in the Bank of Spain's safe.

Title: Theseus
Summary: The epic mythical adventure of the ancient Greek hero Theseus.

Title: Another Body
Summary: "Another Body" follows a college student's search for justice after she discovers deepfake pornography of herself circulating online.

Title: Grosse Pointe Blank
Summary: Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

Title: In the Electric Mist
Summary: A detective in post-Katrina New Orleans has a series of surreal encounters with a troop of ghostly Confederate soldiers while investigating serial killings of local prostitutes, a 1965 lynching, and corrupt local businessmen.

Title: PK
Summary: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of religious views on people.

Title: Dracula 2000
Summary: A group of thieves breaks into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.

Title: Bringing Out the Dead
Summary: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, a monumentally burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three increasingly turbulent nights.

Title: Mile 22
Summary: A small team of elite American intelligence officers, part of a top-secret tactical command unit, try to smuggle a mysterious police officer with sensitive information out of Indonesia.

Title: Godmothered
Summary: An unskilled young fairy godmother ventures out on her own to prove her worth by tracking down a young girl whose request for help was ignored.

Title: Hotel Artemis
Summary: Set in riot-torn, near-future Los Angeles, 'Hotel Artemis' follows the Nurse, who runs a secret, members-only emergency room for criminals.

Title: Annabelle Comes Home
Summary: While babysitting the daughter of Ed and Lorraine Warren, a teenager and her friend unknowingly awaken an evil spirit trapped in a doll.

Title: Hard Feelings
Summary: Two best friends try to make it through high school while dealing with embarrassing new urges and their very inconvenient feelings for each other.

Title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
Summary: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last canister of the ooze that created the Turtles, with which Shredder wants to unleash an army of new mutants.

Title: The Crow
Summary: A modern re-imagining of the beloved character, The Crow, based on the original graphic novel by James O'Barr.

Title: The Inbetweeners
Summary: Four socially troubled 18-year-olds from the south of England go on holiday to Malia.

Title: An American Tail
Summary: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

Title: Ladyhawke
Summary: The thief Gaston escapes the dungeon of medieval Aquila through the latrine. Soldiers are about to kill him when Navarre saves him. Navarre, traveling with his spirited hawk, plans to kill the bishop of Aquila with help from Gaston.

Title: Run Rabbit Run
Summary: Sarah Snook plays a fertility doctor who believes firmly in life and death, but after noticing the strange behavior of her young daughter, she must challenge her own values and confront a ghost from her past.

Title: Battlefield Earth
Summary: It's the year 3000 A.D., and the Earth is lost to the alien race of Psychlos. Humanity is enslaved by these gold-thirsty tyrants, who are unaware that their 'man-animals' are about to ignite the rebellion of a lifetime.

Title: Saving Silverman
Summary: A pair of buddies conspire to save their best friend from marrying the wrong woman.

Title: Along Came Polly
Summary: A buttoned-up newlywed finds his strictly organized life descend into chaos when he falls in love with an old classmate.

Title: Nikita
Summary: Convicted felon Nikita isn't going to jail; she's given a new identity and trained, stylishly, as a top secret spy/assassin.

Title: Breach
Summary: FBI upstart Eric O'Neill enters into a power game with his boss, Robert Hanssen, an agent who was put on trial for selling secrets to the Soviet Union.

Title: The Good Shepherd
Summary: The tumultuous early history of the Central Intelligence Agency is viewed through the prism of one man's life.

Title: In the Heat of the Night
Summary: A black Philadelphia police detective is mistakenly suspected of a local murder while passing through a racially hostile Mississippi town, and after being cleared is reluctantly asked by the police chief to investigate the case.

Title: Against All Odds
Summary: A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.

Title: A Brilliant Young Mind
Summary: A socially awkward teenage maths prodigy finds new confidence and new friendships when he lands a spot on the British squad at the International Mathematics Olympiad.

Title: We Can Be Heroes
Summary: When alien invaders capture the Earth's superheroes, their kids must learn to work together to save their parents and the planet.

Title: Short Cuts
Summary: The day-to-day lives of several suburban Los Angeles residents.

Title: Walk of Shame
Summary: A reporter's dream of becoming a news anchor is compromised after a one-night stand leaves her stranded in downtown L.A. without a phone, car, ID or money - and only 8 hours to make it to the most important job interview of her life.

Title: Occupied City
Summary: The past collides with the present in this excavation of the Nazi occupation of Amsterdam: a journey from World War II to recent years of pandemic and protest and a provocative, life-affirming reflection on memory, time and what's to come.

Title: Nothing Like the Holidays
Summary: A Puerto Rican family living in the area of Humboldt Park in west Chicago face what may be their last Christmas together.

Title: Filth
Summary: A corrupt, junkie cop with bipolar disorder attempts to manipulate his way through a promotion in order to win back his wife and daughter while also fighting his own inner demons.

Title: Dead for a Dollar
Summary: A famed bounty hunter runs into his sworn enemy, a professional gambler and outlaw that he had sent to prison years before.

Title: Three Kings
Summary: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

Title: Delicatessen
Summary: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.

Title: Mirage
Summary: Two storms separated by 25 years. A woman murdered. A daughter missed. Only 72 hours to discover the truth.

Title: On the Basis of Sex
Summary: The true story of Ruth Bader Ginsburg, her struggles for equal rights, and the early cases of a historic career that lead to her nomination and confirmation as U.S. Supreme Court Associate Justice.

Title: Home for Rent
Summary: A film inspired by terrifying true events. When the tenants are members of a dark cult, they terrorize the homeowner, looking for their next prey to sacrifice.

Title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers
Summary: A giant egg is unearthed at a construction site and soon opened, releasing the terrible Ivan Ooze, who wreaks vengeance on Zordon for imprisoning him millennia ago. With Zordon dying and their powers lost, the Rangers head to a distant planet to find the mystic warrior Dulcea.

Title: White Mischief
Summary: In 1940s Kenya, a married couple join other affluent British expatriates in a lifestyle of recklessness and excess, but soon find themselves in a troubling situation.

Title: The Next Karate Kid
Summary: Mr. Miyagi is back and he takes a new pupil under his wing: a troubled adolescent girl.

Title: Knuckle Girl
Summary: A promising female boxer risks her life to rescue her sister from a criminal underworld gang.

Title: Incident in a Ghostland
Summary: A mother of two who inherits a house is confronted with murderous intruders on the first night in their new home and fights for her daughters' lives. Sixteen years later when the daughters reunite at the house, things get really strange.

Title: Frankenstein
Summary: Dr. Pretorious, who needs to track down Frankenstein's monster who is believed to have died in a fire forty years before in order to continue the experiments of Dr. Frankenstein.

Title: Seven Pounds
Summary: A man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.

Title: Home
Summary: An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.

Title: Swiss Family Robinson
Summary: A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.

Title: Rob Roy
Summary: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

Title: Me Time
Summary: When a stay-at-home dad who dedicates all his time to his children is persuaded to take time off for himself, he gets mixed up in the wild shenanigans of his childhood friend who's celebrating his 44th birthday.

Title: August Rush
Summary: An orphaned musical prodigy uses his gift to try to find his birth parents.

Title: In & Out
Summary: A midwestern teacher questions his sexuality after a former student makes a comment about him at the Academy Awards.

Title: Almost Heroes
Summary: Two bumbling explorers hope to beat Lewis & Clarke to the Pacific Ocean as they race across America's western frontier in the early 1800's.

Title: Nerve
Summary: A high school senior finds herself immersed in an online game of truth or dare, where her every move starts to become manipulated by an anonymous community of "watchers."

Title: Modi
Summary: The Italian-born painter and sculptor Amedeo Modigliani, considered a commercial failure, navigates a turbulent and eventful 48 hours that will become a turning point in his life, solidifying his reputation as an artistic legend.

Title: The Last Emperor
Summary: Bernardo Bertolucci's Oscar-winning dramatisation of the life story of China's last emperor, Pu Yi.

Title: Jawbreaker
Summary: Three of the most popular girls at Reagan High accidentally kill the prom queen with a jawbreaker when a kidnapping goes horribly wrong.

Title: Father of the Bride
Summary: A father's coming to grips with his daughter's upcoming wedding through the prism of multiple relationships within a big, sprawling Cuban-American clan.

Title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
Summary: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

Title: Now and Then
Summary: Four 12-year-old girls grow up together during an eventful small-town summer in 1970.

Title: Cargo
Summary: After an epidemic spreads all over Australia, a father searches for someone willing to protect his daughter.

Title: Horrible Bosses 2
Summary: Dale, Kurt and Nick decide to start their own business but things don't go as planned because of a slick investor, prompting the trio to pull off a harebrained and misguided kidnapping scheme.

Title: La Chimera
Summary: A group of archaeologists and the black market of historical artifacts.

Title: A Wrinkle in Time
Summary: After the disappearance of her scientist father, three peculiar beings send Meg, her brother, and her friend to space in order to find him.

Title: Around the World in 80 Days
Summary: To win a bet, an eccentric British inventor embarks, with his Chinese valet and an aspiring French artist, on a trip full of adventures and dangers around the world in exactly 80 days.

Title: It Comes at Night
Summary: Secure within a desolate home as an unnatural threat terrorizes the world, a man has established a tenuous domestic order with his wife and son. Then a desperate young family arrives seeking refuge.

Title: Take Shelter
Summary: Plagued by a series of apocalyptic visions, a young husband and father questions whether to shelter his family from a coming storm, or from himself.

Title: Hall Pass
Summary: Rick and Fred, two husbands who are having difficulty in their marriages, are given a Hall Pass by their wives: for one week, they can do whatever they want.

Title: A Christmas Horror Story
Summary: Interwoven stories that take place on Christmas Eve, as told by one festive radio host: A family brings home more than a Christmas tree, a student documentary becomes a living nightmare, a Christmas spirit terrorizes, Santa slays evil.

Title: Tie Me Up! Tie Me Down!
Summary: An unbalanced but alluring former mental patient takes a porn star prisoner in the hopes of convincing her to marry him.

Title: Starsky & Hutch
Summary: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear".

Title: Pinocchio
Summary: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

Title: Kelly's Heroes
Summary: A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

Title: Meet the Spartans
Summary: A spoof of 300 (2006) and many other movies, TV series/shows/commercials, video games and celebrities. King Leonidas of Sparta and his army of 12 go to war against Xerxes of Persia to fight to the death for Sparta's freedom.

Title: All Dogs Go to Heaven
Summary: A canine angel, Charlie, sneaks back to earth from heaven but ends up befriending an orphan girl who can speak to animals. In the process, Charlie learns that friendship is the most heavenly gift of all.

Title: Superman III
Summary: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

Title: The Young Victoria
Summary: A dramatization of the turbulent first years of Queen Victoria's rule, and her enduring romance with Prince Albert.

Title: Boy Erased
Summary: The son of a Baptist preacher unwillingly participates in a church-supported gay conversion program after being forcibly outed to his parents.

Title: Anatomy of a Murder
Summary: An upstate Michigan lawyer defends a soldier who claims he killed an innkeeper due to temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?

Title: Shattered
Summary: A rich divorcee Chris falls in love with a mysterious woman Sky where Chris, ex-wife and his child eventually gets trapped and a desperate fight for survival will most likely ensue.

Title: Leave No Trace
Summary: A father and his seventeen-year-old daughter are living an ideal existence in a vast urban park in Portland, Oregon when a small mistake derails their lives forever.

Title: Private School
Summary: Chris from a girls' boarding school loves Jim from a nearby boys' boarding school. Jordan also wants Jim and plays dirty. Jim and two friends visit the girls' school posing as girls.

Title: Masterminds
Summary: A guard at an armored car company in the Southern U.S. organizes one of the biggest bank heists in American history. Based on the October 1997 Loomis Fargo robbery.

Title: Come Undone
Summary: One day at a colleague's going away party, Anna meets Domenico, a virile, slightly older chap who's married with two small kids. Passion's flames are rapidly kindled and result in steamy encounters.

Title: The Witches of Eastwick
Summary: Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.

Title: Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers
Summary: Thirty years after their popular television show ended, chipmunks Chip and Dale live very different lives. When a cast member from the original series mysteriously disappears, the pair must reunite to save their friend.

Title: The Social Dilemma
Summary: Explores the dangerous human impact of social networking; tech experts sound the alarm on their own creations.

Title: The Alpinist
Summary: Marc-André Leclerc climbs alone, far from the limelight. The free-spirited 23-year-old makes some of the boldest solo ascents in history. With no cameras and no margin for error, Leclerc's approach is the essence of solo adventure.

Title: Finding Neverland
Summary: The story of Sir J.M. Barrie's friendship with a family who inspired him to create Peter Pan.

Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
Summary: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

Title: Winnie the Pooh: Blood and Honey
Summary: After Christopher Robin abandons them for college, Pooh and Piglet embark on a bloody rampage as they search for a new source of food.

Title: Red, White & Royal Blue
Summary: When the feud between the son of the American President and Britain's prince threatens to drive a wedge in U.S./British relations, the two are forced into a staged truce that sparks something deeper.

Title: Zodiac
Summary: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

Title: She Came to Me
Summary: A composer who suffers writer's block rediscovers his passion after an adventurous one-night stand.

Title: The Martian
Summary: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.

Title: Encanto
Summary: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

Title: Fred Claus
Summary: Fred Claus, Santa's bitter older brother, is forced to move to the North Pole to help Santa and the elves prepare for Christmas in exchange for cash.

Title: Planet of the Apes
Summary: In 2029, an Air Force astronaut crash-lands on a mysterious planet where evolved, talking apes dominate a race of primitive humans.

Title: Nymphomaniac: Vol. I
Summary: A self-diagnosed nymphomaniac recounts her erotic experiences to the man who saved her after a beating.

Title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
Summary: A popular high school student, admired by his peers, decides to take a day off from school and goes to extreme lengths to pull it off, to the chagrin of his Principal, who'll do anything to stop him.

Title: Retribution
Summary: A bank executive receives a bomb threat while driving his children to school that his car will explode if they stop and get out.

Title: The Irishman
Summary: An illustration of Frank Sheeran's life, from W.W.II veteran to hit-man for the Bufalino crime family and his alleged assassination of his close friend Jimmy Hoffa.

Title: Fool's Paradise
Summary: A fool for love becomes an accidental celebrity only to lose it all.

Title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
Summary: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs and rock n' roll.

Title: Memento
Summary: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

Title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
Summary: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

Title: La La Land
Summary: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

Title: All Quiet on the Western Front
Summary: A young German soldier's terrifying experiences and distress on the western front during World War I.

Title: The Green Mile
Summary: A tale set on death row in a Southern jail, where gentle giant John possesses the mysterious power to heal people's ailments. When the lead guard, Paul, recognizes John's gift, he tries to help stave off the condemned man's execution.

Title: Napoleon Dynamite
Summary: A listless and alienated teenager decides to help his new friend win the class presidency in their small western high school, while he must deal with his bizarre family life back home.

Title: Malena
Summary: Amidst the war climate, a teenage boy discovering himself becomes love-stricken by Malèna, a sensual woman living in a small, narrow-minded Italian town.

Title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
Summary: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

Title: Candy Cane Lane
Summary: A man is determined to win the neighborhood's annual Christmas decorating contest. He makes a pact with an elf to help him win--and the elf casts a spell that brings the 12 days of Christmas to life, which brings unexpected chaos to town.

Title: 13 Hours
Summary: During an attack on a U.S. compound in Libya, a security team struggles to make sense out of the chaos.

Title: Beetlejuice
Summary: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.

Title: Aquaman
Summary: Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land.

Title: Apocalypse Now
Summary: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

Title: Red Sparrow
Summary: Ballerina Dominika Egorova is recruited to 'Sparrow School,' a Russian intelligence service where she is forced to use her body as a weapon. Her first mission, targeting a C.I.A. agent, threatens to unravel the security of both nations.

Title: Margin Call
Summary: Follows the key people at an investment bank over a 24-hour period during the early stages of the 2008 financial crisis.

Title: The Dreamers
Summary: A young American studying in Paris in 1968 strikes up a friendship with a French brother and sister. Set against the background of the '68 Paris student riots.

Title: Grease
Summary: Good girl Sandy Olsson and greaser Danny Zuko fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

Title: The Truman Show
Summary: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

Title: Beverly Hills Cop
Summary: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

Title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
Summary: A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

Title: Fall
Summary: When a high-rise climb goes wrong, best friends Becky and Hunter find themselves stuck at the top of a 2,000-foot TV tower.

Title: The Great Indian Family
Summary: Ved Vyas Tripathi, aka Bhajan Kumar, is a devout Hindu man who faces an identity crisis and a personal dilemma when he discovers he is actually a Muslim by birth.

Title: Come and See
Summary: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

Title: Casino Royale
Summary: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.

Title: Plane
Summary: A pilot finds himself caught in a war zone after he's forced to land his commercial aircraft during a terrible storm.

Title: The Breakfast Club
Summary: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a great deal more in common than they thought.

Title: Hook
Summary: When Captain James Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

Title: Arrival
Summary: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

Title: After Everything
Summary: After breaking up with his true love, best-selling author Hardin Scott travels to Portugal in an attempt to make amends for his past behavior.

Title: City of God
Summary: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

Title: Rocky
Summary: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

Title: Ford v Ferrari
Summary: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

Title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
Summary: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

Title: The Thing
Summary: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

Title: The Emoji Movie
Summary: Gene, a multi-expressional emoji, sets out on a journey to become a normal emoji.

Title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
Summary: The Kadam family leaves India for France where they open a restaurant directly across the road from Madame Mallory's Michelin-starred eatery.

Title: The Train
Summary: In 1944, a German colonel loads a train with French art treasures to send to Germany. The Resistance must stop it without damaging the cargo.
Director: Arthur Penn,John Frankenheimer,Arthur Penn(fired afer a few days work due to creative differences) (uncredited)

Title: Takers
Summary: A group of bank robbers find their multi-million dollar plan interrupted by a hard-boiled detective.

Title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
Summary: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

Title: Vacancy
Summary: A married couple becomes stranded at an isolated motel and finds hidden video cameras in their room. They soon realize that unless they escape, they'll be the next victims of a snuff film.

Title: Eye in the Sky
Summary: Col. Katherine Powell, a military officer in command of an operation to capture terrorists in Kenya, sees her mission escalate when a girl enters the kill zone triggering an international dispute over the implications of modern warfare.

Title: Dead Man
Summary: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange aboriginal American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

Title: High-Rise
Summary: Life for the residents of a tower block begins to run out of control.

Title: Doomsday
Summary: A futuristic action thriller where a team of people work to prevent a disaster threatening the future of the human race.

Title: Problem Child
Summary: A young boy just short of a monster is adopted by a loving man and his wacky wife. The laughs keep coming as the boy pushes them to the limits.

Title: My Bloody Valentine
Summary: Tom returns to his hometown on the tenth anniversary of the Valentine's night massacre that claimed the lives of 22 people. Instead of a homecoming, Tom finds himself suspected of committing the murders, and it seems like his old flame is the only one that believes he's innocent.

Title: Spy Kids 4: All the Time in the World
Summary: A retired spy is called back into action, and to bond with her new step-children, she invites them along for the adventure to stop the evil Timekeeper from taking over the world.

Title: Mob Land
Summary: A sheriff tries to keep the peace when a desperate family man violently robs a pill mill with his brother-in-law, alerting an enforcer for the New Orleans mafia.

Title: Words on Bathroom Walls
Summary: Diagnosed with a mental illness halfway through his senior year of high school, a witty, introspective teen struggles to keep it a secret while falling in love with a brilliant classmate who inspires him to not be defined by his condition.

Title: Disaster Movie
Summary: Over the course of one evening, an unsuspecting group of twenty-somethings find themselves bombarded by a series of natural disasters and catastrophic events.

Title: The Princess Switch: Switched Again
Summary: When Duchess Margaret unexpectedly inherits the throne to Montenaro and hits a rough patch with Kevin, it's up to her double Stacy to save the day before a new lookalike, party girl Fiona foils their plans.

Title: Stop Making Sense
Summary: Considered by critics as the greatest concert film of all time, the live performance was shot over the course of three nights at Hollywood's Pantages Theater in December of 1983 and features Talking Heads' most memorable songs.

Title: The Hudsucker Proxy
Summary: A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

Title: The Breach
Summary: Counting down his last days as Chief of Police in the tiny town of Lone Crow, John Hawkins must investigate one last case when a mangled body with uncanny wounds washes up on the shores of the Porcupine River.

Title: Glory Road
Summary: In 1966, Texas Western coach Don Haskins led the first all-black starting line-up for a college basketball team to the NCAA national championship.

Title: Magic Mike XXL
Summary: Three years after Mike bowed out of the stripper life at the top of his game, he and the remaining Kings of Tampa hit the road to Myrtle Beach to put on one last blow-out performance.

Title: Bridget Jones's Baby
Summary: Forty-something and single again, Bridget decides to focus on her job and surround herself with friends. Then she discovers that she is pregnant--but she is only 50% sure of the baby's father's identity.

Title: The Big Sick
Summary: Pakistan-born comedian Kumail Nanjiani and grad student Emily Gardner fall in love but struggle as their cultures clash. When Emily contracts a mysterious illness, Kumail finds himself forced to face her feisty parents, his family's expectations, and his true feelings.

Title: The Magic Flute
Summary: Follows 17-year-old Tim Walker as he travels from London to the Austrian Alps to attend the legendary Mozart boarding school. There, he discovers a centuries-old forgotten passageway into the fantastic world of Mozart's "The Magic Flute."

Title: Wild Orchid
Summary: A female lawyer becomes mesmerized by a self-made millionaire during an encounter in Rio setting off a series of erotic encounters.

Title: Final Destination 5
Summary: Death returns to claim the lucky survivors of a deadly bridge collapse in this fifth frightening installment in the series.

Title: Hot Dog... The Movie
Summary: Harkin Banks heads to skiing championships in California. A teen runaway tags along as he parties and competes with friends and foes.

Title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
Summary: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widowed mother and her daughters add a new stunt to bolster their seance scam business by inviting an evil presence into their home, not realizing how dangerous it is.

Title: An Education
Summary: A coming-of-age story about a teenage girl in 1960s suburban London, and how her life changes with the arrival of a playboy nearly twice her age.

Title: Underworld: Evolution
Summary: Picking up directly from the previous movie, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

Title: RV
Summary: Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they must ultimately contend with a bizarre community of campers.

Title: Dumplin'
Summary: Willowdean ('Dumplin'), the plus-size teenage daughter of a former beauty queen, signs up for her mom's Miss Teen Bluebonnet pageant as a protest that escalates when other contestants follow her footsteps, revolutionizing the pageant and their small Texas town.

Title: My Name Is Khan
Summary: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President of the United States seriously and embarks on a cross-country journey.

Title: What a Girl Wants
Summary: An American teenager learns that her father is a wealthy British politician running for office. Although she is eager to find him, she realizes it could cause a scandal and cost him the election.

Title: Bill & Ted Face the Music
Summary: Once told they'd save the universe during a time-traveling adventure, two would-be rockers from San Dimas, California find themselves as middle-aged dads still trying to crank out a hit song and fulfill their destiny.

Title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
Summary: When it becomes clear that his solo album is a failure, a former boy band member does everything in his power to maintain his celebrity status.

Title: Belle
Summary: Suzu is a shy high school student living in a rural village. For years, she has only been a shadow of herself. But when she enters "U", a massive virtual world, she escapes into her online persona as Belle, a globally-beloved singer.

Title: American Assassin
Summary: After the death of his girlfriend at the hands of terrorists, Mitch Rapp is drawn into the world of counterterrorism, mentored by tough-as-nails former U.S. Navy S.E.A.L. Stan Hurley.

Title: Pig Killer
Summary: Inspired by the terrifying story of Robert "Willy" Pickton, the pig farmer and prolific killer of women whose horrific crimes shocked the world.

Title: DOA: Dead or Alive
Summary: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, an invitational martial arts contest. There, four female rival fighters will have to work together to uncover the secret that the organizer of the tournament is trying to hide.

Title: About Schmidt
Summary: A recently retired man embarks on a journey to his estranged daughter's wedding, only to discover more about himself and life than he ever expected.

Title: Jaws 2
Summary: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

Title: Critters
Summary: A group of small but vicious alien creatures called Crites escape from an alien prison transport vessel and land near a small farm town on earth, pursued by two shape-shifting bounty hunters.

Title: American Wedding
Summary: It's the wedding of Jim and Michelle and the gathering of their families and friends, including Jim's old friends from high school and Michelle's little sister.

Title: Daybreakers
Summary: In the year 2019, a plague has transformed almost every human into vampires. Faced with a dwindling blood supply, the fractured dominant race plots their survival; meanwhile, a researcher works with a covert band of vamps on a way to save humankind.

Title: If I Stay
Summary: Life changes in an instant for young Mia Hall after a car accident puts her in a coma. During an out-of-body experience, she must decide whether to wake up and live a life far different than she had imagined. The choice is hers if she can go on.

Title: The Italian Job
Summary: A comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.

Title: True Grit
Summary: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian Territory.

Title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
Summary: An average aquarium cleaner house-sits for a gigolo, only to be forced to become one himself.

Title: Sherlock Gnomes
Summary: Garden gnomes, Gnomeo (James McAvoy) and Juliet (Emily Blunt), recruit renowned detective Sherlock Gnomes (Johnny Depp) to investigate the mysterious disappearance of other garden ornaments.

Title: Capote
Summary: In 1959, Truman Capote learns of the murder of a Kansas family and decides to write a book about the case. While researching for his novel In Cold Blood, Capote forms a relationship with one of the killers, Perry Smith, who is on death row.

Title: Volcano
Summary: A volcano erupts in downtown Los Angeles and a city official and a seismologist try to stop its inevitable flow through the city.

Title: Harlem Nights
Summary: During the 1930s, a New York City illegal gambling house owner and his associates must deal with strong competition, gangsters, and corrupt cops in order to stay in business.

Title: The Finest Hours
Summary: The Coast Guard makes a daring rescue attempt off the coast of Cape Cod after a pair of oil tankers are destroyed during a blizzard in 1952.

Title: Pat and Mike
