Title: Munchie
Summary: In this in-name-only sequel to Munchies (1987), a new kid in town, Gage Dobson, can't find his place in the new environment despite having such a cool name. The kids at school bully him, the girl he likes and his mom is about to marry a scoundrel. Everything changes for Gage Dobson when he stumbles into Munchie, a friendly gremlin-like creature that dresses like a lou... Read all

Title: Chain Reaction
Summary: Two researchers in a green alternative energy project are put on the run when they are framed for murder and treason.

Title: My Octopus Teacher
Summary: A filmmaker forges an unusual friendship with an octopus living in a South African kelp forest, learning as the animal shares the mysteries of her world.

Title: Antwone Fisher
Summary: Antwone Fisher, a young navy man, is forced to see a psychiatrist after a violent outburst against a fellow crewman. During the course of treatment a painful past is revealed and a new hope begins.

Title: Lady and the Tramp
Summary: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

Title: Beaches
Summary: A privileged rich debutante and a cynical struggling entertainer share a turbulent, but strong childhood friendship over the years.

Title: High Crimes
Summary: A successful criminal defense lawyer's husband is arrested for murdering 9 villagers in El Salvador in 1988 as US Marine under a different name. She defends him in military court and investigates. Framed?

Summary: Jon and Garfield visit the United Kingdom, where a case of mistaken cat identity finds Garfield ruling over a castle. His reign is soon jeopardized by the nefarious Lord Dargis, who has designs on the estate.

Title: Monte Carlo
Summary: Three young women vacationing in Paris find themselves whisked away to Monte Carlo after one of the girls is mistaken for a British heiress.

Title: Wander
Summary: After getting hired to probe a suspicious death in the small town of Wander, a mentally unstable private investigator becomes convinced the case is linked to the same 'conspiracy cover up' that caused the death of his daughter.

Title: The Tale
Summary: A woman filming a documentary on childhood rape victims starts to question the nature of her childhood relationship with her riding instructor and running coach.

Title: Open Season

Title: The Eternal Memory
Summary: Augusto and Paulina have been together for 25 years. Eight years ago, he was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease. Both fear the day he no longer recognizes her.

Title: Abominable
Summary: Three teenagers must help a Yeti return to his family while avoiding a wealthy man and a zoologist who want him for their own needs.

Title: Analyze This

Summary: During the reign of the Vikings, Kainan, a man from a far-off world, crash lands on Earth, bringing with him an alien predator known as the Moorwen. Title: F/X
Summary: A movie special effects man is hired to fake a real-life mob killing for a witness protection plan, but finds his own life in danger.

Title: Idle Hands
Summary: A teenage slacker's right hand becomes possessed with murderous intent.

Title: Resurrection
Summary: Margaret's life is in order. She is capable, disciplined and successful. Everything is under control until David returns - that is - carrying with him the horrors of Margaret's past.

Title: Selena
Summary: The true story of Selena, a Texas-born Tejano singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart-topping albums on the Latin music charts.

Title: The Half of It
Summary: When smart but cash-strapped teen Ellie Chu agrees to write a love letter for a jock, she doesn't expect to become his friend - or fall for his crush.

Title: Driving Miss Daisy
Summary: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

Title: Pride
Summary: U.K. gay activists work to help miners during their lengthy strike of the National Union of Mineworkers in the summer of 1984.

Title: One Magic Christmas
Summary: An angel must show a mother the true meaning of Christmas. It's not just presents and materialistic things, but the people she cares about.

Title: Brubaker
Summary: The new warden of a small prison farm in Arkansas tries to clean it up of corruption after initially posing as an inmate.

Title: Wildcat
Summary: Follows the life of writer Flannery O'Connor while she was struggling to publish her first novel.

Title: Break In
Summary: A woman recently separated from her wealthy husband is terrorized during one harrowing night when a masked intruder breaks into her home. Is it a random home invasion or is something more malicious and personal going on?

Title: Lionheart
Summary: An Ex-French Soldier begins participating in underground street fights in order to make money for his brother's family.

Title: 15 Cameras
Summary: When Cam and Sky bought their two-family home, it seemed like the perfect investment opportunity for the young couple: a house to start with, a mortgage offset by renters, and even a guest room.

Title: Bed Rest
Summary: A pregnant woman on bed rest begins to wonder if her house is haunted or it's all in her head.

Title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
Summary: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.

Title: Farewell My Concubine

Title: Out of the Past
Summary: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses, and duplicitous dames.

Title: Trance
Summary: An art auctioneer becomes mixed up with a group of criminals partners with a hypnotherapist in order to recover a lost painting.

Title: I Am Wrath
Summary: Stanley Hill opens a can of brutal vengeance on the thugs who murdered his wife and the corrupt cops who are protecting them.

Title: The Whole Truth
Summary: A defense attorney works to get his teenage client acquitted of murdering his wealthy father.

Title: The Sword in the Stone
Summary: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.
Director: Clyde Geronimi(earlier film clips) (uncredited),David Hand(earlier film clips) (uncredited),David Hand,Clyde Geronimi,Wolfgang Reitherman

Title: Birthright Outlaw
Summary: A daughter kidnapped. A hidden past revealed. A seemingly futile chance at rescue. Now, Rev. Jeremiah Jacobs and his wife Martha must overcome the lies of the past to find their Hope for the future.

Title: Balls of Fury
Summary: Down-and-out former professional ping-pong phenom, Randy Daytona, is sucked into a maelstrom when FBI Agent Ernie Rodriguez recruits him for a secret mission. Randy is determined to bounce back and win, and to smoke out his father's killer -- arch-fiend Feng.

Title: Whip It
Summary: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock-loving misfit finds a way of dealing with small-town misery after discovering a roller-derby league in nearby Austin.

Summary: Follows Orion, a young boy who is afraid of heights, pets, and rendered nearly catatonic by the worst of all perils: the dark. The Dark takes Orion on a nighttime trip to prove to the youngster that the only thing to fear is fear itself.

Title: Boiler Room
Summary: A college dropout, attempting to live up to his father's high standards, gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm which puts him on the fast track to success. But the job might not be as legitimate as it first appeared to be.

Title: The Girl with All the Gifts
Summary: A scientist and a teacher living in a dystopian future embark on a journey of survival with a special young girl named Melanie.

Title: Bang Gang: A Modern Love Story
Summary: In the well-to-do suburbs of a small town, a group of pretty average, well-adjusted sixteen and seventeen year olds are ordinary adolescents who take a singular path.

Title: The Company You Keep
Summary: After a journalist discovers his identity, a former Weather Underground activist goes on the run.

Title: Something Borrowed
Summary: Friendships are tested and secrets come to the surface when terminally single Rachel falls for Dex, her best friend Darcy's fiancé.

Title: Moby Dick
Summary: The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.

Title: The Burnt Orange Heresy
Summary: Hired to procure a rare painting from one of the most enigmatic painters of all time, an ambitious art scholar becomes consumed by his own greed and insecurity as the operation spins out of control.

Title: Black Sheep
Summary: A gubernatorial candidate hires a wormy special assistant whose only job is to make sure the candidate's well-meaning but incompetent brother doesn't ruin the election.

Title: Arsenic and Old Lace
Summary: A Brooklyn writer of books on the futility of marriage risks his reputation after he decides to tie the knot. Things get even more complicated when he learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are habitual murderers.

Title: Wild Card
Summary: When a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal skills and a gambling problem gets in trouble with the mob, he has one last play...and it's all or nothing.

Title: Freddy Got Fingered
Summary: An unemployed cartoonist moves back in with his parents and younger brother Freddy. When his parents demand he leave, he begins to spread rumors that his father is sexually abusing Freddy.

Title: The Producers
Summary: A stage-play producer devises a plan to make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

Title: The Last Descent
Summary: After entering an unexplored cave, John Jones gets stuck in a 150-foot-deep hole.

Title: Police State
Summary: There is nowhere to hide. They have their lists. Are you next?

Title: The Snowtown Murders
Summary: Based on true events, 16 year-old Jamie falls in with his mother's new boyfriend and his crowd of self-appointed neighborhood watchmen, a relationship that leads to a spree of torture and murder.

Title: Hollywood Homicide
Summary: Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.

Title: To Sir, with Love
Summary: Idealistic engineer-trainee and his experiences in teaching a group of rambunctious white high school students from the slums of London's East End.

Title: The Tutor
Summary: A tutor is being assigned an unexpected task at a mansion and finds himself struggling with the obsessions of his student, who threatens to expose his darkest secrets.

Title: Get Over It
Summary: A high school senior's girlfriend breaks up with him. His friends try to make him think of something else. His friend's sister Kelly helps him with the school musical. Spending time with Kelly has an effect.

Title: Of an Age
Summary: In the summer of 1999, a 17-year-old Serbian-born Australian amateur ballroom dancer experiences an unexpected and intense 24-hour romance with a friend's older brother.

Title: Seduction
Summary: Giuseppe commits to love a woman he hasn't seen in 15 years, amid dangers of seduction from her daughter.

Title: Clip
Summary: In the face of her family life falling to pieces, a social-media-obsessed teenage girl falls into a hedonistic world of sex, drugs, and abuse.

Title: The Canyons
Summary: When Christian, an LA trust-fund kid with casual ties to Hollywood, learns of a secret affair between Tara and the lead of his film project, Ryan, he spirals out of control, and his cruel mind games escalate into an act of bloody violence.

Title: Safety Not Guaranteed
Summary: Three magazine employees head out on an assignment to interview a guy who placed a classified advertisement seeking a companion for time travel.

Title: Timecrimes
Summary: A man accidentally gets into a time machine and travels back in time nearly an hour. Finding himself will be the first of a series of disasters of unforeseeable consequences.

Title: The Year of Living Dangerously
Summary: A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.

Title: 20th Century Women
Summary: The story of a teenage boy, his mother, and two other women who help raise him among the love and freedom of Southern California of 1979.

Title: The Mosquito Coast
Summary: An inventor spurns his city life and moves his family into the jungles of Central America to make a utopia.

Title: The Beverly Hillbillies
Summary: Nice guy redneck Jed Clampett strikes it rich when he finds black oil. He and his kin move to posh Beverly Hills.

Title: Earthquake
Summary: Various interconnected people struggle to survive when an earthquake of unimaginable magnitude hits Los Angeles, California.

Title: Secret Headquarters
Summary: While hanging out after school, Charlie and his friends discover the headquarters of the world's most powerful superhero hidden beneath his home. When villains attack, they must team up to defend the headquarters and save the world.

Title: Far and Away
Summary: A young Irish couple flee to the States, but subsequently struggle to obtain land and prosper freely.

Title: Star Trek: Nemesis
Summary: The Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan homeworld Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a peace treaty. Captain Picard and his crew discover a serious threat to the Federation once Praetor Shinzon plans to attack Earth.

Title: Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay
Summary: After being mistaken for terrorists and thrown into Guantánamo Bay, stoners Harold and Kumar escape and return to the U.S., where they proceed to flee across the country with federal agents in hot pursuit.

Title: Taking Lives
Summary: An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim.

Title: Our Idiot Brother
Summary: A comedy centered on an idealist who barges into the lives of his three sisters.

Title: Psycho
Summary: A young female embezzler arrives at the Bates Motel, which has terrible secrets of its own.

Title: Far from Heaven
Summary: In 1950s Connecticut, a flustered housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world.

Title: Ringu
Summary: A reporter and her ex-husband investigate a cursed video tape that is rumored to kill the viewer seven days after watching it.

Title: In the Loop
Summary: A political satire about a group of skeptical American and British operatives attempting to prevent a war between two countries.

Title: Yojimbo
Summary: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

Title: Chupa
Summary: While visiting family in Mexico, teenage Alex gains an unlikely companion when he discovers a young chupacabra hiding in his grandpa's shed. To save the mythical creature, Alex and his cousins must embark on the adventure of a lifetime.

Title: Filip
Summary: In 1943, a Polish Jew, who managed to escape from the Warsaw ghetto, is waiting restaurant tables in Frankfurt while pretending to be French and taking revenge on the Nazis in his own unique way.

Title: Drumline
Summary: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

Title: The Wicker Man
Summary: A sheriff investigating the disappearance of a young girl from a small island discovers there's a larger mystery to solve among the island's secretive, neo-pagan community.

Title: Resident Evil: Extinction
Summary: Survivors of the Raccoon City catastrophe travel across the Nevada desert, hoping to make it to Alaska. Alice joins the caravan and their fight against the evil Umbrella Corp.

Title: Valentine
Summary: Five women are stalked by an unknown assailant while preparing for Valentine's Day.

Title: Evelyn
Summary: Desmond's wife leaves him and their 3 kids after Christmas 1953. As he's unemployed in Dublin, the authorities place the kids in orphanages; when he finds a job, he tries to get his kids back.

Title: Barnyard
Summary: When the farmer's away, all the animals play, and sing, and dance. Eventually, though, someone has to step in and run things, a responsibility that ends up going to Otis, a carefree cow.

Title: Hombre
Summary: John Russell, disdained by his "respectable" fellow stagecoach passengers because he was raised by Native Americans, becomes their only hope for survival when they are set upon by outlaws.

Title: Pulse
Summary: Two groups of people discover evidence that suggests spirits may be trying to invade the human world through the Internet.

Title: Unwelcome
Summary: Married couple Maya and Jamie escape their urban nightmare to the tranquility of rural Ireland only to discover malevolent and murderous goblins lurking in the gnarled, ancient wood at the foot of their new garden.

Title: Aftermath
Summary: A young couple struggling to stay together, when they are offered an amazing deal on a home with a questionable past that would normally be beyond their means. In a final attempt to start fresh as a couple they take the deal.

Title: Fist Fight
Summary: When one school teacher unwittingly causes another teacher's dismissal, he is challenged to an after-school fight.

Title: Dead Presidents
Summary: A Vietnam vet adjusts to life after the war while trying to support his family, but the chance of a better life may involve crime and bloodshed.

Title: The Meyerowitz Stories
Summary: An estranged family gathers together in New York City for an event celebrating the artistic work of their father.

Title: Ben-Hur
Summary: Judah Ben-Hur, a Jewish prince falsely accused of treason by his adopted brother, an officer in the Roman army, returns to his homeland after years at sea to seek revenge, but finds redemption.

Title: Nine
Summary: Famous film director Guido Contini struggles to find harmony in his professional and personal lives, as he engages in dramatic relationships with his wife, his mistress, his muse, his agent, and his mother.

Title: The Tuxedo
Summary: A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.

Title: On the Beach
Summary: After a global nuclear war, the residents of Australia must come to terms with the fact that all life will be destroyed in a matter of months.

Title: His Three Daughters
Summary: A tense, captivating, and touching portrait of family dynamics starring Carrie Coon, Elizabeth Olsen, and Natasha Lyonne as sisters who converge after their father's health declines.

Title: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
Summary: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from a life of crime to pursue his passion of rap music.

Title: London Fields
Summary: Clairvoyant femme fatale Nicola Six has been living with a dark premonition of her impending death by murder. She begins a tangled love affair with three uniquely different men: one of whom she knows will be her murderer.

Title: Dope
Summary: Life changes for Malcolm, a geek who's surviving life in a tough neighborhood, after a chance invitation to an underground party leads him and his friends into a Los Angeles adventure.

Title: Bottle Shock
Summary: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris".

Title: Kind of Kindness
Summary: Plot kept under wraps.

Title: Chasing Liberty
Summary: Anna wants to be like other girls her age (18): date a guy etc. but she's the US president's daughter and always guarded. In Prague he breaks his promise of only 2 agents following her to a concert and she runs away with Ben to see Europe.

Title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
Summary: With the help of an irreverent young sidekick, a bank robber gets his old gang back together to organize a daring new heist.

Title: Salaar
Summary: A gang leader tries to keep a promise made to his dying friend and takes on the other criminal gangs.

Title: Hard to Kill
Summary: Targeted by the mob and its political supporters, hired assassins leave LAPD Detective Mason Storm for dead. Seven years later, he recovers from a deep coma, demanding justice and the opportunity to get even.

Title: The Purge: Election Year
Summary: Former Police Sergeant Barnes becomes head of security for Senator Charlie Roan, a Presidential candidate targeted for death on Purge night due to her vow to eliminate the Purge.

Title: The 400 Blows
Summary: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

Title: 100 Girls
Summary: Matt spends the night with a girl in an elevator during power outage in a girls' college dorm. He never sees her. Waking up in the morning, panties are all that's left of her. How does he find her in a building with 100 girls?

Title: The Laundromat
Summary: A widow investigates an insurance fraud, chasing leads to a pair of Panama City law partners exploiting the world's financial system.

Title: The Duke of Burgundy
Summary: A woman who studies butterflies and moths tests the limits of her relationship with her lesbian lover.

Title: The Stepford Wives
Summary: Joanna Eberhart has come to the quaint little town of Stepford, Connecticut with her family, but soon discovers there lies a sinister truth in the all too perfect behavior of the female residents.

Title: Breaking
Summary: A Marine war veteran faces mental and emotional challenges when he tries to reintegrate into civilian life.

Title: The African Queen
Summary: In WWI East Africa, a gin-swilling Canadian riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced English missionary to undertake a trip up a treacherous river and use his boat to attack a German gunship.

Title: The Killer
Summary: A retired hitman agrees to take care of a teen aged girl, but when she becomes involved with unsavory people, he has to rescue her.

Title: Four Good Days
Summary: A mother helps her daughter work through four crucial days of recovery from substance abuse.

Title: Fathers & Daughters

Summary: The plot is unknown at this time.

Summary: A stand-up comedian and his opera singer wife have a two-year-old daughter with a surprising gift.

Summary: Employees of the indoor fun park Phantom Fun World, find themselves targeted by a masked killer obsessed with the fictional character of The Phantom and the Park's jaded history.

Title: The Stepfather

Title: Kubi
Summary: Lord Oda Nobunaga plans to control Japan where rival warlords battle by waging war against several clans. His vassal Araki Murashige stages a rebellion and promptly disappears.

Title: Back in Action
Summary: Woman who has been retired for 6 years comes back smarter and stronger than ever.

Title: Community: The Movie
Summary: Plot under wraps

Title: Shane
Summary: A weary gunfighter in 1880s Wyoming begins to envision a quieter life after befriending a homestead family with a young son who idolizes him, but a smoldering range war forces him to act.

Title: Serena
Summary: In Depression-era North Carolina, the future of George Pemberton's timber empire becomes complicated when he marries Serena.

Title: The Mexican
Summary: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

Title: We're the Millers 2
Summary: Plot is unknown.

Title: Them!
Summary: The earliest atomic tests in New Mexico cause common ants to mutate into giant man-eating monsters that threaten civilization.

Summary: A Las Vegas cabbie enlists the help of a U.F.O. expert to protect two siblings with paranormal powers from the clutches of an organization that wants to use the kids for their nefarious plans.

Summary: After watching their respective partners die, a New Orleans hitman and a Washington, D.C. detective form an alliance in order to bring down their common enemy.

Summary: In 1951, a blacklisted Hollywood writer gets into a car accident, loses his memory and settles down in a small town where he is mistaken for a long-lost son.

Title: Men in Hope
Summary: When a father teaches his son in-law about the perks of cheating, things take unexpected turns...

Summary: As computer hacker Lisbeth and journalist Mikael investigate a sex-trafficking ring, Lisbeth is accused of three murders, causing her to go on the run while Mikael works to clear her name.

Summary: Supernatural horror, based on the eponymous online phenomenon, a ritual conducted in an elevator, in which players attempt to travel to another dimension using a set of rules that can be found online.

Summary: In the Theatre of the Macabre in New York Sardu and his assistants present a show involving the torture and mutilation of young women. The audience assumes it is just an act but the torture is real, as are the deaths.

Summary: As an asteroid nears Earth, a man finds himself alone after his wife leaves in a panic. He decides to take a road trip to reunite with his high school sweetheart. Accompanying him is a neighbor who inadvertently puts a wrench in his plan.

Summary: A teenage girl once possessed by a demon finds that it still lurks within her. Meanwhile, a priest investigates the death of the girl's exorcist.

Title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider - The Cradle of Life
Summary: Adventurer Lara Croft goes on a quest to save the mythical Pandora's Box, before an evil scientist finds it, and recruits a former Marine turned mercenary to assist her.

Title: Scott and Sid
Summary: Scott is a whimsical dreamer, determined to make his way through life and raising a metaphorical middle finger to anyone who tries to stop him.

Title: La Syndicaliste
Summary: A thriller investigation set in the world of nuclear power and politics.

Title: Iron Lung
Summary: Plot kept under wraps.

Title: The Ring Two
Summary: 6 months after the incidents involving the lethal videotape, new clues prove that there is a new evil lurking in the darkness.

Title: The Fantastic Four
Summary: When dosed with cosmic rays, four intrepid explorers are given incredible powers.

Title: EO
Summary: Follows a donkey who encounters on his journeys good and bad people, experiences joy and pain, exploring a vision of modern Europe through his eyes.

Title: Sibyl
Summary: A jaded psychotherapist returns to her first passion of becoming a writer.

Title: Hard Eight
Summary: Professional gambler Sydney teaches John the tricks of the trade. John does well until he falls for cocktail waitress Clementine.

Title: Red Dog
Summary: Based on the legendary true story of the Red Dog who united a disparate local community while roaming the Australian outback in search of his long lost master.

Title: The Claus Family
Summary: After discovering his grandfather is Santa Claus, Jules has to help him deliver his presents all around the world. But Jules' hatred for Christmas might make that more difficult than Santa thought.

Title: Puppylove
Summary: A lonely teen's friendship with a free-spirited British neighbor pushes her to break free of the bonds of childhood.

Title: Symbol
Summary: A man wakes up in a white room empty other than buttons on the walls, he must find out which button to push to get what he wants.

Title: House
Summary: A troubled writer moves into a haunted house after inheriting it from his aunt.

Title: Salem's Lot
Summary: A writer travels to a town where the people become vampires.

Title: Harvey
Summary: Due to his insistence that he has an invisible six foot-tall rabbit for a best friend, a whimsical middle-aged man is thought by his family to be insane - but he may be wiser than anyone knows.

Summary: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

Title: Meet Cute

Title: Zulu

Title: Greta
Summary: A young woman befriends a lonely widow who's harboring a dark and deadly agenda toward her.

Title: Halloween II
Summary: Laurie Strode struggles to come to terms with her brother Michael's deadly return to Haddonfield, Illinois; meanwhile, Michael prepares for another reunion with his sister.

Title: The Souvenir

Title: Whatever It Takes

Title: The Little Girl Who Lives Down the Lane

Title: The Thirteenth Floor

Title: Grave Encounters
Summary: For their ghost hunting reality show, a production crew locks themselves inside an abandoned mental hospital that's supposedly haunted - and it might prove to be all too true.

Title: The First Time
Summary: A shy senior and a down-to-earth junior fall in love over one weekend.

Title: Safe

Title: The Boys from Brazil

Title: Tully
Summary: A struggling mother of three forms an unexpected bond with the night nanny hired to help with her newborn baby.

Title: Toni Erdmann
Summary: A practical joking father tries to reconnect with his hard working daughter by creating an outrageous alter ego and posing as her CEO's life coach.

Title: A Prophet

Summary: Milo is a boy who is bored with life. One day he comes home to find a toll booth in his room. Having nothing better to do, he gets in his toy car and drives through - only to emerge in a world full of adventure.
Director: Abe Levitow,Dave Monahan,Dave Monahan(live action sequences),Chuck Jones

Title: Poltergeist
Summary: A family whose suburban home is haunted by evil forces must come together to rescue their youngest daughter after the apparitions take her captive.

Title: The Wave

Title: Miracle in Cell No. 7

Title: Leila's Brothers
Summary: Leila, who has spent her entire life caring for her family, makes a plan as her brothers are struggling to make ends meet.

Title: The Vast of Night
Summary: One night in New Mexico, in the late 1950s, a switchboard operator and radio DJ discover a strange audio frequency which could change the future forever.

Title: Mothering Sunday

Title: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
Summary: Moviestar Nick Cage is channeling his iconic characters as he's caught between a superfan and a CIA agent.

Title: Mortal Kombat
Summary: MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe.

Title: Suzume

Title: The Voyeurs

Summary: Babi discovers a betrayal by her long-term partner and decides to embark on a new adventure in life. On this journey, she meets judge Marco and they begin to live a story permeated by a lot of sexual tension.

Title: Green Book
Summary: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver for an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

Title: Call Me by Your Name
Summary: In 1980s Italy, romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.

Title: The Eiger Sanction

Title: Legally Blonde
Summary: Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen, is dumped by her boyfriend. She decides to follow him to law school. While she is there, she figures out that there is more to her than just looks.

Title: The Abyss
Summary: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and faces danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

Title: Knock at the Cabin
Summary: While vacationing, a girl and her parents are taken hostage by armed strangers who demand that the family make a choice to avert the apocalypse.

Title: The Intouchables

Title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace

Title: The Conjuring

Title: Prey
Summary: Naru, a skilled warrior of the Comanche Nation, fights to protect her tribe against one of the first highly-evolved Predators to land on Earth.

Title: The Hunt
Summary: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

Summary: In the riveting conclusion of the landmark Skywalker saga, new legends will be born-and the final battle for freedom is yet to come.

Title: Deadpool 2
Summary: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.

Summary: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

Title: Bram Stoker's Dracula

Title: Curiosa

Title: The Descent

Title: Sin City

Title: Freelance

Title: Howl's Moving Castle

Summary: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

Title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
Summary: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

Title: We're the Millers
Summary: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.

Title: After
Summary: A young woman falls for a guy with a dark secret and the two embark on a rocky relationship. Based on the novel by Anna Todd.

Title: Me Before You
Summary: A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently-paralyzed man she's taking care of.

Title: Raya and the Last Dragon
Summary: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.

Title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith

Title: The Karate Kid

Title: The Railway Man

Title: Jack Frost

Title: Extraction II
Summary: After barely surviving his grievous wounds from his mission in Dhaka, Bangladesh, Tyler Rake is back, and his team is ready to take on their next mission.

Title: Piranha
Summary: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

Title: The Words
Summary: A writer at the peak of his literary success discovers the steep price he must pay for stealing another man's work.

Title: Faces of Death
Summary: A collection of death scenes, ranging from TV material to homemade super 8 movies.

Title: Local Hero
Summary: An American oil company has plans for a new refinery and sends someone to Scotland to buy up an entire village, but things don't go as expected.

Title: Rings
Summary: A young woman finds herself on the receiving end of a terrifying curse that threatens to take her life in 7 days.

Title: Planes
Summary: A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.

Title: Lost Weekend

Title: Born in Gaza

Title: The Island
Summary: When his brother is killed, LAPD officer Mark leaves the city to return to the island he grew up on. Seeking answers and vengeance, he soon finds himself in a bloody battle with the corrupt tycoon who's taken over the island paradise.

Title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
Summary: While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors living in a prison surrounded by the infected who also want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia.

Title: Breathless
Summary: A small-time thief steals a car and impulsively murders a motorcycle policeman. Wanted by the authorities, he reunites with a hip American journalism student and attempts to persuade her to run away with him to Italy.

Title: Gilda
Summary: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.

Title: Arlington Road
Summary: A man begins to suspect his neighbors are not what they appear to be and their secrets could be deadly.

Title: Columbus

Title: Cyrano
Summary: Too self-conscious to woo Roxanne himself, wordsmith Cyrano de Bergerac helps young Christian nab her heart through love letters.

Title: Confessions of a Dangerous Mind
Summary: An adaptation of the cult memoir of game show impresario Chuck Barris (Sam Rockwell), in which he purports to have been a C.I.A. hitman.

Title: Friday the 13th: The New Blood
Summary: Jason Voorhees is accidentally freed from his watery prison by a telekinetic teenager. Now, only she can stop him.

Title: Jagged Edge
Summary: A wealthy woman is murdered in her beach house. The husband is allegedly knocked out first. He inherits all. He has a female ex criminal prosecutor represent him in court.

Title: The Stanford Prison Experiment

Title: Tangerine
Summary: A hooker tears through Tinseltown on Christmas Eve searching for the pimp who broke her heart.

Title: BioShock
Summary: Based on the popular Video Game "Bioshock".

Title: Out of Time
Summary: A Florida police chief must solve a vicious double homicide before he himself falls under suspicion.

Title: Drinking Buddies
Summary: Luke and Kate are coworkers at a brewery who spend their nights drinking and flirting heavily. One weekend away together with their significant others proves who really belongs together and who doesn't.

Title: Curve
Summary: A soon-to-be bride on her way to a wedding rehearsal is having second thoughts and decides to take a detour. Car breaks down and a hitchiker offers help. Could it be fate?

Title: The Cup
Summary: The 2002 Melbourne Cup horse race, brotherly love and the triumph of the human spirit. A true story.

Title: Something Wicked This Way Comes
Summary: In a small American town, a diabolical circus and its demonic proprietor prey on the townsfolk.

Title: Boomerang
Summary: A successful executive and womanizer finds his lifestyle choices have turned back on him when his new female boss turns out to be an even bigger deviant than he is.

Title: Exit to Eden
Summary: Elliot heads for the sexual fantasy island, Eden. He takes some photos of diamond smugglers. They and undercover cops want the photos and follow him to Eden.

Title: Ski School
Summary: Rival groups in a skiing school do battle on and off the piste. One gang are rich and serious, the other group are party animals.

Title: The Hustler
Summary: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

Title: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
Summary: A group of martial-arts warriors has only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

Title: Ninja Scroll
Summary: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a kunoichi and a spy in battling a demonic clan of killers - led by a ghost from his past - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.

Title: The Rookie
Summary: A Texas baseball coach makes the major league after agreeing to try out if his high school team made the playoffs.

Title: Madea Goes to Jail
Summary: Mischievous grandma Madea lands in jail, where she meets a variety of mixed-up characters.

Title: Josie and the Pussycats
Summary: A girl group find themselves in the middle of a conspiracy to deliver subliminal messages through popular music.

Title: Hard Times
Summary: The adventures of a drifter turned illegal prize-fighter during the Depression Era in New Orleans.

Title: Legacy of Lies
Summary: An ex-MI6 agent is thrown back into the world of espionage and high stakes to uncover the shocking truth about operations conducted by unknown secret services.

Title: Saddle Tramp
Summary: A saddle tramp unexpectedly becomes foster parent to four children for whom he provides by working on a ranch that's embroiled in a feud with another ranch and cattle rustlers.

Title: Marnie
Summary: Mark marries Marnie although she is a habitual thief and has serious psychological problems, and tries to help her confront and resolve them.

Title: Shirley
Summary: A famous horror writer finds inspiration for her next book after she and her husband take in a young couple.

Title: Paid in Full
Summary: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience.

Title: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
Summary: While attending his brother's wedding, a serial womanizer is haunted by the ghosts of his past girlfriends.

Title: We're Back! A Dinosaur's Story
Summary: A time traveling scientist goes back to prehistoric times and feeds dinosaurs a magic cereal that increases their intelligence - next they land in modern New York City for a series of comic adventures.

Title: Waking Life
Summary: A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.

Title: Sleep Tight
Summary: You wake day after day to the comfort and security of your home. But how safe is it really?

Title: Two Lovers

Title: Wer
Summary: A defense attorney begins to suspect that there might be more to her client, who is charged with the murders of a vacationing family, than meets the eye.

Title: Monica

Title: American Carnage

Title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later

Title: Ingrid Goes West

Title: The Sugarland Express
Summary: A woman attempts to reunite her family by helping her husband escape prison and together kidnapping their son. But things don't go as planned when they are forced to take a police hostage on the road.

Title: Bloodthirst

Title: The Holiday Calendar
Summary: A struggling but talented photographer inherits an antique holiday advent calendar, the contents of which seem to predict the future. Will this magical calendar lead her to love this holiday season?

Title: Barbarian Queen

Summary: A dog finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he meets.

Summary: A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.

Summary: Igor is a plumber; Pina serves coffee. It is winter and they both deeply desire each other, but they are not free. In trying to figure out how to realize their love, she decides to make a lion costume for her little son and he decides to buy a photocopying machine for his wife. Spring will come at last and with it the consummation of love, filling their lives with hop... Read all

Title: Gothika

Director: Ishirô Honda(segments The Tunnel, Mount Fuji in Red", prologue and epilogue of "The Weeping Demon) (uncredited),Ishirô Honda,Akira Kurosawa

Summary: A father, who runs a real estate agency in town, is having an affair with a pretty office worker, Yuki. His daughter Hitomi returns home for a long time after receiving news that he had collapsed from a heart attack during.

Title: Deadfall
Summary: Two siblings decide to fend for themselves in the wake of a botched casino heist and their unlikely reunion during another family's Thanksgiving celebration.

Title: How to Train Your Dragon
Summary: Follows a young Viking as he aspires to hunt dragons, and how he becomes unexpectedly a friend of a young dragon.

Title: Fist of Fury
Summary: A young man seeks vengence for the death of his teacher.

Summary: Neil Breen stars as an identical twin brother who restores an old mysterious mental asylum. He takes it upon himself to mystically train the patients as warriors for humanity and justice.

Title: Bounce

Title: Pussy Island

Title: Volver

Title: I.S.S.

Title: Spring Break

Title: Arjun Reddy

Title: Tokyo Godfathers

Title: R.M.N.

Title: Fukrey

Title: Late Night with the Devil

Title: Nocebo

Title: Running Scared
Summary: Two street-wise Chicago cops have to shake off some rust after returning from a Key West vacation to pursue a drug dealer who nearly killed them in the past.

Title: San Quentin
Summary: Ex con Lawrence Tierney, hunts a supposedly reformed inmate, McLane who escapes during a trip to San Francisco

Title: Turner & Hooch
Summary: A detective must adopt a rambunctious dog in order to help him find a killer.

Title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
Summary: When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.

Title: Kama Sutra: A Tale of Love
Summary: Two female friends become sexual rivals at maturity.

Title: The Tin Drum
Summary: In 1924, Oskar Matzerath is born in the Free City of Danzig. At age three, he falls down a flight of stairs and stops growing. In 1939, World War II breaks out.

Title: Nanny
Summary: Piecing together a new life in New York City while caring for the child of an Upper East Side family, immigrant nanny Aisha is forced to confront a concealed truth that threatens to shatter her precarious American Dream.

Title: London

Title: We Are Your Friends

Title: The China Syndrome

Skin also studies the gender inequality in presenting nude images in motion pictures, and ... Read all

Summary: In 1950s small town Britain, a doctor develops a relationship with her young patient's mother.

A freelance sleuth neighbor moves Don to embark on a cross-country search for his old flames in search of answers.

Summary: Plot under wraps.
