Summary: A calculating divorcée risks her chances at wealth and security with a man she doesn't love by getting involved with the hotheaded murderer romancing her foster sister.

Title: I Used to Be Famous
Summary: Follows Vince, a desperate former popstar who dreams of making a comeback. An impromptu jam session with autistic young drummer Stevie sparks an unexpected friendship between the two misunderstood musicians.

Title: The Possession of Hannah Grace
Summary: When a cop who is just out of rehab takes the graveyard shift in a city hospital morgue, she faces a series of bizarre, violent events caused by an evil entity in one of the corpses.

Title: Nostalghia
Summary: A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy researching the life of an 18th-century composer, and instead meet a ruminative madman who tells the poet how the world may be saved.

Title: Hedwig and the Angry Inch
Summary: A gender-queer punk-rock singer from East Berlin tours the U.S. with her band as she tells her life story and follows the former lover/band-mate who stole her songs.

Title: Endings, Beginnings
Summary: A 30-something woman navigating through love and heartbreak over the course of one year. During that time, she will unlock the secrets to her life in a sudden turn of events and in the most surprising of places.

Title: Little Women
Summary: The four daughters of a New England family fight for happiness during and after the Civil War.

Title: The Ward
Summary: An institutionalized young woman becomes terrorized by a ghost.

Title: Who Am I?
Summary: A Secret Agent loses his memory after falling from a crashing helicopter. He is then chased by several other agency operatives, but he has no idea why.

Title: Detroit
Summary: Fact-based drama set during the 1967 Detroit riots in which a group of rogue police officers respond to a complaint with retribution rather than justice on their minds.

Title: The Conformist
Summary: A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.

Title: Eight Legged Freaks
Summary: Venomous spiders get exposed to a noxious chemical that causes them to grow to monumental proportions.

Title: Ma and Pa Kettle Back on the Farm
Summary: The Kettles leave their ultra-modern home and return to the country looking for uranium. Ma and Tom's mother-in-law, Mrs. Parker, fight over whether their grandchild will be raised "hygienically".

Title: 13 Assassins
Summary: A group of assassins come together for a suicide mission to kill an evil lord.

Title: Darker Shades of Summer
Summary: At an experimental retreat, a married couple will undergo the ultimate test of their love in the tense thriller.

Title: The Immaculate Room
Summary: Secrets and private demons emerge when a seemingly-perfect young couple compete- for a $5 million prize by isolating themselves in an empty white room for 50 days. No phones, no family--only the room trying to break their resolve.

Title: The Duke
Summary: In 1961, Kempton Bunton, a 60 year old taxi driver, steals Goya's portrait of the Duke of Wellington from the National Gallery in London.

Title: Raees
Summary: A bootlegger sets out to improve his community as a promising leader but falls in a political trap.

Title: The 12th Man
Summary: They were 12 saboteurs. The Nazis killed 11 of them. This is the true story of the one that got away.

Title: Maladolescenza
Summary: A teen boy grows from playing and fighting with his German-shepherd dog to playing kid--then adult--games with two equally young girls in a dream-like forest which eventually turns eerie and somber.

Title: 12 Mighty Orphans
Summary: Haunted by his mysterious past, a devoted high-school football coach leads a scrawny team of orphans to the state championship during the Great Depression and inspires a broken nation along the way.

Title: That's a Wrap
Summary: Mason Maestro has just directed what he considers to be his masterpiece, a film titled 'That's a Wrap.' One by one, the cast disappears until the true nature of the evening is revealed.

Title: The Birth of a Nation
Summary: The Stoneman family finds its friendship with the Camerons affected by the Civil War, both fighting in opposite armies. The development of the war in their lives plays through to Lincoln's assassination and the birth of the Ku Klux Klan.

Title: Cuckoo
Summary: A 17-year old girl is forced to move with her family to a resort where things are not what they seem.

Title: Iron Mask
Summary: Early 1700: Cartographer Jonathan Green (Jason Flemyng) from Viy (2014) is back to map the Russian Far East. He's forced on to China, where he confronts the Dragon Master et al. The iron masked Russian Czar escapes the Tower of London to a Russian ship.

Title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
Summary: As Hannah Montana's popularity begins to take over her life, Miley Stewart, on the urging from her father takes a trip to her hometown of Crowley Corners, Tennessee to get some perspective on what matters in life the most.

Title: War Room
Summary: A seemingly perfect family looks to fix their problems with the help of Miss Clara, an older, wiser woman.

Title: The Enforcer
Summary: An enforcer has to sacrifice everything to save a young girl he has befriended from his femme fatale boss who is involved in cybersex trafficking.

Title: The Warrior's Way
Summary: A warrior-assassin is forced to hide in a small town in the American Badlands after refusing a mission.

Title: The Swan Princess
Summary: A power-hungry sorcerer curses a princess to live as a swan by day in this tale of everlasting love.

Title: Be Kind Rewind
Summary: Two bumbling store clerks inadvertently erase the footage from all of the tapes in their video rental store. In order to keep the business running, they re-shoot every film in the store with their own camera, with a budget of zero dollars.

Title: How the West Was Won
Summary: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the 19th century, including the Gold Rush, the Civil War, and the building of the railroads.
Director: John Ford(segment The Civil War),George Marshall,Henry Hathaway,John Ford,George Marshall(segment The Railroad),Henry Hathaway(segments The Rivers, The Plains, The Outlaws)

Title: The Little Vampire
Summary: A lonely American boy living in Scotland makes a new best friend, a fellow nine year-old who happens to be a vampire.

Title: Unsane
Summary: A young woman is involuntarily committed to a mental institution, where she is confronted by her greatest fear - but is it real or a product of her delusion?

Title: Brain on Fire
Summary: A young, capable professional cannot explain her newly erratic behavior.

Title: Hidalgo
Summary: In 1890, a down-and-out cowboy and his horse travel to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross desert horse race.

Title: Better Man
Summary: The life and experiences of singer Robbie Williams.

Title: Observe and Report
Summary: Bi-polar mall security guard Ronnie Barnhardt is called into action to stop a flasher from turning shopper's paradise into his personal peep show. But when Barnhardt can't bring the culprit to justice, a surly police detective is recruited to close the case.

Title: Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank
Summary: Hank, a loveable dog with a head full of dreams about becoming a samurai, sets off in search of his destiny.

Title: Time After Time
Summary: H.G. Wells pursues Jack the Ripper to the 20th Century when the serial murderer uses the future writer's time machine to escape his time period.

Title: Thelma
Summary: A confused religious girl tries to deny her feelings for a female friend who's in love with her. This causes her suppressed subconsciously-controlled psychokinetic powers to reemerge with devastating results.

Title: The Brave One
Summary: Struggling to recover emotionally from a brutal assault that killed her fiancé and left her in a coma, a radio personality begins a quest for vengeance against the perpetrators that leaves a bloody trail across New York City.

Title: Cuties
Summary: Eleven-year-old Amy starts to rebel against her conservative family's traditions when she becomes fascinated with a free-spirited dance crew.

Title: Gone
Summary: A woman is convinced her kidnapper has returned when her sister goes missing.

Title: Mayhem
Summary: A virus spreads through an office complex causing white-collar workers to act out their worst impulses.

Title: Palitan
Summary: When a dare pushes two couples into an orgy, suppressed feelings rekindle between the two ladies, who were once bestfriends and lovers.

Title: The Deep Blue Sea
Summary: The wife of a British Judge is caught in a self-destructive love affair with a Royal Air Force pilot.

Title: Nunta pe bani
Summary: Mircea hates weddings. Everyone finds out when, after attending yet another wedding out of obligation, he makes a controversial Facebook post that goes viral.

Title: Fragments of Love
Summary: A woman shares stories of her previous lovers with her present lover and makes him a one those 'fragments' of her love.

Title: Happy Death Day 2U
Summary: Tree Gelbman discovers that dying over and over was surprisingly easier than the dangers that lie ahead.

Title: Horseplay
Summary: A group of young men at a gathering in a luxury villa test each other's boundaries.

Title: My Spy
Summary: A hardened CIA operative finds himself at the mercy of a precocious 9-year-old girl, having been sent undercover to surveil her family.

Title: The Court Jester
Summary: A hapless carnival performer masquerades as the court jester as part of a plot against an evil ruler who has overthrown the rightful King.

Title: Angels and Insects
Summary: In the 1800s a naturalist marries into a family of British country gentry.

Title: The Runaways
Summary: A coming-of-age biographical film about the 1970s teenage all-girl rock band The Runaways. The relationship between band members Cherie Currie and Joan Jett is also explored.

Title: Ben Is Back
Summary: A drug addicted teenage boy shows up unexpectedly at his family's home on Christmas Eve.

Title: Miss Meadows
Summary: A proper elementary-school teacher moonlights as a vigilante.

Title: Tooth Fairy
Summary: A bad deed on the part of a tough minor-league hockey player results in an unusual sentence: He must serve one week as a real-life tooth fairy.

Title: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
Summary: Kirsty is brought to an institution after the horrible events of Hellraiser (1987), where the occult-obsessive head doctor resurrects Julia and unleashes the Cenobites and their demonic underworld.

Title: Trespass
Summary: As they're held for ransom, a husband and wife's predicament grows more dire amid the discovery of betrayal and deception.

Title: Tristan + Isolde
Summary: An affair between the second in line to Britain's throne and the princess of the feuding Irish spells doom for the young lovers.

Title: National Security
Summary: Two mismatched security guards are thrown together to bust a smuggling operation.

Title: The Punisher
Summary: When Frank Castle's family is murdered by criminals, he wages war on crime as a vigilante assassin known only as The Punisher.

Title: And Justice for All
Summary: A lawyer is forced to defend a guilty judge, while defending other innocent clients, and trying to find punishment for the guilty and provide justice for the innocent.

Title: The Storied Life of A.J. Fikry
Summary: A.J. Fikry's wife has died, his bookstore is in trouble, and now his prized rare edition of Poe poems has been stolen. However, when a mysterious package appears, its arrival gives him the chance to start his life over and see things anew.

Title: The Passenger
Summary: Unable to find the war he's been asked to cover, a frustrated war correspondent takes the risky path of co-opting the identity of a dead arms-deal acquaintance.

Title: Calibre
Summary: A shocking deed turned their weekend trip into a nightmare. Now their only hope is to swallow their paranoia and act normal.

Title: The Painted Veil
Summary: A British medical doctor fights a cholera epidemic in a small Chinese village, while being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife.

Title: Lean on Me
Summary: The dedicated but tyrannical Joe Clark is appointed the principal of a decaying inner-city school he is determined to improve by any and all means.

Title: Bait
Summary: A freak tsunami traps shoppers at a coastal Australian supermarket inside the building - along with 12-foot Great White Sharks.

Title: The Horse Whisperer
Summary: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

Title: Tesla
Summary: A freewheeling take on visionary inventor Nikola Tesla, his interactions with Thomas Edison and J.P. Morgan's daughter Anne, and his breakthroughs in transmitting electrical power and light.

Title: MILF
Summary: Three best friends in their forties start a relationship with younger men while on vacation.

Title: Smallfoot
Summary: High up on a mountain peak surrounded by clouds, a secret Yeti society lives in peace and harmony. One day, a Yeti witnesses an airplane crash; Inside lies "Smallfoot", a legendary creature that will rock the society to its core.

Title: The Entity
Summary: A woman is tormented and sexually molested by an invisible demon.

Title: Edison
Summary: Upon discovering a den of corrupt policemen, a fresh-faced journalist makes shaky allies in a jaded reporter and investigator for a powerful district attorney.

Title: Mimic
Summary: Three years ago, entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease. Now, the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind.

Title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
Summary: When their closest friend April O'Neil discovers an ancient scepter with magical powers, the turtles must cow-a-bunga their way back to 17th century Japan to rescue her from the evil clutches of Lord Norinaga.

Title: Vortex
Summary: The last days of an elderly couple stricken by dementia.

Title: Under Suspicion
Summary: A wealthy attorney in San Juan comes to the police station for "10 minutes" of follow-up questions to finding a 12-year-old girl's body in a park. Another young girl was also raped and murdered weeks earlier and the evidence points to him.

Title: Orange County
Summary: A guidance counselor mistakenly sends out the wrong transcripts to Stanford University under the name of an over-achieving high schooler.

Title: All About My Mother
Summary: Pedro Almodovar's Oscar-winning comedy (Best Foreign Film, 1999) about a bereaved mother, and overwrought actress, her jealous lover and a pregnant nun.

Title: One True Thing
Summary: A career woman reassesses her parents' lives after she is forced to care for her cancer-stricken mother.

Title: Head of State
Summary: When a presidential candidate dies unexpectedly in the middle of the campaign, Washington, D.C. alderman Mays Gilliam is unexpectedly picked as his replacement.

Title: Catchfire
Summary: A witness to a mob assassination flees for her life, running from town to town and switching identities along the way, but she cannot seem to elude Milo, the chief hit man sent after her.

Title: Flyboys
Summary: The adventures of the Lafayette Escadrille, young Americans who volunteered for the French military before the U.S. entered World War I, and became the country's first fighter pilots.

Title: The Lure
Summary: In Warsaw, a pair of mermaid sisters are adopted into a cabaret. While one seeks love with humans the other hungers to dine on the human population of the city.

Title: Rocketry: The Nambi Effect
Summary: Based on the life of Indian Space Research Organization scientist Nambi Narayanan, who was framed for being a spy and arrested in 1994. Though free, he continues to fight for justice against the officials who falsely implicated him.

Title: The Double
Summary: The unenviable life of a government-agency clerk takes a horrific turn with the arrival of a new co-worker who is both his exact physical double and his opposite otherwise--he's a confident, charismatic ladies' man.

Title: Bubba Ho-Tep
Summary: When residents of their nursing home start dying of dubious causes, an aged Elvis and an African-American senior who claims to be President John F. Kennedy discover that the perpetrator is an Egyptian mummy with murderous intentions.

Title: Chor Nikal Ke Bhaga
Summary: A flight attendant and her business partner on a mission to steal diamonds and free themselves from the clutches of a loan shark.At 40,000 feet in the air, the heist goes horribly wrong and turns into a hostage situation.

Title: The Perfect Find
Summary: After a high-profile firing, Jenna's fashion career comeback hits a snag when she falls for a charming, much younger coworker - who happens to be her boss's son. As sparks fly, Jenna must decide if she'll risk it all on a secret romance.

Title: Tracks
Summary: A young woman goes on a 1,700-mile trek across the deserts of West Australia with four camels and her faithful dog.

Title: Nicholas Nickleby
Summary: A young, compassionate man struggles to save his family and friends from the abusive exploitation of his cold-heartedly grasping uncle.

Title: Love in Taipei
Summary: A young woman's cultural immersion program in Taiwan turns out to be a liberating free-for-all known as "Loveboat" where unexpected romance leads her to question her future.

Title: Wicker Park
Summary: A young Chicago advertising executive believes a woman he sees in a café is his long-lost love. His belief leads to obsession, as he puts his life on hold in order to trail her.

Title: Assassination Nation
Summary: After a malicious data hack exposes the secrets of the perpetually American town of Salem, chaos descends and four girls must fight to survive, while coping with the hack themselves.

Title: Pride and Glory
Summary: A family's moral codes are tested when Ray Tierney investigates a case that reveals an incendiary police corruption scandal involving his own brother-in-law. For Ray, the truth is revelatory, a Pandora's Box that threatens to upend not only the Tierney legacy but the entire NYPD.

Title: Our Man Flint
Summary: When scientists use eco-terrorism to impose their will on the world by affecting extremes in the weather, Intelligence Chief Cramden calls in top agent Derek Flint.

Title: Caché
Summary: A married couple is terrorized by a series of surveillance videotapes left on their front porch.

Title: Mercy
Summary: A doctor and former military officer finds herself in a deadly battle for survival when the Irish mob takes control of the hospital where she works and her son is taken hostage.

Title: Prisoner's Daughter
Summary: A father fights for the love of his daughter and grandson, after serving twelve years in prison.

Title: The Wages of Fear
Summary: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

Title: Day Zero
Summary: When society breaks down due to a violent outbreak that turns victims into undead monsters, a former elite soldier breaks out of jail to find his family.

Title: Land of Bad
Summary: Rookie field air support controller Kinney is embedded with a Delta Force team on a mission in the Philippines. When the team is trapped without weapons, the skills of Reaper, an Air Force drone pilot, become their only chance of survival.

Title: Running on Empty
Summary: The eldest son of a fugitive family comes of age and wants to live his own life.

Title: Ma mère
Summary: When his father dies, a young man is introduced by his attractive, amoral mother to a world of hedonism and depravity.

Title: Section 8
Summary: After avenging the murder of his family a former soldier is sprung from prison and recruited by a shadowy government agency.

Title: Laal Singh Chaddha
Summary: The story of Laal Singh Chaddha, a simple man whose extraordinary journey will fill you with love, warmth and happiness.

Title: The Joy Luck Club
Summary: The life histories of four East Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.

Title: Tommy
Summary: A psychosomatically blind, deaf, and mute boy becomes a master pinball player and, subsequently, the figurehead of a cult.

Title: Quiz Show
Summary: A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time show winner, is under Goodwin's investigation.

Title: Maria
Summary: Follows the life story of the world's greatest opera singer, Maria Callas, during her final days in 1970s Paris.

Title: A Very Long Engagement
Summary: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

Title: The Ambush
Summary: When three Emirati soldiers are ambushed in a hostile territory, their commander leads a daring mission to rescue them.

Title: Operation Petticoat
Summary: During World War II, a commander finds himself stuck with a decrepit (and pink) submarine, a con man executive officer, and a group of army nurses.

Title: Bad Guy
Summary: An unfeeling gangster seeks to ruin the life of a young girl who rejected him. He forces her into prostitution and spies on her regularly, then he soon begins to fall for her.

Title: Suite Française
Summary: During the early years of Nazi occupation of France in World War II, romance blooms between Lucile Angellier (Michelle Williams), a French villager, and Lieutenant Bruno von Falk (Matthias Schoenaerts), a German soldier.

Title: Eagle vs Shark
Summary: The tale of two socially-awkward misfits and the strange ways they try to find love: through revenge on high-school bullies, burgers, and video games.

Title: One for the Money
Summary: Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

Title: Elite Squad
Summary: In 1997 Rio de Janeiro, Captain Nascimento has to find a substitute for his position while trying to take down drug dealers and criminals before the Pope visits.

Title: Cabin Fever
Summary: While staying at a remote cabin for a week-long vacation, a group of five college friends succumb to an infectious, flesh-eating disease.

Title: Agent Cody Banks
Summary: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.

Title: Quadrophenia
Summary: Jimmy Cooper loathes his dead-end job and his working-class parents. He seeks solace with his mod clique, scooter riding, and drugs, only to be disappointed.

Title: Maniac
Summary: A psychopathic man goes on a killing and mutilation spree in New York City.

Title: Snake Eyes
Summary: A shady police detective finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at an important boxing match in an Atlantic City casino.

Title: Darkland: The Return
Summary: Zaid is doing time in prison, but gets a chance to get out and see his son if he assists the police.

Title: Batman: The Killing Joke
Summary: As Batman hunts for the escaped Joker, the Clown Prince of Crime attacks the Gordon family to prove a diabolical point mirroring his own fall into madness.

Title: The Brood
Summary: A man tries to uncover an unconventional psychologist's therapy techniques on his institutionalized wife, amidst a series of brutal murders.

Title: Beauty Shop
Summary: A determined hairstylist (Queen Latifah) competes with her former boss (Kevin Bacon) after opening her own business in Atlanta.

Title: Personal Shopper
Summary: A personal shopper in Paris refuses to leave the city until she makes contact with her twin brother who previously died there. Her life becomes more complicated when a mysterious person contacts her via text message.

Title: Play Misty for Me
Summary: The life of a disc jockey is turned upside down after a romantic encounter with an obsessed fan.

Title: Beastly
Summary: A modern-day take on the "Beauty and the Beast" tale where a New York teen is transformed into a hideous monster in order to find true love.

Title: The Ladykillers
Summary: An eccentric, if not charming Southern professor and his crew pose as a classical ensemble in order to rob a casino, all under the nose of his unsuspecting but sharp old landlady.

Title: Stigmata
Summary: When a young woman becomes afflicted by stigmata, a priest is sent to investigate her case, which may have severe ramifications for his faith and for the Catholic Church itself.

Title: American Ultra
Summary: A stoner - who is in fact a government agent - is marked as a liability and targeted for extermination. But he's too well-trained and too high for them to handle.

Title: Song of the Sea
Summary: Ben, a young Irish boy, and his little sister Saoirse, a girl who can turn into a seal, go on an adventure to free the fairies and save the spirit world.

Title: Zero Fucks Given
Summary: A young flight attendant loses her job at a low-cost airline.

Title: Coma
Summary: When a young female doctor notices an unnatural amount of comas occurring in her hospital she uncovers a horrible conspiracy.

Title: Coonskin
Summary: Rabbit, a country-born trickster, takes over the organized crime racket in Harlem, facing opposition from the institutionalized racism of the Mafia and corrupt police.

Title: Last Night
Summary: The story follows a married couple, apart for a night while the husband takes a business trip with a colleague to whom he's attracted. While he's resisting temptation, his wife encounters her past love.

Title: Farming
Summary: Based on the writer/director's childhood, FARMING tells story of a young Nigerian boy, 'farmed out' by his parents to a white British family in the hope of a better future. Instead, he joins a white skinhead gang.

Title: Official Competition
Summary: A wealthy businessman hires a famous filmmaker to help make a smash hit film.

Title: Tunes of Glory
Summary: After World War II, a Highland Regiment's acting Commanding Officer, who rose from the ranks, is replaced by a peace-time Oxford-educated Commanding Officer, leading to a dramatic conflict between the two.

Title: Thoroughbreds
Summary: Two upper-class teenage girls in suburban Connecticut rekindle their unlikely friendship after years of growing apart. Together, they hatch a plan to solve both of their problems-no matter what the cost.

Title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
Summary: In this collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A.A. Milne, Winnie the Pooh, a honey-loving teddy bear, embarks on some eccentric adventures.
Director: Ben Sharpsteen(earlier cartoon clips) (uncredited),Wolfgang Reitherman,John Lounsbery,Ben Sharpsteen

Title: Station to Station
Summary: With his life back East upended, a young man escapes to the electric anonymity of Las Vegas. When an intriguing offer puts him on an unexpected path, he learns how easily things left unresolved find a way of forcing their own resolution.

Title: Every Day
Summary: A shy teenager falls for a spirit who wakes up in the body of a different person every morning.

Title: Get a Job
Summary: After college, Will is having problems getting a good, lasting job, as are his roomies, his girlfriend, and his just-fired dad.

Title: Because of Winn-Dixie
Summary: A mischievous dog befriends a lonely young girl in a new town and helps her make new friends.

Title: Palo Alto
Summary: An unflinching portrait of adolescent lust, boredom, and self-destruction that centers around a shy young girl on the cusp of an illicit relationship with her soccer coach.

Title: Prisoners of the Ghostland
Summary: A notorious criminal must break an evil curse in order to rescue an abducted girl who has mysteriously disappeared.

Title: Venus
Summary: Horror invades the concrete corridors of a cursed apartment complex on the outskirts of Madrid.

Title: Limbo
Summary: 'Limbo' follows the investigation of a twenty year-old outback cold case murder by jaded detective Travis Hurley.

Title: Gulliver's Travels
Summary: Travel writer Lemuel Gulliver takes an assignment in Bermuda but ends up on the island of Lilliput, where he towers over its tiny citizens.

Title: Daylight
Summary: Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.

Title: Woman of the Hour
Summary: Rodney Alcala was a killer in the midst of a killing spree when he brazenly took part in, and won a date on, the popular TV game show "The Dating Game."

Title: Revenge
Summary: A retired US Navy pilot comes to Mexico, where he falls in love with the wife of a powerful businessman. The consequences will be cruel and unforeseen.

Title: No Highway in the Sky
Summary: An aeronautical engineer predicts that a new model of plane will fail catastrophically and in a novel manner after a specific number flying hours.

Title: Irresistible
Summary: A Democratic strategist helps a retired veteran run for mayor in a small, conservative Midwest town.

Title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
Summary: A teenage girl is convinced that her home city revolves around her until her family packs up and moves to the suburbs, where she finds herself competing for attention.

Title: On the Line
Summary: A host takes a call, where an unknown person threatens to kill the showman's entire family on air. To save loved ones, the radio host will have to play a survival game and the only way to win is to find out the identity of the criminal.

Title: The Childe
Summary: "The Childe" focuses on a man born to a Korean father and a Filipino mother who aspires to be a boxer. He travels back to Korea in the hopes of tracking down his father, and in the process, he gets mixed up with some bad people.

Title: Love Affair
Summary: Two people meet on a flight to Sydney. Although both are engaged to others, they fall in love during their evacuation after a forced landing, and agree to meet in New York City three months later if the attraction lasts.

Title: Hotel Coolgardie
Summary: On a road between Australia's most isolated town and its largest gold mine lies Coolgardie, where the arrival every three months of a new foreign backpacker couple is a much-anticipated event.

Title: Ghosts of Mars
Summary: In 2176, a Martian police unit is sent to pick up a highly dangerous criminal at a remote mining post. Upon arrival, the cops find that the post has become a charnel house.

Title: All Eyez on Me
Summary: Tells the true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur.

Title: State of Grace
Summary: A New York cop is recruited to return to his hometown and infiltrate the mob ran by his best friend's brother.

Title: Ghost Graduation
Summary: A teacher with paranormal abilities helps a group of ghosts graduate high school.

Title: Coming Home
Summary: In 1968 California, a woman whose husband is a Marine officer fighting in Vietnam falls in love with a former high school classmate who suffered a paralyzing combat injury in the war.

Title: Two Night Stand
Summary: A snowstorm forces two people who made an online connection to unwillingly extend their one-night stand as the blizzard goes through the night.

Title: Women in Love
Summary: Two best friends fall in love with a pair of women, but the relationships soon go in very different directions.

Title: Minamata
Summary: War photographer W. Eugene Smith travels back to Japan where he documents the devastating effect of mercury poisoning in coastal communities.

Title: Kung Fu Yoga
Summary: Two professors team up to locate a lost treasure and embark on an adventure that takes them from a Tibetan ice cave to Dubai, and to a mountain temple in India.

Title: The Current War: Director's Cut
Summary: The dramatic story of the cutthroat race between electricity titans Thomas A. Edison and George Westinghouse to determine whose electrical system would power the modern world.

Title: Forsaken
Summary: In 1872, an embittered gunslinger named John Henry Clayton attempts to make amends with his estranged father Reverend Samuel Clayton while their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers.

Title: A Love Song for Bobby Long
Summary: A headstrong young woman returns to New Orleans after the death of her estranged mother.

Title: Body Snatchers
Summary: A teenage girl and her father discover alien clones are replacing humans on a remote U.S. military base in Alabama.

Title: I Spit on Your Grave: Deja Vu
Summary: Cinema's top lethal lady vengeance returns in the most anticipated sequel of all time.

Title: Shepherd
Summary: When a young minister struggles with the death of his only son, he is forced to question his faith as he searches for meaning in a time of suffering.

Title: The Brave Little Toaster
Summary: A group of dated appliances embark on a journey to the city to find their master after being abandoned in a cabin in the woods.

Title: The Message
Summary: This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Prophet Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.

Title: The Skeleton Twins
Summary: Having both coincidentally cheated death on the same day, estranged twins reunite with the possibility of mending their relationship.

Title: Edge of the World
Summary: The adventures of Sir James Brooke, who defied the British Empire to rule a jungle kingdom in 1840s Borneo, embarked on a lifelong crusade to end piracy, slavery and head-hunting, and inspired LORD JIM and THE MAN WHO WOULD BE KING.

Title: Phoenix the Warrior
Summary: In a post-apocalyptic world, women warriors battle each other from junkyards to gravel pits as they determine the fate of the entire world.

Title: Hell Fest
Summary: A masked serial killer turns a horror-themed amusement park into his own personal playground, terrorizing a group of friends while the rest of the patrons believe that it is all part of the show.

Title: The Discovery
Summary: Two years after the afterlife is scientifically proven, a man attempts to help a young woman break away from her dark past.

Title: Heat 2
Summary: Sequel of Heat (1995). Gives the background and conclusion of the major characters' story.

Title: Heist
Summary: A career jewel thief finds himself at tense odds with his longtime partner, a crime boss who sends his nephew to keep watch.

Title: Spring
Summary: A young man in a personal tailspin flees from US to Italy, where he sparks up a romance with a woman harboring a dark, primordial secret.

Title: Terror on the Prairie
Summary: On the Montana plains, a frontier woman must protect herself against a ruthless gang of outlaws hell-bent on revenge.

Title: A Day of Fury
Summary: When gunslinger Jagade arrives in a law-abiding god-fearing town he manages to turn the townsfolk into scoff-law sinners while the town Marshal is powerless due to a moral debt to Jagade.

Title: Ilsa: She Wolf of the SS
Summary: Ilsa is an evil Nazi warden at a death camp that conducts "medical experiments." Ilsa's goal is to prove women can withstand more pain and suffering than men, and therefore should be allowed to fight on the front lines.

Title: Mindcage
Summary: When a copycat strikes, two detectives ask a top serial killer for help.

Title: Midnight
Summary: A serial killer ruthlessly hunts down a deaf woman through the streets of South Korea after she witnesses his brutal crime.

Title: The Scarlet Letter
Summary: An affair between a young woman and a pastor has disastrous consequences.

Title: The Relic
Summary: A homicide detective and an anthropologist try to destroy a South American lizard-like god, who's on a people eating rampage in a Chicago museum.

Title: Good Night, and Good Luck.
Summary: Broadcast journalist Edward R. Murrow looks to bring down Senator Joseph McCarthy.

Title: Dance Flick
Summary: Street dancer Thomas Uncles is from the wrong side of the tracks, but his bond with the beautiful Megan White might help the duo realize their dreams as they enter in the mother of all dance battles.

Title: The Folks
Summary: Mary receives a visit from his brother and mother, whom she had never met previously, following her husband's funeral. Mary finds out that her late husband's relatives are harmful for both herself and her son Tony.

Title: Babette's Feast
Summary: During the late 19th century, a strict religious community in a Danish village takes in a French refugee from the Franco-Prussian War as a servant to the late pastor's daughters.

Title: Andrei Rublev
Summary: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

Title: Untitled Spider-Man Sequel
Summary: Plot under wraps

Title: Cell
Summary: When a mysterious cell phone signal causes apocalyptic chaos, an artist is determined to reunite with his young son in New England.

Title: The Asphalt Jungle
Summary: A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.

Title: The Avengers
Summary: Two British Agents team up to stop Sir August de Wynter from destroying the world with a weather-changing machine.

Title: A Star Is Born
Summary: A film star helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career on a downward spiral.

Title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
Summary: Janey is new in town and soon meets Lynne, who shares her passion for dancing in general and "Dance TV" in particular.

Title: Secret Obsession
Summary: Recuperating from trauma, Jennifer remains in danger as she returns to a life she doesn't remember.

Title: Joe Bell
Summary: The true story of a small-town, working-class father who embarks on a walk across the U.S. to crusade against bullying after his son is tormented in high school for being gay. Meanwhile, he realizes he is instead missing out on his son's life back at home.

Summary: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

Title: The Cost
Summary: Intent on dispensing their own brutal form of justice, two ordinary men abduct a felon who committed a horrific crime many years before.

Title: Up in Smoke
Summary: Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

Title: My Best Friend's Girl
Summary: Tank faces the ultimate test of friendship when his best friend hires him to take his ex-girlfriend out on a lousy date in order to make her realize how great her former boyfriend is.

Title: A Christmas Prince: The Royal Wedding
Summary: A year after helping Richard get to the throne, Amber is about to become his wife. But is she really made to be queen?

Title: Regarding Henry
Summary: After being shot, a lawyer loses his memory and must relearn speech and mobility, but he has a loving family to support him.

Title: Wildlife
Summary: A teenage boy must deal with his mother's complicated response after his father temporarily abandons them to take a menial and dangerous job.

Title: A Mighty Wind
Summary: Mockumentary captures the reunion of 1960s folk trio the Folksmen as they prepare for a show at The Town Hall to memorialize a recently deceased concert promoter.

Title: Galaxy of Terror
Summary: A ragtag spaceship crew sent on a rescue mission encounter a formidable enemy, their worst fears projected by their own imaginations.

Title: Auntie Mame
Summary: An orphan goes to live with his free-spirited aunt. Conflict ensues when the executor of his father's estate objects to the aunt's lifestyle.

Title: The Psychopath Life Coach

Title: Random Hearts
Summary: Police Sergeant Dutch Van Den Broek (Harrison Ford) and U.S. Representative Kay Chandler (Dame Kristin Scott Thomas) lose their spouses in a plane crash, and they soon discover that their spouses were having an affair with each other.

Summary: Tensions rise when trailblazing blues singer Ma Rainey and her band gather at a recording studio in Chicago in 1927.

Director: Maggie Levin(segment Shredding),Tyler MacIntyre(segment The Gawkers),Maggie Levin,Flying Lotus(segment Ozzy's Dungeon),Flying Lotus,Tyler MacIntyre

Title: Unfriended: Dark Web
Summary: A teen comes into possession of a new laptop and soon discovers that the previous owner is not only watching him but will also do anything to get it back.

Title: Blood Father
Summary: An ex-con reunites with his estranged wayward 17-year old daughter to protect her from drug dealers who are trying to kill her.

Title: American Renegades
Summary: A team of Navy SEALs discover an underwater treasure in a Bosnian lake of Nazi stolen Gold. An updated Kellys heroes.

Title: Mom and Dad
Summary: A teenage girl and her younger brother must survive a wild 24 hours during which a mass hysteria of unknown origin causes parents to turn violently on their own kids.

Title: The Stuff
Summary: A delicious, mysterious goo that oozes from the earth is marketed as the newest dessert sensation, but the tasty treat rots more than teeth when zombie-like snackers who only want to consume more of the strange substance at any cost begin infesting the world.

Title: Close Your Eyes

Title: Mister Organ
Summary: Journalist David Farrier (Tickled) is drawn into a game of cat and mouse with a mysterious individual. Delving deeper he unearths a trail of court cases, royal bloodlines and ruined lives, in this true story of psychological warfare.

Title: Tales That Witness Madness
Summary: A psychiatrist tells stories of four special cases to a colleague.

Title: Henry V
Summary: In the midst of the Hundred Years War, the young King Henry V of England embarks on the conquest of France in 1415.

Title: How to Lose Friends & Alienate People
Summary: A British writer struggles to fit in at a high-profile magazine in New York City.

Title: Tampopo
Summary: A truck driver stops at a small family-run noodle shop and decides to help its fledgling business. The story is intertwined with various vignettes about the relationship of love and food.

Title: Amarcord
Summary: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.

Title: Caged Fury
Summary: Discontent leads to a daring escape plan in a women's prison where the inmates are all lingerie clad models and the lesbian warden demands unusual favours for early parole.

Title: Stonehearst Asylum
Summary: An Oxford graduate takes up a job in a mental asylum, only to discover that the "revolutionary" new treatments are inhumane, and that there is more going on than meets the eye.

Title: I Am Not a Serial Killer
Summary: In a small Midwestern town, a troubled teen with homicidal tendencies must hunt down and destroy a supernatural killer while keeping his own inner demons at bay.

Title: Sissy
Summary: Teen best friends Cecilia and Emma, run into each other after a decade. Cecilia is invited to Emma's bachelorette weekend where she gets stuck in a remote cabin with her high school bully and a taste for revenge.

Title: Burning Days
Summary: Emre, a young prosecutor newly appointed to the small town of Yaniklar, finds himself being pulled into a political conflict during his first criminal investigation.

Title: Demons
Summary: A group of random people are invited to a screening of a mysterious movie, only to find themselves trapped in the theater with ravenous demons.

Title: Paris, je t'aime

Director: Gurinder Chadha(segment Quais de Seine),Gurinder Chadha,Olivier Assayas(segment Quartier des Enfants Rouges),Frédéric Auburtin,Olivier Assayas,Frédéric Auburtin(segment Quartier Latin" - transitions)

Title: Ride Along
Summary: Security guard Ben must prove himself to his girlfriend's brother, top police officer James. He rides along James on a 24-hour patrol of Atlanta.

Title: The Stranger
Summary: An investigator from the War Crimes Commission travels to Connecticut to find an infamous Nazi.

Title: 5 Centimeters per Second
Summary: Told in three interconnected segments, Takaki tells the story of his life as cruel winters, cold technology, and finally, adult obligations and responsibility converge to test the delicate petals of love.

Title: Lost and Delirious
Summary: After starting at an upmarket boarding school, a teenage girl forms close friendships with her two older roommates. However, when she discovers that her new friends are lovers she finds herself caught in a complicated situation.

Title: Life with Mikey
Summary: A once-popular actor who now runs a talent agency specializing in child acts is trying to discover the next star. He gets more than he bargained for when he recruits a child pickpocket.

Title: Impuratus
Summary: A police detective Clayton Douglas (Tom Sizemore) is summoned to a remote hospital to witness a mysterious Civil War veteran's outrageous death-bed confession that forces him to accept the supernatural.

Title: Satyaprem Ki Katha
Summary: A middle-class boy in Ahmedabad, Satyaprem falling in one-sided love with Katha, who is coping with her breakup with Tapan. Through the journey, they discover each other's life and complement in accomplishing what was left halfway.

Title: Joe
Summary: An ex-con, who is the unlikeliest of role models, meets a 15-year-old boy and is faced with the choice of redemption or ruin.

Title: Life as a House
Summary: When a man is diagnosed with terminal cancer, he takes custody of his misanthropic teenage son, for whom quality time means getting high, engaging in small-time prostitution, and avoiding his father.

Title: The Space Between Us

Title: Tell No One
Summary: An accidental discovery near a doctor's estate stirs up some painful memories eight years after his wife's hideous murder, and now, things are bound to take a turn for the unexpected. Does the good doctor know more than he's letting on?

Title: Byzantium
Summary: Residents of a coastal town learn, with deathly consequences, the secret shared by the two mysterious women who have sought shelter at a rundown hotel.

Title: Plan 9 from Outer Space
Summary: Evil aliens attack Earth and set their terrible "Plan 9" into action. As the aliens resurrect the dead of the Earth, the lives of the living are in danger.

Title: Sorority Row
Summary: A group of sorority sisters try to cover up the death of their house-sister after a prank gone wrong, only to be stalked by a serial killer.

Title: She's Out of Control
Summary: When an average-looking teenage girl gets a makeover, it's enough to make her father become overprotective of her.

Title: Cobweb
Summary: Described as an experimental and genre-defying drama shot entirely on sound stages in support of a film-within-a-film narrative.

Title: Lions for Lambs
Summary: Injuries sustained by two Army rangers behind enemy lines in Afghanistan set off a sequence of events involving a congressman, a journalist and a professor.

Summary: A widower with ten children falls for a widow with eight, and they must decide about forming a huge, unconventional family.

Title: Respect

Title: The World According to Garp
Summary: A struggling young writer finds his life and work dominated by his unfaithful wife and his radical feminist mother, whose best-selling manifesto turns her into a cultural icon.

Title: Paris, 13th District
Summary: Émilie meets Camille who is attracted to Nora, who crosses paths with Amber. Three girls and a boy - they're friends, sometimes lovers and often both.

Summary: During their college years, Anjali was in love with her best-friend Rahul, but he had eyes only for Tina. Years later, Rahul and the now-deceased Tina's eight-year-old daughter attempts to reunite her father and Anjali.

Title: Untitled Guy Ritchie's Action Movie
Summary: Revolves around two extraction specialists who have to designate a route of escape for a senior female negotiator.

Title: The Women
Summary: A wealthy New Yorker wrestles with the decision to leave her cheating husband, as she and her friends discover that women really can have it all.

Title: Bajirao Mastani
Summary: An account of the romance between the Maratha general, Baji Rao I and Mastani, princess of Bundelkhand.

Title: Passenger 57
Summary: An airline security expert must take action when he finds himself trapped on a passenger jet when terrorists seize control of it.

Title: Mank

Title: Fury
Summary: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.

Title: Clue
Summary: Six guests are anonymously invited to a strange mansion for dinner, but after their host is killed, they must cooperate with the staff to identify the murderer as the bodies pile up.

Title: The Avengers
Summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

Title: The Game
Summary: After a wealthy San Francisco banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down as he begins to question if it might really be a concealed conspiracy to destroy him.

Summary: In 1990s Pittsburgh, a medicine peddler starts a relationship with a young woman suffering from Parkinson's disease.

Title: Amsterdam
Summary: In the 1930s, three friends witness a murder, are framed for it, and uncover one of the most outrageous plots in American history.

Title: The Little Rascals
Summary: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.

Title: Theater Camp
Summary: The eccentric staff of a rundown theater camp in upstate New York must band together with the beloved founder's bro-y son to keep the camp afloat.

Title: Holidate

Title: Pippa

Summary: An F.B.I. Agent and an Interpol Detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances, and reward their audiences with the money.

Summary: A family man is drafted to fight in a future war where the fate of humanity relies on his ability to confront the past.

Title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage

Title: M3GAN
Summary: A robotics engineer at a toy company builds a life-like doll that begins to take on a life of its own.

Title: Dances with Wolves
Summary: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, finds himself engaging with a neighbouring Sioux settlement, causing him to question his own purpose.

Title: Mrs. Doubtfire
Summary: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

Title: Into the Wild
Summary: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

Title: Clueless
Summary: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other.

Summary: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

Title: Zootopia
Summary: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

Title: Nobody
Summary: A docile family man slowly reveals his true character after his house gets burgled by two petty thieves, which, coincidentally, leads him into a bloody war with a Russian crime boss.

Title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
Summary: Robin Hood decides to fight back as an outlaw when faced with the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham.

Title: Baywatch
Summary: Devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon butts heads with a brash new recruit, as they uncover a criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay.

Title: Sunshine
Summary: A team of international astronauts is sent on a dangerous mission to reignite the dying Sun with a nuclear fission bomb in 2057.

Title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
Summary: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

Title: The King
Summary: Hal, wayward prince and heir to the English throne, is crowned King Henry V after his tyrannical father dies. Now the young king must navigate palace politics, the war his father left behind, and the emotional strings of his past life.

Title: 57 Seconds
Summary: When a tech blogger lands an interview with a tech guru and stops an attack on him, he finds a mysterious ring that takes him back 57 seconds into the past.

Title: Reservoir Dogs
Summary: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

Title: Knock Knock
Summary: A devoted husband and father helps two stranded young women who knock on his door, but his kind gesture turns into a dangerous seduction and a deadly game of cat and mouse.

Title: The Family Plan

Title: Lost in Translation
Summary: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

Title: The Counselor
Summary: A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.

Title: The Mask
Summary: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

Title: First Blood
Summary: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

Title: The Handmaiden
Summary: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

Title: American Gangster
Summary: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

Title: The Mummy
Summary: At an archaeological dig in the ancient city of Hamunaptra, an American serving in the French Foreign Legion accidentally awakens a mummy who begins to wreak havoc as he searches for the reincarnation of his long-lost love.

Title: Baby Driver
Summary: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

Title: Girls to Buy
Summary: It follows a young woman who becomes an escort as a way of getting out of her small town, but she soon discovers she has no control over her situation.

Title: Chicken Run
Summary: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

Title: The Help

Title: Basic Instinct
Summary: A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist.

Title: Jaws
Summary: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Cape Cod, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

Title: Bohemian Rhapsody
Summary: The story of the legendary British rock band Queen and lead singer Freddie Mercury, leading up to their famous performance at Live Aid (1985).

Title: Hamilton
Summary: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

Title: Les Misérables
Summary: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

Title: Bholaa
Summary: After getting out of prison with the desire to meet his daughter, Bholaa's plans are interrupted by a well-orchestrated drug bust.

Title: Nell
Summary: In a remote woodland cabin, a small-town doctor discovers Nell - a beautiful young hermit-woman with many secrets.

Title: Contraband
Summary: To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.

Title: Mac and Me
Summary: An alien trying to escape from NASA is befriended by a wheelchair-bound boy.

Title: Space Sweepers
Summary: Set in the year 2092 and follows the crew of a space junk collector ship called The Victory. When they discover a humanoid robot named Dorothy that's known to be a weapon of mass destruction, they get involved in a risky business deal.

Title: Malibu Express
Summary: A womanizing private detective is assigned the task of investigating who is behind the hi-tech computer technology leaks to the Russians.

Title: Max Lucado's Because of Bethlehem

Title: Hide and Seek
Summary: As a widower tries to piece together his life in the wake of his wife's suicide, his daughter finds solace, at first, in her imaginary friend.

Title: El Mariachi
Summary: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.

Title: Wendell & Wild
Summary: Two scheming demon brothers, Wendell and Wild, enlist the aid of 13-year-old Kat Elliot to summon them to the Land of the Living.

Title: Race

Title: Green Zone

Title: Inherit the Wind
Summary: Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a Tennessee science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.

Title: All Is Lost
Summary: After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face.

Title: Somewhere
Summary: After withdrawing to the Chateau Marmont, a passionless Hollywood actor reexamines his life when his eleven-year-old daughter surprises him with a visit.

Title: At the End of Eight
Summary: Three young participants sneak into the home of a complete stranger as part of a popular but highly illegal game. The game requires the three players to stay inside for eight hours without being discovered.

Title: Mosul
Summary: A police unit from Mosul fight to liberate the Iraqi city from thousands of ISIS militants.

Title: Possession
Summary: A pair of literary sleuths unearth the amorous secret of two Victorian poets only to find themselves falling under a passionate spell.

Title: Friends and Strangers
Summary: Follows two upper-middle class wanderers in a dryly comic exploration displacement and ennui in contemporary Australia.

Title: Elizabethtown
Summary: During a hometown memorial for his Kentucky-born father, a young man begins an unexpected romance with a too-good-to-be-true stewardess.

Title: Athena
Summary: Hours after the tragic death of their youngest brother in unexplained circumstances, three siblings have their lives thrown into chaos.

Title: Night of the Living Dead
Summary: When the unburied dead return to life and seek human victims, seven refugees shelter in a house in the Pennsylvanian countryside.

Title: Three Colors: Red
Summary: A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.

Title: Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day
Summary: Guinevere Pettigrew, a middle-aged London governess, finds herself unfairly dismissed from her job. An attempt to gain new employment catapults her into the glamorous world and dizzying social whirl of an American actress and singer, Delysia Lafosse.

Title: He Got Game
Summary: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

Title: Mortdecai
Summary: Juggling angry Russians, the British Mi5, and an international terrorist, debonair art dealer and part-time rogue Charlie Mortdecai races to recover a stolen painting rumored to contain a code that leads to lost gold.

Title: Aliens in the Attic
Summary: A group of kids must protect their vacation home from invading aliens.

Summary: As seniors in high school, Troy and Gabriella struggle with the idea of being separated from one another as college approaches. Along with the rest of the Wildcats, they stage a spring musical to address their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.

Title: Bug
Summary: An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.

Title: Vampyros Lesbos
Summary: An erotic horror tale about a vixen vampiress seducing and killing women to appease her insatiable thirst for female blood.

Title: Queen of the Desert
Summary: A chronicle of Gertrude Bell's life, a traveler, writer, archaeologist, explorer, cartographer, and political attaché for the British Empire at the dawn of the twentieth century.

Title: Crawlspace
Summary: A family man finds himself trapped in the crawlspace of a remote Oregon cabin where ruthless poachers have stashed their gains.

Title: Les Misérables
Summary: Valjean, a former criminal, has atoned for his past and now finds himself in the midst of the French Revolution, avoiding a law-obsessed policeman hell-bent on capturing him.

Title: These Final Hours
Summary: A self-obsessed young man makes his way to the party-to-end-all-parties on the last day on Earth, but ends up saving the life of a little girl searching for her father. Their relationship ultimately leads him on the path to redemption.

Title: Kundun

Title: Dave
Summary: An uncanny Presidential lookalike named Dave is recruited by the Secret Service to become a momentary stand-in for the President of the United States.

Title: Ladybugs
Summary: To climb the corporate ladder to success, a guy agrees to coach the company's all-girls soccer team with the help of his secret weapon: his fiancee's son.

Title: Baraka
