Summary: The U.S. President, low in the opinion polls, gets talked into raising his popularity by trying to start a cold war against Canada.

Title: The Falcon and the Snowman
Summary: The true story of a disillusioned military contractor employee and his drug pusher childhood friend who became walk-in spies for the Soviet Union.

Title: Winter Sleep
Summary: A hotel owner and landlord in a remote Turkish village deals with conflicts within his family and a tenant behind on his rent.

Title: Accident Man
Summary: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

Title: By the Sea
Summary: A couple tries to repair their marriage while staying at a hotel in France.

Title: Sunrise in Heaven
Summary: A true love story that spans a lifetime but eventually results in a painful loss of love. Jan is the daughter of an overly protective military father, but that doesn't stop her from falling love with Steve, a young GI in the Air Force.

Title: The 39 Steps
Summary: In London, a diplomat accidentally becomes involved in the death of a British agent who's after a spy ring that covets British military secrets.

Title: Queen Margot
Summary: Young Queen Margot finds herself trapped in an arranged marriage amidst a religious war between Catholics and Protestants. She hopes to escape with a new lover, but finds herself imprisoned by her powerful and ruthless family.

Title: Happy Feet Two
Summary: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

Title: Linoleum
Summary: When the host of a failing children's science show endeavors to achieve his childhood dream of becoming an astronaut by constructing a rocket ship in his garage, a series of bizarre events occur that cause him to question his own reality.

Title: Children of the Corn
Summary: The film describes the events leading up to, and including, the massacre of the adults of a small town in Nebraska by their children, after the adults' irresponsibility ruins the crop and the children's future.

Title: Killer Elite
Summary: When his mentor is taken captive by a disgraced Arab sheik, a killer-for-hire is forced into action. His mission: kill three members of Britain's elite Special Air Service responsible for his sons' deaths.

Title: 7 Women and a Murder
Summary: 7 women find themselves dealing with a mystery killing. Who's the killer and what are the motives of the murder?

Title: Breakfast on Pluto
Summary: In the 1970s, a young trans woman, Patrick "Kitten" Braden, comes of age by leaving her Irish town for London, in part to look for her mother and in part because her gender identity is beyond the town's understanding.

Title: Alfie
Summary: A cockney womanizer learns the hard way about the dangers of his actions.

Title: A Little Chaos
Summary: Two talented landscape artists become romantically entangled while building a garden in King Louis XIV's palace at Versailles.

Title: What Men Want
Summary: A woman is boxed out by the male sports agents in her profession, but gains an unexpected edge over them when she develops the ability to hear men's thoughts.

Title: Party Girl
Summary: A 20-something, irresponsible party girl is bailed out of jail by her librarian godmother. To repay the loan, she starts working at the library and gradually turns her life around.

Title: My Darling Clementine
Summary: After their cattle are stolen and their brother murdered, the Earp brothers have a score to settle with the Clanton family.

Title: Interstate 60: Episodes of the Road
Summary: Neal Oliver, a very confused young artist, takes a journey of a lifetime on a highway that doesn't exist on any map, going to places he's never heard of, searching for an answer and his dream girl.

Title: The Babysitter
Summary: A teenage babysitter is the focus of two boys and a man's separate obsessions.

Title: D.E.B.S.
Summary: Plaid-skirted schoolgirls are groomed by a secret government agency to become the newest members of the elite national-defense group, D.E.B.S.

Title: Psycho II
Summary: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.

Title: Madam Kitty
Summary: Kitty runs a brothel in Nazi Germany where the soldiers come to "relax". Recording devices have been installed in each room by a power-hungry army official, who plans to use the information to blackmail Hitler and gain power himself.

Title: Are We There Yet?
Summary: To impress a foxy divorcee, ladies' man Nick offers to take her kids on an extended road trip, unaware of the torture he's in for.

Title: Secret in Their Eyes
Summary: A tight-knit team of rising investigators, along with their supervisor, is suddenly torn apart when they discover that one of their own teenage daughters has been brutally murdered.

Title: Elles
Summary: On her latest assignment, a journalist for Elle immerses herself in a prostitution ring run by university students.

Title: Keanu
Summary: When the adorable kitten of an L.A. crime kingpin unexpectedly enters the life of two cousins, they will have to go through tough gangs, pitiless hit-men, and ruthless drug dealers who all claim him, to get him back. How hard can it be?

Title: The 7th Voyage of Sinbad
Summary: When a princess is shrunken by an evil wizard, Sinbad must undertake a quest to an island of monsters to cure her and prevent a war.

Title: The Innocents
Summary: A young governess for two children becomes convinced that the house and grounds are haunted.

Title: The Great Battle
Summary: A historical film about the siege of Ansi Fortress and the epic eighty-eight day battle that Yang Man-chun and his Goguryeo troops fought against 500,000 invading Tang dynasty men to defend it.

Title: The Big Year
Summary: Two bird enthusiasts try to defeat the cocky, cutthroat world record holder in a year-long bird-spotting competition.

Title: Seconds
Summary: An unhappy middle-aged banker agrees to a procedure that will fake his death and give him a completely new look and identity - one that comes with its own price.

Title: Needful Things
Summary: A mysterious new shop opens in a small town which always seems to stock the deepest desires of each shopper, with a price far heavier than expected.

Title: Murder at Yellowstone City
Summary: A former slave arrives in Yellowstone City, Montana, a desolate former boomtown now on the decline, looking for a place to call home. On that same day, a local prospector discovers gold - and is murdered.

Title: The White Tiger
Summary: An ambitious Indian driver uses his wit and cunning to escape from poverty and rise to the top. An epic journey based on the New York Times bestseller.

Title: Spirited Away: Live on Stage
Summary: A young girl arriving in a new neighborhood, enters the world of spirits, and when her parents are turned into pigs she must go on a quest to rescue them.

Title: District B13
Summary: In the ghettos of Paris in 2010, an undercover cop and an ex-thug try to infiltrate a gang in order to defuse a neutron bomb.

Title: Some Girls
Summary: Michael flies up to French Canada to visit his girlfriend and her wacky family. She doesn't love him anymore, the grandma mistakes him for her late husband, the sister appears naked and makes advances, the dad likes to be naked as well.

Title: Control
Summary: A profile of Ian Curtis, the enigmatic singer of Joy Division whose personal, professional, and romantic troubles led him to commit suicide at the age of 23.

Title: Diabolique
Summary: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal plan to murder him with what they believe is the perfect alibi.

Title: Southern Comfort
Summary: During a routine exercise, a team of National Guards are threatened by angry and violent locals.

Title: The Wife
Summary: A wife questions her life choices as she travels to Stockholm to see her husband receive the Nobel Prize for Literature.

Title: Bleed for This
Summary: The inspirational story of World Champion Boxer Vinny Pazienza who, after a near fatal car crash which left him not knowing if he'd ever walk again, made one of sports' most incredible comebacks.

Title: Baskin
Summary: A squad of unsuspecting cops go through a trapdoor to Hell when they stumble upon a Black Mass in an abandoned building.

Title: Beneath the Valley of the Ultra-Vixens
Summary: Believe it or not even in Smalltown USA there are still people who are unfulfilled and unrelieved in the midst of plenty. Levonna and Lamar could have the perfect relationship if it were not Lamar's obsession with rear entry.

Title: Panama
Summary: An ex-marine is hired by a defense contractor to travel to Panama to complete an arms deal. In the process he becomes involved with the U.S. invasion of Panama, and learns an important lesson about the true nature of political power.

Title: Bliss
Summary: A newly married happy couple visits a sex therapist to determine why the wife can't achieve an orgasm with her husband. This causes a horrific suppressed memory to emerge and she becomes more and more distant.

Title: Django/Zorro
Summary: Several years after the events of Zencirsiz Canqo (2012), Django meets Don Diego de la Vega, the famed Zorro, and agrees to become his bodyguard on a mission to free the local aboriginal population from slavery.

Title: Johnny Puff: Secret Mission
Summary: Follows Johnny Puff and his friends as they embark on a secret mission to save Taigasville from the evil plans of Otto von Walrus.

Title: The Killer
Summary: Ah Jong trying to make amends and pay for a cornea transplant to restore the sight of a beautiful young singer Jennie. He has to face several challenges in this endeavor but he is a man of principle and morals.

Title: Hungry Dog Blues
Summary: A small town crime thriller set in rural Missouri about two estranged half brothers that kidnap the lead witness against their incarcerated father in order to prove his innocence.

Title: Teorema
Summary: A mysterious young man seduces each member of a bourgeois family. When he suddenly leaves, how will their lives change?

Title: Dagon
Summary: A boating accident runs a young man and woman ashore in a decrepit Spanish fishing town which they discover is in the grips of an ancient sea god and its monstrous half human offspring.

Title: The Omega Man
Summary: Dr Robert Neville has developed an experimental vaccine which makes him the only immune survivor of a biological catastrophe. A gang of homicidal mutants blame science for their condition and attempt to kill him.

Title: To Be or Not to Be
Summary: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

Title: Total Eclipse
Summary: Young, wild poet Arthur Rimbaud and his mentor Paul Verlaine engage in a fierce, forbidden romance while feeling the effects of a hellish artistic lifestyle.

Title: Magic
Summary: A ventriloquist is at the mercy of his vicious dummy while he tries to renew a romance with his high school sweetheart.

Title: Megan Leavey
Summary: Based on the true life story of a young Marine corporal whose unique discipline and bond with her military combat dog saved many lives during their deployment in Iraq.

Title: Say You Will
Summary: A recent high school graduate cares for his mother and navigates his first relationship in the wake of his father's suicide.

Title: Pet Sematary II
Summary: A teenage boy and his father move to his recently-deceased mother's hometown, where they encounter the ancient Native American cemetery with the power to raise the dead.

Title: Stay Alive
Summary: For a group of teens, the answer to the mysterious death of their old friend lies within the world of an online video game based on the true story of an ancient noblewoman known as the Blood Countess.

Title: Hunt
Summary: The International Unit and The Domestic Unit of the Korean Spy Agency are tasked with the mission of uncovering a North Korean Spy known as Donglim who is deeply embedded within their agency.

Title: Memoria
Summary: A woman from Scotland, while traveling in Colombia, begins to notice strange sounds. Soon she begins to think about their appearance.

Title: Walking Tall
Summary: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser, who almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

Title: Michael
Summary: Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.

Title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
Summary: A journalist recounts her wartime coverage in Afghanistan.

Title: The Last Boy on Earth
Summary: In a distant future, an enigmatic boy becomes the central figure in the search for a new hope. Who is this kid? Why is everyone looking for him? Sometimes it is better not to know certain answers.

Title: Dark Water
Summary: A mother and daughter, still wounded from a bitter custody dispute, hole up in a run-down apartment building, where they are targeted by the ghost of a former resident.

Title: Memphis Belle
Summary: In 1943, the crew of a B-17 based in the UK prepares for its 25th and final bombing mission over Germany before returning home to the USA.

Title: Woman in the Dunes
Summary: An entomologist on vacation is trapped by local villagers into living with a woman whose life task is shoveling sand for them.

Title: Turkey Shoot
Summary: In a dystopian future where deviants are held in "re-education" camps, a freedom fighter and an innocent prisoner try to survive their decadent oppressors' game of kill-or-be-killed.

Title: The Man with the Iron Fists
Summary: On the hunt for a fabled treasure of gold, a band of warriors, assassins, and a rogue British soldier descend upon a village in feudal China, where a humble blacksmith looks to defend himself and his fellow villagers.

Title: Santa Sangre
Summary: A former circus artist escapes from a mental hospital to rejoin his armless mother - the leader of a strange religious cult - and is forced to enact brutal murders in her name as he becomes "her arms".

Title: 24 Hour Party People
Summary: In 1976, Tony Wilson sets up Factory Records and brings Manchester's music to the world.

Title: Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters
Summary: A fictionalized account in four chapters of the life of celebrated Japanese writer Yukio Mishima.
A man's life is derailed when an ominous pattern of events repeats itself in exactly the same manner every day, ending at precisely 2:22 p.m.

Title: Kiss Me Deadly
Summary: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".

Title: Quarantine
Summary: A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.

Title: Easy Money
Summary: To inherit his mother-in-law's colossal fortune, a hard-living gambling addict must change his unhealthy ways before they get the best of him.

Title: The Epidemic
Summary: Group of people find themselves trapped in States from Zombies.

Title: The Divide
Summary: Survivors of a nuclear attack are grouped together for days in the basement of their apartment building, where fear and dwindling supplies wear away at their dynamic.

Title: Cosmopolis
Summary: Riding across Manhattan in a stretch limo in order to get a haircut, a 28-year-old billionaire asset manager's day devolves into an odyssey with a cast of characters that start to tear his world apart.

Title: Death in Venice
Summary: While recovering in Venice, sickly composer Gustav von Aschenbach becomes dangerously fixated with teenager Tadzio.

Title: Duck Butter
Summary: Two women, who are dissatisfied with the dishonesty they see in dating and relationships, decide to make a pact to spend 24 hours together hoping to find a new way to create intimacy.

Title: Trapped in Paradise
Summary: Residents of a friendly Pennsylvania town foil three brothers' plan to rob a bank on Christmas Eve.

Title: W.
Summary: A chronicle of the life and Presidency of George W. Bush.

Title: Captain America
Summary: Frozen in the ice for decades, Captain America is freed to battle against archcriminal The Red Skull.

Title: War and Peace
Summary: Napoleon's tumultuous relations with Russia, including his disastrous 1812 invasion, serve as the backdrop for the tangled personal lives of two aristocratic families.

Title: North
Summary: Sick of the neglect he receives from his mom and dad, a young boy leaves home and travels the world in search of new parents.

Title: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
Summary: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new-found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.

Title: Possum
Summary: After returning to his childhood home, a disgraced children's puppeteer is forced to confront his wicked stepfather and the secrets that have tortured his entire life.

Title: P2
Summary: A businesswoman is pursued by a psychopath after being locked in a parking garage on Christmas Eve.

Title: Vixen!
Summary: A naive bush pilot flies tourists to the wilderness of NW Canada while his nympho wife gets lonely - or does she? A Mountie, a married couple and her biker brother drop by while hubby's away.

Title: Rim of the World
Summary: Four misfit campers must band together and conquer their fears in order to save the world during an alien invasion.

Title: Profile
Summary: An undercover British journalist infiltrates the online propaganda channels of the so-called Islamic State, only to be sucked in by her recruiter.

Title: Devdas
Summary: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.

Title: The Man Who Came to Dinner
Summary: An acerbic critic wreaks havoc when a hip injury forces him to move in with a Midwestern family.

Title: Seneca
Summary: A look at the relationship between Seneca and Nero, the infamous Emperor he mentored since childhood and who accused him of plotting his assassination.

Title: The Center of the World
Summary: A successful computer engineer meets a stripper in a cafe. He offers her $10,000 and she offers three days and nights of no penetration in Vegas.

Title: Outpost
Summary: After a violent attack, a woman searches for strength in the solitude of a lookout job, but is overwhelmed by something darker.

Title: Dirty Mary Crazy Larry
Summary: Down-on-their-luck racers Larry and Deke steal from a supermarket manager to buy a car that will help them advance their racing chances. Their escape does not go as planned when Larry's one-night stand, Mary, tags along for the ride.

Title: The Sixth Sense
Summary: Malcolm Crowe, a child psychologist, starts treating a young boy, Cole, who encounters dead people and convinces him to help them. In turn, Cole helps Malcolm reconcile with his estranged wife.

Title: Mamma Mia!
Summary: The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular 1970s group ABBA.

Title: The King's Man
Summary: In the early years of the 20th century, the Kingsman agency is formed to stand against a cabal plotting a war to wipe out millions.

Title: Jurassic World Dominion
Summary: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, Biosyn operatives attempt to track down Maisie Lockwood, while Dr Ellie Sattler investigates a genetically engineered swarm of giant insects.

Title: Road House
Summary: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.

Title: The Lighthouse
Summary: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

Title: Antichrist
Summary: A grieving couple retreat to their cabin in the woods, hoping to repair their broken hearts and troubled marriage, but nature takes its course and things go from bad to worse.

Title: Caddyshack
Summary: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

Title: Ghoomer
Summary: Anina, a young batting prodigy, loses her right hand in an accident. An unsympathetic, failed cricketer gives her new hope, trains her with unconventional techniques, to turn her fate around. Ghoomer is a new style of bowling they invent.

Title: True Romance
Summary: In Detroit, a pop culture nerd steals cocaine from his new wife's pimp and tries to sell it in Hollywood, prompting the mobsters who own the drugs to pursue the couple.

Title: Thor: Ragnarok
Summary: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

Title: Muzzle
Summary: After his dog is killed in Skid Row, Jake Rosser plummets deep into a sinister underworld to uncover the truth about who may be responsible.

Title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
Summary: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never "done the deed" only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.

Title: Finding Nemo
Summary: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

Title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
Summary: In late 1950s New York, a young underachiever named Tom Ripley is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

Title: Monster
Summary: A mother demands answers from teacher when her son begins acting strangely.

Title: Borderlands
Summary: A feature film based on the popular video game set on the abandoned fictional planet of Pandora where people search for a mysterious relic.

Title: American Underdog
Summary: The story of NFL MVP and Hall of Fame quarterback Kurt Warner, who went from stocking shelves at a supermarket to becoming an American Football star.

Title: Almost Famous
Summary: A high-school boy in the early 1970s is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

Title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
Summary: Professor Albus Dumbledore must assist Newt Scamander and his partners as Grindelwald begins to lead an army to eliminate all Muggles.

Title: The Pale Blue Eye
Summary: A world-weary detective is hired to investigate the murder of a West Point cadet. Stymied by the cadets' code of silence, he enlists one of their own to help unravel the case - a young man the world would come to know as Edgar Allan Poe.

Title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
Summary: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.

Title: Champions
Summary: A former minor-league basketball coach is ordered by the court to manage a team of players with intellectual disabilities. He soon realizes that despite his doubts, together, this team can go further than they ever imagined.

Title: Predator
Summary: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

Title: Cashback
Summary: After a painful breakup, Ben develops insomnia. To kill time, he starts working the late night shift at the local supermarket, where his artistic imagination runs wild.

Title: The Lovely Bones
Summary: Centers on a young girl who has been murdered and watches over her family - and her killer - from purgatory. She must weigh her desire for vengeance against her desire for her family to heal.

Title: Pitch Perfect 2
Summary: After a humiliating command performance at The Kennedy Center, the Barden Bellas enter an international competition that no American group has ever won in order to regain their status and right to perform.

Title: Old
Summary: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day.

Title: The Maze Runner
Summary: Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning they're all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow "runners" for a shot at escape.

Title: From Dusk Till Dawn
Summary: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

Title: Ex Machina
Summary: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

Title: American Fiction
Summary: A novelist who's fed up with the establishment profiting from "Black" entertainment uses a pen name to write a book that propels him to the heart of hypocrisy and the madness he claims to disdain.

Title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
Summary: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape from Earth and return to his home planet.

Title: Silver Linings Playbook
Summary: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

Title: Transformers
Summary: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

Title: Death Proof
Summary: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

Title: The Boys in the Boat
Summary: A 1930s-set story centered on the University of Washington's rowing team, from their Depression-era beginnings to winning gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.

Title: Licorice Pizza
Summary: The story of Alana Kane and Gary Valentine growing up, running around and going through the treacherous navigation of first love in the San Fernando Valley, 1973.

Title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
Summary: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

Title: Joy Ride
Summary: Follows four Asian American friends as they bond and discover the truth of what it means to know and love who you are, while they travel through China in search of one of their birth mothers.

Title: The Parent Trap
Summary: Identical twins Annie and Hallie, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

Title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
Summary: Number one NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion are put to the test.

Title: Strange Bargain
Summary: In order to cash-in a life insurance policy, a failing business owner asks one of his employees, who has financial woes of his own, to aid him in disguising his suicide into a robbery-murder.

Title: The Godfather Part III
Summary: Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

Title: Life Is Beautiful
Summary: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

Title: Man on Fire
Summary: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

Title: When Harry Met Sally...
Summary: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

Title: A Bronx Tale
Summary: Robert De Niro and Chazz Palminteri give captivating performances in this intense drama about a boy torn between his tough, hard-working father and a violent yet charismatic crime boss.

Title: Planet of the Apes
Summary: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a planet where highly intelligent non-human ape species are dominant and humans are enslaved.

Title: Radical
Summary: A teacher in a Mexican border town full of neglect, corruption, and violence, tries a radical new method to unlock their students' curiosity, potential - and maybe even their genius.

Title: Barefoot in the Park
Summary: Paul, a conservative young lawyer, marries the vivacious Corie. Their highly passionate relationship descends into comical discord in a five-flight New York City walk-up apartment.

Title: The Son of No One
Summary: A young cop is assigned to a precinct in the working class neighborhood where he grew up, and an old secret threatens to destroy his life and his family.

Title: Tiptoes
Summary: The story of a peculiar love triangle involving two brothers.

Title: Experiment in Terror
Summary: A man with an asthmatic voice telephones and assaults clerk Kelly Sherwood at home and coerces her into helping him steal a large sum from her bank.

Title: Intolerable Cruelty
Summary: A beautiful gold digger matches wits with a shrewd Beverly Hills divorce lawyer who is increasingly attracted to her.

Title: The Big Easy
Summary: A corrupt lieutenant in the homicide division is threatened by the righteous DA while trying to solve a string of mysterious murders.

Title: Every Secret Thing
Summary: A detective looks to unravel a mystery surrounding missing children and the prime suspects: two young women who, seven years ago, were put away for an infant's death.

Title: The Back-up Plan
Summary: A woman conceives twins through artificial insemination, then meets the man of her dreams on the very same day.

Title: The Big Wedding
Summary: A long-divorced couple fakes being married as their family unites for a wedding.

Title: Self/less
Summary: A dying real estate mogul transfers his consciousness into a healthy young body, but soon finds that neither the procedure nor the company that performed it are quite what they seem.

Title: Three Identical Strangers
Summary: In 1980 New York, three young men who were all adopted meet each other and find out they're triplets who were separated at birth. But their quest to find out why turns into a bizarre and sinister mystery.

Title: The Way of the Wind
Summary: A retelling of several episodes in the life of Jesus.

Title: Destined 2: Christmas Once More
Summary: Theo still misses connecting with his girlfriend, Kim, as he tries to find the most romantic way to propose to her on Christmas.

Title: High Art
Summary: A young female intern at a small magazine company and a drug-addicted lesbian photographer slowly fall in love while exploiting each other to advance their respective careers.

Title: The Unborn
Summary: A young woman fights the spirit that is slowly taking possession of her.

Title: The Big Feast
Summary: A group of men go to a villa in the French countryside where they resolve to eat themselves to death.

Title: Bad Trip
Summary: This mix of a scripted buddy comedy road movie and a real hidden camera prank show follows the outrageous misadventures of two buds stuck in a rut who embark on a cross-country road trip to NYC. The storyline sets up shocking real pranks.

Title: The Desperate Hour
Summary: A mother desperately races against time to save her child as authorities place her small town on lockdown.

Title: Johnny Got His Gun
Summary: During World War I, a patriotic young American is rendered blind, deaf, limbless, and mute by a horrific artillery shell attack. Trapped in what's left of his body, he desperately looks for a way to end his life.

Title: Fanboys
Summary: Star Wars fanatics take a cross-country trip to George Lucas' Skywalker Ranch so their dying friend can see a screening of Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999) before its release.

Title: Maps to the Stars
Summary: A tour into the heart of a Hollywood family chasing celebrity, one another and the relentless ghosts of their pasts.

Title: The Greatest Game Ever Played
Summary: In the 1913 U.S. Open, twenty-year-old Francis Ouimet played golf against his idol, 1900 U.S. Open champion, Englishman Harry Vardon.

Title: Dead Snow
Summary: A ski vacation turns horrific for a group of medical students, as they find themselves confronted by an unimaginable menace: Nazi zombies.

Title: The Wild Geese
Summary: A British banker hires a group of British mercenaries to rescue a deposed African President from the hands of a corrupt African dictator.

Title: A Bit of Light
Summary: Ella, at almost forty, is forced to move back in with her father Alan. She's trying to stay sober having temporarily given up custody of her young daughters to her ex-husband Joseph and his new partner Bethan.

Title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed & Fabulous
Summary: Gracie Hart abandons the life of a field agent to become the public face of the FBI. Yet, when Cheryl Frasier and Stan Fields are kidnapped, she is determined to rescue them, along with her reluctant partner.

Title: Nighthawks
Summary: When one of Europe's most lethal terrorists shows up in New York, an elite undercover cop is assigned to take him down by any means necessary.

Title: The Wolf Man
Summary: Larry Talbot returns to his father's castle in Wales and meets a beautiful woman. One fateful night, Talbot escorts her to a local carnival where they meet a mysterious gypsy fortune teller.

Title: Star 80
Summary: A successful young model finds trouble when her obsessive manager-turned-husband becomes dangerously jealous.

Title: Looking for Mr. Goodbar
Summary: A dedicated schoolteacher spends her nights cruising bars, looking for abusive men with whom she can engage in progressively extreme sexual encounters.

Title: Stone Cold

Title: Pollyanna
Summary: A young girl comes to an embittered town and confronts its attitude with her determination to see the best in life.

Title: Do Not Disturb

Title: Ride On

Title: The Good Liar

Title: Spinning Gold

Title: The Burning Plain

Title: Tess

Title: His Girl Friday

Title: Domino
Summary: A recounting of Domino Harvey's life story. The daughter of actor Laurence Harvey turned away from her career as a Ford model to become a bounty hunter.

Title: Six Swedish Girls in a Boarding School
Summary: Boarding school adventure.

Title: Dark Star
Summary: In the far reaches of space, a small crew, 20 years into their solitary mission, find things beginning to go hilariously wrong.

Title: The Hollars
Summary: A man returns to his small hometown after learning that his mother has fallen ill and is about to undergo surgery.

Title: Anomalisa
Summary: A man crippled by the mundanity of his life experiences something out of the ordinary.

Title: Kodachrome
Summary: Set during the final days of the admired photo development system known as Kodachrome, a father and son hit the road in order to reach the Kansas photo lab before it closes its doors for good.

Title: The Island
Summary: A couple decides to turn their backs on civilization to build their private paradise on a desert island, however a millionaire passing through the island makes them a sensation, causing a European countess to want to take over their island.

Title: Celebrity
Summary: The fortunes of a husband and wife differ drastically after they divorce.

Title: Swades
Summary: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

Title: Heart and Souls

Title: Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead

Title: Tom Thumb

Title: The Riot Club

Title: Gokuraku Sento Busty Hot Water Momi
Summary: Kasuko is a young woman who happens to have huge boobs, and when she goes to the public bath, everyone gathers to see her.

Title: Ruby Sparks

Title: Cradle 2 the Grave

Title: Spellbound

Title: Father Goose

Title: After the Dark

Title: Marry My Dead Body

Title: Imitation of Life

Title: Persepolis

Title: Avenging Angelo

Title: Backcountry
Summary: An urban couple goes camping in the woods and find themselves lost in the territory of a predatory black bear.

Title: Multiplicity
Summary: A man who never has enough time for the things he wants to do is offered the opportunity to have himself duplicated.

Title: Akeelah and the Bee

Title: The Raven

Title: Soapdish

Title: Undercover Brother

Title: The Red Circle
Summary: After leaving prison, master thief Corey crosses paths with a notorious escapee and an alcoholic former policeman. The trio proceed to plot an elaborate heist.

Title: The Guilty

Title: Breakin'

Title: Head Over Heels

Title: Gildersleeve's Ghost

Title: Pom Poko

Summary: Renn Wheeland returns home to Cleveland for his mother's funeral. Once there, he forges new relationships while healing old ones, before confronting his problems and trying to face his grief.

Summary: A widower must look after his precocious daughter and rebuild his life and career after he's sidelined by an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup.

Summary: Thirsty for a following, Kurt Kunkle is a rideshare driver who has figured out a deadly plan to go viral.

Summary: A reforming ex-gangster tries to reconcile with his estranged policeman brother, but the ties to his former gang are difficult to break.

Title: Dangerous Beauty

Title: Jack and the Beanstalk
Summary: Abbott & Costello's version of the famous fairy tale, about a young boy who trades the family cow for magic beans.

Title: Heropanti 2

Summary: Just out of jail, a don is ready to get back at the four friends who conned her.

Summary: Eight horror-loving friends fight for their lives when a killer clown who seems to know the grim secret they share begins to pick them off, one by one.

Title: Buffaloed
Summary: In the underworld of debt-collecting, homegrown hustler Peg Dahl will do anything to escape Buffalo, NY.

Summary: The morning after a party, a young man wakes up to find Paris invaded by zombies.

Summary: An eccentric inventor and his companions travel in his TARDIS to the Planet Skaro and battle the evil menace of the Daleks.

Title: First Love
Summary: The story is described as a poignant look at a young man's difficult entry into adulthood.

A feature film which presents deleted scenes from Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me (1992) assembled together for the first time in an untold portion of the story's prequel.

Summary: A British college student falls for an American student, only to be separated from him when she's banned from the U.S. after overstaying her visa.

Summary: This is the story about a teenage girl's first love experiences.

Summary: A single woman takes the place of a stranger's blind date, which leads to her finding the perfect boyfriend.

Summary: Two extremely strong personalities clash over the computerization of a television network's research department.

Summary: Two strangers' lives become inextricably bound together after a devastating plane crash.

Summary: A young woman disenchanted with love mysteriously finds herself trapped inside a romantic comedy.

Summary: After her father's ship is carried off by a sudden storm, the spunky Pippi Longstocking is stranded with her horse, Alfonso, and monkey, Mr. Nilsson, and takes up residence in the old family home, which is thought by neighborhood children to be haunted. Soon, two children, Tommy and Annika, venture into the house only to meet up with Pippi. The three soon become frien... Read all

Summary: After his mistress runs over a young teen, a Wall Street hotshot sees his life unravel in the spotlight and attracts the interest of a down-and-out reporter.

Summary: A psychiatrist whose client commits suicide finds his family life disrupted after introducing her surviving brother to his wife and daughter.

Summary: Phoebe and a fellow American in Rome find a dog with a $5000 reward. They take a train to the owner in Monte Carlo. She turns up murdered. They run and become suspects just as 3 other Americans on the train.

Summary: A young American couple and a French woman engage in a threesome in the Greek Islands.

Title: Christmas on the Coast
Summary: Cynical novelist Dru Cassadine, known for her romance stories, is desperate for a breakthrough after a string of flops. Spurred by brutal reviews and a threat by her publisher to drop her, she is given just weeks to turn out a best seller.

Title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
Summary: When a former Civil War soldier saves a nun from a gang of bandits, they team up to help the Mexicans in their war against the French.

Title: Shallow Grave

Title: Beauty and the Beast
Summary: An unexpected romance blooms after the the youngest daughter of a merchant who has fallen on hard times offers herself to the mysterious beast to which her father has become indebted.

Title: It's Kind of a Funny Story

Title: Hostile

Title: Totem

Title: Iraivan
Summary: A city lives in fear of a psychotic killer, and confidence in the police wanes. Arjun and Andrew finally arrest the killer, but he escapes and chaos reigns again.

Title: Trust
Summary: In this sexy and twisty ride, New York gallery owner Brooke and her husband Owen each face exceptional temptations, with most unexpected results.

Title: The Apparition

Title: Personal Best
Summary: The intertwined lives and loves of three highly ranked athletes striving for the national team; Chris bounces between the beds of male coach Terry and her female friend, competitor, and role model Tory.

Title: Suddenly, Last Summer

Title: UT69
Summary: Based on harrowing experience in the Arthur Road jail

Title: Midnight Special
Summary: A father and son go on the run, pursued by the government and a cult drawn to the child's special powers.

Title: The Valet
Summary: A movie star enlists a parking valet at a Beverly Hills restaurant to pose as her lover to cover for her relationship with a married man.

Title: The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest
Summary: Lisbeth is recovering in a hospital and awaiting trial for three murders when she is released. Mikael must prove her innocence, but Lisbeth must be willing to share the details of her sordid experiences with the court.

Title: The Apple

Title: Among Wolves

Director: Joe Dante(segments The French Ventiloquist's Dummy" [TV cut & DVD only], "Hairlooming, Bullshit or Not, Critic's Corner, Roast Your Loved One, Reckless Youth),Joe Dante,Peter Horton(segment The Unknown Soldier" [TV cut & DVD only] and "Two I.D.'s),Carl Gottlieb(segments Peter Pan Theater" [TV cut & DVD only], "Pethouse Video, Son of the Invisible Man, Art Sale),Peter Horton,Carl Gottlieb

Title: Faster, Pussycat! Kill! Kill!

Title: Don't Listen
Summary: Daniel and Sara have a 9-year-old son, Eric, and they've just moved to a new home not knowing the neighbours call it "the house of the voices". Eric is the first one to notice the odd noises behind each door.

Title: The Company of Wolves

Summary: The story centers on a year in the life of three men trying to survive a round of corporate downsizing at a major company - and how that affects them, their families, and their communities.

Title: Screamers

Title: Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown

Title: Braven
Summary: A logger defends his family from a group of dangerous drug runners.

Summary: A San Francisco civilian police detective is forced to work on a series of murders with his former enemy commanding officer while dating his daughter.

Summary: Rei helps the woman she's been in love with for years escape her abusive husband. While on the run, their feelings for each other catch fire.

Title: Barefoot
Summary: The "black sheep" son of a wealthy family meets a young psychiatric patient who's been raised in isolation her entire life; he takes this naive young woman home for his brother's wedding.

Title: Kantara

Title: The Vanishing
Summary: The boyfriend of an abducted woman never gives up the search as the abductor looks on.

Title: Tender Mercies

Title: Brazen

Title: My Little Pony: A New Generation
Summary: After the time of the Mane 6, Sunny--a young Earth Pony--and her new Unicorn friend Izzy explore their world and strive to restore Harmony to Equestria.

Summary: A young man and his telepathic dog wander a post-apocalyptic wasteland.

Title: Sandy Wexler
Summary: Sandy Wexler is a talent manager working in Los Angeles in the 1990s, diligently representing a group of eccentric clients on the fringes of show business.

Title: White Palace
Summary: Lust turns to love for a 40-ish working-class woman and a 20-ish yuppie adman with little in common.

Title: I Can't Think Straight
Summary: A young woman engaged to be married finds her life changed forever when she meets her best friend's girlfriend.

Title: The Christmas Venue
Summary: Losing faith in Christmas after a rough breakup, Cait heads home and meets Drew.

Summary: The story revolves around Bauua Singh (Shah Rukh Khan), a vertically challenged man, who is full of charm and wit, with a pinch of arrogance. Born to a wealthy family and raised in an environment of affluence, he is challenged to broaden his horizon and find purpose in life.

Summary: An orphaned teenager is taken in by a Malibu couple but discovers they aren't the caring friends they seemed to be.

Title: The Gate

Title: The Wolf's Call
Summary: In the near future, a French submarine finds itself in a crisis situation.

Title: A Good Old Fashioned Orgy
Summary: A group of 30-year-olds who have been friends since high school attempt to throw an end-of-summer orgy.

Title: Bob & Carol & Ted & Alice

Title: Robert the Bruce

Title: The Gingerdead Man

Title: Devil in a Blue Dress

Title: Disappearance at Clifton Hill
Summary: Follows a troubled young woman returning to her hometown of Niagara Falls, where the memory of a long-ago kidnapping quickly ensnares her.

Title: Kes

Title: Popcorn
Summary: A master of disguise deranged killer begins killing off the college students who are organizing a horror-movie marathon in an abandoned theater.

Title: Tourist Trap

Title: Grotesque
Summary: A doctor kidnaps a young couple and forces them into a game of torment that slowly extinguishes their hopes for survival.

Title: Live Flesh

Title: Jennifer 8

Title: The Spider Labyrinth

Title: Tuff Turf
Summary: The new kid in school must battle a gang of street toughs after stealing the gang leader's girl.

Title: Home Sweet Home
Summary: An escaped mental patient steals a station wagon and makes his way to the Bradleys' Thanksgiving celebration, where he plans to make them a little less thankful...

Title: Fatale

Title: Cannonball Run II

Title: Purple Rain

Title: Arizona Dream
Summary: A young New Yorker goes to Arizona where he finds freedom to both love and dream.

Summary: A horror-obsessed boy discovers his older brother is a serial killer.

Summary: After Queen Elizabeth I commands him not to grow old, a young nobleman struggles with love and his place in the world.

Title: American Me
Summary: A Mexican-American Mafia kingpin is released from prison, falls in love for the first time, and grows introspective about his gangster lifestyle.

Title: The Monster
Summary: A mother and daughter must confront a terrifying monster when they break down on a deserted road.

Title: The Wood
Summary: While dealing with a friend's cold feet on his wedding day, a writer reminisces about his youth with his best friends.
