Title: Iron Eagle
Summary: A young pilot plans a rescue mission when his father, an Air Force Colonel, is shot down over enemy territory and captured.

Title: Our Souls at Night
Summary: Fonda and Redford star as Addie Moore and Louis Waters, a widow and widower who've lived next to each other for years. The pair have almost no relationship, but that all changes when Addie tries to make a connection with her neighbor.

Title: Marty
Summary: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

Title: The Lords of Salem
Summary: Radio DJ Heidi is sent a box containing a record--a "gift from the Lords". The sounds within the grooves trigger flashbacks of her town's violent past. Is Heidi going mad, or are the Lords back to take revenge on Salem, Massachusetts?

Title: The King and I
Summary: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.

Title: Call Jane
Summary: A married woman with an unwanted pregnancy lives in a time in America when she can't get a legal abortion and works with a group of suburban women to find help.

Title: Man on Fire
Summary: A former CIA agent, John Creasy, is hired as a bodyguard for a girl in Italy, who becomes the daughter he never had. When she is abducted, Creasy's fiery rage is unleashed, and despite being badly wounded, embarks on a bloody revenge spree.

Title: Little Nemo: Adventures in Slumberland
Summary: Each night, young Nemo goes to Slumberland and has adventures and befriends the king of Slumberland, Morpheus. But one night Nemo discovers Nightmare Land, and the evil nightmare king, throwing Slumberland and Nemo himself into danger.

Title: Los ritos sexuales del diablo
Summary: A young woman travels to England after the abrupt death of her brother. Staying with her sister-in-law, she finds her companion soon drawn into a satanic cult based in the house, whose rites seem to centre on large-scale sexual congress.

Title: Billy Jack
Summary: Ex-Green Beret hapkido expert saves wild horses from being slaughtered for dog food and helps protect a desert "freedom school" for runaway.

Title: A Dog's Way Home
Summary: A female dog travels four hundred miles in search of her owner throughout a Colorado wilderness.

Title: Roxanne
Summary: The large-nosed C.D. Bales is in love with the beautiful Roxanne; she falls for his personality but another man's looks.

Title: Fruits of Passion
Summary: A girl loves an older man. He demands that she goes in a brothel, as evidence that she loves him.

Title: My Days of Mercy
Summary: The daughter of a man on death row falls in love with a woman on the opposing side of her family's political cause.

Title: The Lady from Shanghai
Summary: Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.

Title: What Just Happened
Summary: Two weeks in the life of a fading Hollywood producer who's having a rough time trying to get his new picture made.

Title: Michael
Summary: The story of the famous musician Michael Jackson, known as the King of Pop.

Title: Necessary Roughness
Summary: Due to NCAA sanctions, the Texas State University Fightin' Armadillos must form a football team from their actual student body, with no scholarships to help, to play their football schedule.

Title: PCU
Summary: A high school senior visits college for the weekend, and stays at the wildest house on campus.

Title: The Final Conflict
Summary: The now adult Antichrist plots to eliminate his future divine opponent while a cabal of monks plot to stop him.

Title: My Son
Summary: Driving in the heart of the Highlands, Edmond Murray receives a call from his ex-wife, in tears. Their 7-year-old son went missing from a campsite. Soon it becomes clear that the child was kidnapped and the parents give way to despair.

Title: Kinsey
Summary: A look at the life of Alfred Kinsey, a pioneer in the area of human sexuality research, whose 1948 publication "Sexual Behavior in the Human Male" was one of the first recorded works that saw science address sexual behavior.

Title: I Love You to Death
Summary: Joey Boca (Kevin Kline) owns a pizza parlor, and is married to Rosalie (Tracey Ullman). He's also a serial womanizer. Rosalie goes to extremes when she finds he has been cheating.

Title: Die in a Gunfight
Summary: In New York City, a young guy falls for the daughter of his father's nemesis.

Title: Brother
Summary: Sons of Caribbean immigrants, Francis and Michael face questions of masculinity, identity and family amid the pulsing beat of Toronto's early hip-hop scene.

Title: Green for Danger
Summary: After the nurse who declares that a recent surgical death was a murder also dies, an enigmatic Scotland Yard inspector arrives to investigate.

Title: Cry Terror!
Summary: Duped by former Army pal Paul Hoplin into building a time-bomb, New York shop owner Jim Molner and his family become hostages of Hoplin who uses bomb-threats to extort money from airlines.

Title: Kazaam
Summary: A troubled kid inadvertently releases a genie, who must grant him any three wishes he requests.

Title: Pee-wee's Big Holiday
Summary: A fateful meeting with a mysterious stranger inspires Pee-wee Herman to take his first holiday ever in this epic story of friendship and destiny.

Title: Gangs of Wasseypur
Summary: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

Title: Nightmare Sisters
Summary: Three geeky college girls who can't get a date, organize a seance and become sex starved vamps.

Title: Austenland
Summary: Obsessed with Pride and Prejudice (1995), a woman travels to a Jane Austen theme park in search for her perfect gentleman.

Title: The Car
Summary: A small desert town is terrorized by a powerful, seemingly possessed car, and the local sheriff may be the only one who can stop it.

Title: A Bittersweet Life
Summary: Things go wrong for a high ranking mobster when he doesn't proceed by his boss's orders.

Title: Hop
Summary: E.B., the Easter Bunny's teenage son, heads to Hollywood, determined to become a drummer in a rock 'n' roll band. In LA, he's taken in by Fred after the out-of-work slacker hits E.B. with his car.

Title: Water Lilies
Summary: After meeting at a local pool over their summer break, a love triangle forms between three adolescent girls, which proves difficult to sustain as they each desire the love of another.

Title: Den of Thieves 2: Pantera
Summary: Plot unknown. A sequel to the 2018 film 'Den of Thieves'.

Title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Once & Always
Summary: The Rangers come face-to-face with a familiar threat from the past. In the midst of a global crisis, they are called on once again to be the heroes the world needs.

Title: Pacific Heights
Summary: A couple work hard to renovate their dream house and become landlords to pay for it. Unfortunately, one of their tenants has plans of his own.

Title: Basket Case
Summary: A young man carrying a big basket that contains his extremely deformed, formerly conjoined twin brother seeks vengeance on the doctors who separated them against their will.

Title: The Chorus
Summary: The new teacher at a severely administered boys' boarding school works to positively affect the students' lives through music.

Title: I'll Always Know What You Did Last Summer
Summary: A group of teenagers in Colorado find themselves being stalked and killed one by one by a mysterious figure with a hook, exactly one year after they covered up a friend's accidental death.

Title: Bindle (One of Them Days)
Summary: Bindle (1966) is an English film directed by Peter Saunders starring Alfie Bass, Johnny Wade and Janina Faye. A brilliant comedy about an accident prone furniture remover and his friend.

Title: Shelter
Summary: When his college dreams are sidelined by family obligations, a young man finds comfort in surfing with his best friend's brother.

Title: The Teasers
Summary: Loredana is a schoolgirl who takes advantage of her fellow students and teachers by using her innocent schoolgirl beauty. After she loses her virginity to an older man she soon realizes there are more important things to life than teasing men.

Title: The Inspection
Summary: A young, gay Black man, rejected by his mother and with few options for his future, decides to join the Marines, doing whatever it takes to succeed in a system that would cast him aside.

Title: Genius
Summary: A chronicle of Max Perkins's time as the book editor at Scribner, where he oversaw works by Thomas Wolfe, Ernest Hemingway, F. Scott Fitzgerald and others.

Title: Deathstalker II
Summary: In this parody of the sword and sorcery films, a princess is deposed by an evil sorcerer. She enlists the aid of Deathstalker to battle the forces of evil, including a clone of the princess, and win back her kingdom.

Title: Malizia 2000
Summary: The teenage son of an architect falls for an older woman, an attractive housewife of his father's client.

Title: When a Man Loves a Woman
Summary: The seemingly perfect relationship between a man and his wife is tested as a result of her alcoholism.

Title: The Weather Man
Summary: A Chicago weather man, separated from his wife and children, debates whether professional and personal success are mutually exclusive.

Title: Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within
Summary: A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.

Title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
Summary: The story of the 1941 Japanese air raid on Pearl Harbor, and the series of preceding American blunders that aggravated its effectiveness.
Director: Kinji Fukasaku,Richard Fleischer,Kinji Fukasaku(Japanese sequences),Toshio Masuda,Toshio Masuda(Japanese sequences)

Title: Drunken Master
Summary: Wong Fei-Hung is a mischievous yet righteous young man, but after a series of incidents his frustrated father has him disciplined by a master of drunken martial arts.

Title: Down in the Valley
Summary: Set in the present-day San Fernando Valley, the project revolves around a delusional man who believes he's a cowboy and the relationship that he starts with a rebellious young woman.

Title: L.A. Story
Summary: With the help of a talking freeway billboard, a wacky weatherman tries to win the heart of an English newspaper reporter, who is struggling to make sense of the strange world of early 1990s Los Angeles.
A naive young man assumes a dead man's identity and finds himself embroiled in an underground world of power, violence, and chance where men gamble behind closed doors on the lives of other men.

Title: Bugsy
Summary: The story of how Benjamin "Bugsy" Siegel started Las Vegas.

Title: A Mouthful of Air
Summary: Julie Davis writes bestselling children's books about unlocking your fears, but has yet to unlock her own. When her daughter is born, that trauma is brought to the fore, and with it, a crushing battle to survive.

Title: White Fang
Summary: Jack London's classic adventure story about the friendship developed between a Yukon gold hunter and the mixed dog-wolf he rescues from the hands of a man who mistreats him.

Title: The Matchmaker's Playbook
Summary: After a career-ending accident, former NFL recruit Ian Hunter is back on campus-and he's ready to get his new game on.

Title: Laws of Attraction
Summary: Amidst a sea of litigation, two New York City divorce lawyers find love.

Title: Harry Brown
Summary: An elderly ex-serviceman and widower looks to avenge his best friend's murder by doling out his own form of justice.

Title: Night of the Creeps
Summary: Alien brain parasites, entering humans through the mouth, turn their host into a killing zombie. Some teenagers start to fight against them.

Title: Peter Rabbit 2: The Runaway
Summary: Thomas and Bea are now married and living with Peter and his rabbit family. Bored of life in the garden, Peter goes to the big city, where he meets shady characters and ends up creating chaos for the whole family.

Title: Ghosts of War
Summary: Five American soldiers assigned to hold a French Chateau near the end of World War II. This unexpected respite quickly descends into madness when they encounter a supernatural enemy more terrifying than anything seen on the battlefield.

Title: Victory
Summary: As allied P.O.W.s prepare for a soccer game against the German National Team to be played in Nazi-occupied Paris, the French Resistance and British officers are making plans for the team's escape.

Title: North Dallas Forty
Summary: A satire of American professional football in which a veteran pass-catcher's individuality and refusal to become part of the team family are bitterly resented by his disciplinarian coaches.

Title: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
Summary: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.

Title: Blindspotting
Summary: While on probation, a man begins to re-evaluate his relationship with his volatile best friend.

Title: The Battleship Island
Summary: During the Japanese colonial era, roughly 400 Korean people, who were forced onto Battleship Island ("Hashima Island") to mine for coal, attempt to a dramatic escape.

Title: Red Shoes and the Seven Dwarfs
Summary: Princes who have been turned into Dwarfs seek the red shoes of a lady in order to break the spell, although it will not be easy. A parody with a twist.

Title: Picnic
Summary: Emotions are ignited among the complacent townsfolk when a handsome drifter arrives in a small Kansas community on the morning of the Labor Day picnic.

Title: Handyman
Summary: A boring woman worries that her man would leave her, so she hires a plumber with ''extra service''. As she falls for him, she's torn between her boyfriend and her new found love.

Title: Arbitrage
Summary: A troubled hedge fund magnate desperate to complete the sale of his trading empire makes an error that forces him to turn to an unlikely person for help.

Title: Frontier(s)
Summary: A gang of young thieves flee Paris during the violent aftermath of a political election, only to hole up at an Inn run by neo-Nazis.

Title: The Double Life of Véronique
Summary: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

Title: Smugglers
Summary: An action crime film set in the 1970s in a small, peaceful village by the sea where two women get unexpectedly caught up in a high-stakes smuggling scheme.

Title: Hitchcock
Summary: The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored.

Title: Joe's Apartment
Summary: A nice guy has just moved to New York and discovers that he must share his run-down apartment with a couple thousand singing, dancing cockroaches.

Title: Uncle Frank
Summary: In 1973, when Frank Bledsoe and his 18-year-old niece Beth take a road trip from Manhattan to Creekville, South Carolina, for the family patriarch's funeral, they're unexpectedly joined by Frank's lover, Walid.

Title: Dr. Terror's House of Horrors
Summary: Aboard a British train, mysterious fortune teller Dr. Schreck uses tarot cards to read the futures of five fellow passengers.

Title: Tom and Jerry: The Movie
Summary: Cat and mouse duo Tom and Jerry reluctantly work together to save a young girl from her evil aunt.

Title: Dreamland
Summary: A teenager's adventures as a bounty hunter take an unexpected twist.

Title: You Get Me
Summary: A one-night stand turns into a nightmare for a high-school student when a young woman's obsession grows dangerous.

Title: The Fly
Summary: A scientist has a horrific accident when he tries to use his newly invented teleportation device.

Title: Vampire Hunter D
Summary: When Doris Lang is chosen as the next bride for the vampire Count Magnus Lee, she will hire a mysterious vampire hunter known only as D in an attempt to escape her ill-gotten fate.

Title: The Rite
Summary: American seminary student Michael Kovak travels to Italy to take an exorcism course.

Title: Careful What You Wish For
Summary: A guy gets more than he bargained for after entering into an affair with the wife of an investment banker. Soon, a suspicious death and substantial life insurance policy embroil him in a scandal.

Title: The Accidental Tourist
Summary: An emotionally distant writer of travel guides must carry on with his life after his son is killed and his marriage crumbles.

Title: Passengers
Summary: A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.

Title: Shimmer Lake
Summary: An inventive crime thriller told backwards reversing day by day through a week following a local sheriff's quest to unlock the mystery of three small-town criminals and a bank heist gone wrong.

Title: The Big Heat
Summary: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

Title: Donovan's Reef
Summary: In an ideal society on a picturesque South Sea island, people of several races and backgrounds live together in harmony. John Wayne is a WWII hero, who worked hard to own a shipping company and finds his true love. She is as strong a woman as he is a man. An adventure and love story.

Title: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
Summary: In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.

Title: Rabid
Summary: The quiet Rose works in women's fashion clothing, hoping to be a designer. A traffic accident damages her face. She gets experimental stem cell treatment, leaving her stronger and prettier than ever - but there's a side effect.

Title: Brain Damage
Summary: One morning, a young man wakes to find that a small, disgusting creature has attached itself to the base of his brain stem. The creature gives him a euphoric state of happiness but demands human victims in return.

Title: Blue Story
Summary: A gang war dooms the lifelong bond of south London friends in this acclaimed crime drama that features its writer-director as a rapping Greek chorus.

Title: Sniper: Ultimate Kill
Summary: For the first time, Brandon Beckett, Richard Miller and Sgt. Thomas Beckett join forces in Colombia to take down a brutal drug cartel.

Title: Anything for Jackson
Summary: A bereaved Satanist couple kidnap a pregnant woman so they can use an ancient spellbook to put their dead grandson's spirit into her unborn child but end up summoning more than they bargained for.

Title: Confessions
Summary: An affluent family is shaken by the kidnapping of their daughter. Hours after, one of the kidnappers calls . He has come for the ransom - but what he wants is not money, rather a confession. Someone in the family is hiding an atrocity.

Title: Shark Bait
Summary: A group of friends enjoying a weekend steal a couple of jetskis racing them out to sea, ending up in a horrific head-on collision. They struggle to find a way home with a badly injured friend while from the waters below predators lurk.

Title: The Lost Boys
Summary: In a juvenile reform center, a place governed by the prohibition of physical contact, Joe and William fall in love. To love each other, they will have to break the law.

Title: Veronica Mars
Summary: Years after walking away from her past as a young private eye, Veronica Mars gets pulled back to her hometown, just in time for her high school reunion, in order to help her old flame Logan Echolls, who's embroiled in a murder mystery.

Title: Bhediya
Summary: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.

Title: The Bells of St. Mary's
Summary: At a big city Catholic school, Father O'Malley and Sister Benedict indulge in friendly rivalry, and succeed in extending the school through the gift of a building.

Title: Just Cause
Summary: A Harvard professor is lured back into the courtroom after twenty-five years to take the case of a young black man condemned to death for the horrific murder of a child.

Title: RocketMan
Summary: Fred Z. Randall is a geeky spacecraft designer who gets the chance to make his dream come true and travel to Mars.

Title: Romper Stomper
Summary: A group of skinheads become alarmed at the way their neighbourhood is changing.

Title: No Escape
Summary: A soldier convicted for murdering his commanding officer is dumped and left to die on a prison island inhabited by two camps of convicts.

Title: Wolfkin
Summary: Single mother Elaine is disturbed by her son Martin's aggressive behaviour, she visits his late father's estranged family in small-town Luxembourg, which hides a much darker nature.

Title: The Lazarus Effect
Summary: A group of medical researchers discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

Title: Cabin Fever 2: Spring Fever
Summary: A high school prom faces a deadly threat: a flesh-eating virus that spreads via a popular brand of bottled water.

Title: Gangs of New York
Summary: In 1862, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

Title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
Summary: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.

Title: Venom
Summary: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.

Title: Falling for Christmas
Summary: In the days leading up to Christmas, a young and newly engaged heiress experiences a skiing accident. After being diagnosed with amnesia, she finds herself in the care of the handsome lodge owner and his daughter.

Title: The Invisible Man
Summary: When Cecilia's abusive ex takes his own life and leaves her his fortune, she suspects his death was a hoax. As a series of coincidences turn lethal, Cecilia works to prove that she is being hunted by someone nobody can see.

Title: Krampus
Summary: A boy who has a bad Christmas accidentally summons a festive demon to his family home.

Title: Dampyr
Summary: Harlan Draka is a Dampyr, half-human and half-vampire, but he doesn't know it. Soon he will have to face his powers to destroy a terrible Master of The Night.

Title: Misery
Summary: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

Title: The Sense of an Ending
Summary: A man becomes haunted by his past and is presented with a mysterious legacy that causes him to re-think his current situation in life.

Title: Into the Woods
Summary: A witch tasks a childless baker and his wife with procuring magical items from classic fairy tales to reverse the curse put on their family tree.

Title: Lady Chatterley's Lover
Summary: An unhappily married aristocrat begins a torrid affair with the gamekeeper on her husband's country estate.

Title: Tusk
Summary: A brash and arrogant podcaster gets more than he bargained for when he travels to Canada to interview a mysterious recluse... who has a rather disturbing fondness for walruses.

Title: Lady Bird
Summary: In 2002, an artistically inclined 17-year-old girl comes of age in Sacramento, California.

Title: The Girl Next Door
Summary: A teenager's dreams come true when a former porn star moves in next door and they fall in love.

Title: Manchester by the Sea
Summary: A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.

Title: Excalibur
Summary: Merlin the magician helps Arthur Pendragon unite the Britons around the Round Table of Camelot, even as dark forces conspire to tear it apart.

Title: Deck the Halls
Summary: Two neighbors have it out after one of them decorates his house for the holidays so brightly that it can be seen from space.

Title: The Noel Diary
Summary: The story of a man who returns home on Christmas to settle his estranged mother's estate. Once there, he discovers a diary that may hold secrets to his own past and of a beautiful young woman on a mysterious journey of her own.

Title: Tár
Summary: Set in the international world of Western classical music, the film centers on Lydia Tár, widely considered one of the greatest living composer-conductors and the very first female director of a major German orchestra.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 2
Summary: After returning to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, John Wick discovers that a large bounty has been put on his life.

Title: Aladdin
Summary: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

Title: Office Christmas Party
Summary: When his uptight CEO sister threatens to shut down his branch, the branch manager throws an epic Christmas party in order to land a big client and save the day, but the party gets way out of hand...

Title: Step Brothers
Summary: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents marry.

Title: Atonement
Summary: Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

Title: The Incredibles
Summary: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.

Title: Free Birds
Summary: Two turkeys from opposite sides of the tracks must put aside their differences and team up to travel back in time to change the course of history, and get Turkeys off the Thanksgiving menu for good.

Title: Notting Hill
Summary: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

Title: Legend
Summary: A young man must stop the Lord of Darkness from destroying daylight and marrying the woman he loves.

Title: The Matrix Resurrections
Summary: Return to a world of two realities: one, everyday life; the other, what lies behind it. To find out if his reality is a construct, to truly know himself, Mr. Anderson will have to choose to follow the white rabbit once more.

Title: Scary Movie
Summary: A year after disposing of the body of a man they accidentally killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.

Title: Gremlins
Summary: A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

Title: Family Switch
Summary: When a chance encounter with an astrological reader causes the Walkers to wake up to a full body switch, can they unite to land a promotion, college interview, record deal, and soccer tryout?

Title: Life
Summary: A team of scientists aboard the International Space Station discover a rapidly evolving life form that caused extinction on Mars and now threatens all life on Earth.

Title: Black Adam
Summary: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods--and imprisoned just as quickly--Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.

Title: Black Widow
Summary: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.

Title: Armageddon
Summary: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas will impact Earth in less than a month, NASA recruits a misfit team of deep-core drillers to save the planet.

Title: Willy's Wonderland
Summary: A quiet drifter is tricked into a janitorial job at the now condemned Willy's Wonderland. The mundane tasks suddenly become an all-out fight for survival against wave after wave of demonic animatronics. Fists fly, kicks land, titans clash -- and only one side will make it out alive.

Title: The Color Purple
Summary: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
Summary: John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the international assassins' guild, and with a $14 million price tag on his head, he is the target of hit men and women everywhere.

Title: X-Men
Summary: In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.

Title: The Lost Boys
Summary: After moving to a new town, two brothers discover that the area is a haven for vampires.

Title: Men in Black
Summary: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

Title: Batman
Summary: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

Title: Scent of a Woman
Summary: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

Title: I Spit on Your Grave
Summary: A writer who is brutalized during her cabin retreat seeks revenge on her attackers, who left her for dead.

Title: Hell or High Water
Summary: Toby is a divorced father who's trying to make a better life. His brother is an ex-con with a short temper and a loose trigger finger. Together, they plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their family ranch.

Title: Ocean's Eleven
Summary: Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

Title: Passengers
Summary: A malfunction in a sleeping pod on a spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet wakes one passenger 90 years early.

Title: Creed III
Summary: Adonis has been thriving in both his career and family life, but when a childhood friend and former boxing prodigy resurfaces, the face-off is more than just a fight.

Title: Starship Troopers
Summary: Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.

Title: Sandwich
Summary: A newly wed couple invites a woman for threesome. Unknown to them someone is watching their sexcapade. When the threesome becomes foursome, that's when chaos begins.

Title: Blues Brothers 2000
Summary: Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another "Mission from God."

Title: Rockstar
Summary: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.

Title: The Postcard Killings
Summary: A New York detective investigates the death of his daughter who was murdered while on her honeymoon in London; he recruits the help of a Scandinavian journalist when other couples throughout Europe suffer a similar fate.

Title: Valmont
Summary: France before 1789: When a widow hears that her lover is to marry her cousin's daughter, she asks the playboy Valmont to take the girl's virginity. But first she bets him, with her body as prize, to seduce a virtuous, young, married woman.

Title: The Pirates! Band of Misfits
Summary: Pirate Captain sets out on a mission to defeat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz for the Pirate of the year Award. The quest takes Captain and his crew from the shores of Blood Island to the foggy streets of Victorian London.

Title: Angel of Mine
Summary: A woman grieving over the death of her daughter loses grip of reality when she begins to think her girl may still be alive.

Title: An Officer and a Spy
Summary: In 1894, French Captain Alfred Dreyfus is wrongfully convicted of treason and sentenced to life imprisonment at Devil's island.

Title: Ladder 49
Summary: A firefighter, injured and trapped in a burning building, has flashbacks of his life as he drifts in and out of consciousness. Meanwhile, fellow firefighters led by the Chief attempt to rescue him.

Title: New World
Summary: An undercover cop finds it difficult to play both a cop and a goon.

Title: The Edge of Love
Summary: Two feisty, free-spirited women are connected by the brilliant, charismatic poet who loves them both.

Title: Mildred Pierce
Summary: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

Title: The Stepfather
Summary: After murdering his entire family, a man marries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town and prepares to do it all over again.

Title: Untitle Denzel Washington Project
Summary: Based on the real warrior Hannibal, considered one of the greatest military commanders in history. The film covers the crucial battles he led against the Roman Republic during the Second Punic War.

Title: Suffragette
Summary: In 1912 London, a young working mother is galvanized into radical political activism supporting the right for women to vote, and is willing to meet violence with violence to achieve this end.

Title: Valerie and Her Week of Wonders
Summary: Surreal tale in which love, fear, sex and religion merge into one fantastic world, based on a classical Czech novel of the same title.

Title: Ruthless People
Summary: A couple cheated by a vile businessman kidnaps his wife in retaliation, not knowing that their enemy is delighted that they did.

Title: Bad Boy Bubby

However, he finds little sympathy from his family and begins to wonder if bad things only happen to him, his mom, dad, brother and sister - who all find themselves living through their own terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.

Summary: The Red Ribbon Army from Goku's past has returned with two new androids to challenge him and his friends.

Title: Untitled Adam Sandler/Safdie Brothers Project
Summary: Plot under wraps.

Summary: Political drama film based on a true event after the assassination of President Park. The attempted coup leads to a conflict between military leaders

Summary: Plot unknown.

Summary: A courier in London discovers that one of the packages she's transporting is a bomb.

Title: The Best of Enemies
Summary: Civil rights activist Ann Atwater faces off against C.P. Ellis, Exalted Cyclops of the Ku Klux Klan, in 1971 Durham, North Carolina over the issue of school integration.

Title: Last Cannibal World
Summary: An oil prospector is captured and imprisoned by a violent and primitive cannibal tribe in the Philippines' rain forest. He manages to escape with a female hostage, and begins searching for his missing companion and their airplane.

Title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
Summary: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

Title: Duck, You Sucker!
Summary: A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.

Title: Onibaba
Summary: Two women kill samurai and sell their belongings for a living. While one of them is having an affair with their neighbor, the other woman meets a mysterious samurai wearing a bizarre mask.

Title: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
Summary: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

Title: Boys and Girls
Summary: A friendship is put to the ultimate test when two best friends wind up in bed together.

Title: The Ugly American
Summary: An ambitious American scholar becomes the ambassador to Sarkan, a southeast Asian country where civil war is brewing.

Title: A Street Cat Named Bob
Summary: The true feel-good story of how James Bowen, a busker and recovering drug addict, has his life transformed when he meets a stray ginger cat. Based on the international best selling book.

Title: Sniper: G.R.I.T. - Global Response & Intelligence Team
Summary: Ace Sniper Brandon Beckett and the newly formed Global Response and Intelligence Team (G.R.I.T.) deploy to Malta to eliminate an international terrorist plot and rescue fellow Agent, Lady Death.

Title: Lost Horizon
Summary: While escaping war-torn China, a group of Europeans crash in the Himalayas, where they are rescued and taken to the mysterious Valley of the Blue Moon, Shangri-La.

Title: Risen
Summary: In 33 AD, a Roman Tribune in Judea is tasked to find the missing body of Jesus Christ, who rose from the dead.

Title: Blair Witch
Summary: After discovering a video showing what he believes to be his vanished sister Heather, James and a group of friends head to the forest believed to be inhabited by the Blair Witch.

Title: Hostage
Summary: When a family is held hostage, former hostage negotiator Jeff Talley arrives at the scene. Talley's own family is kidnapped and Talley must decide which is more important: saving a family he doesn't even know or saving his own family.

Title: You Can Count on Me
Summary: A single mother's life is thrown into turmoil after her struggling, rarely seen younger brother returns to town.

Title: Radio Flyer
Summary: A father recounts a dark period of his childhood when he and his little brother lived in the suburbs.
Director: David Mickey Evans,Richard Donner,David Mickey Evans(uncredited)

Title: Don't Turn 'em Loose
Summary: A conscientious attorney who is a member of the State Parole Board, finds his own son, using an alias, up for parole and makes the decision to cast the approving vote. This turns out to cause many problems for the family while on vacation.

Title: Blitz
Summary: Follow the stories of a group of Londoners during the events of the British capital bombing in World War II.

Title: Just the Two of Us
Summary: Follows Blanche Renard who meets Greg Lamoureux and believes he is the one, but soon she finds herself caught up in a toxic relationship with a possessive and dangerous man.

Title: Double Dragon
Summary: Two brothers have half of a powerful ancient Chinese talisman. An evil gang leader has the other half, and determines to get the brothers' half and have a complete medallion so he can gain absolute power.

Title: The Sessions
Summary: A man in an iron lung who wishes to lose his virginity contacts a professional sex surrogate with the help of his therapist and priest.

Title: Quest for Camelot
Summary: An adventurous girl, a young blind hermit, and a goofy two-headed dragon race to find the lost sword Excalibur to save King Arthur and Camelot from disaster.

Title: Sins of Desire
Summary: Suspecting foul play, Kay Egan goes undercover to work in a suspicious sex clinic where her sister went to therapy before killing herself. And Kay is not the only one watching the sinister married couple who runs the place.

Title: The Umbrellas of Cherbourg
Summary: A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.

Title: Shameless
Summary: A young man entertains an unhealthy desire for his older and unstable half-sister.

Title: The Garbage Pail Kids Movie
Summary: Dodger must confront the struggles of life as he is visited by the Garbage Pail Kids and intimidated by some older bullies.

Title: Day of the Fight
Summary: Follows a once renowned boxer as he takes a redemptive journey through his past and present, on the day of his first fight since he left prison.

Title: Rogue
Summary: O'Hara is a mercenary leading a squad of soldiers on their mission to rescue hostages in a remote part of Africa. Unfortunately, the mission goes awry and the team is stranded and forced to survive against the local rebels.

Title: Gidget
Summary: A young girl discovers surfing and love (in that order) during one transitive summer.

Title: Thank You for Your Service
Summary: A group of U.S. soldiers returning from Iraq struggle to integrate back into family and civilian life, while living with the memory of a war that threatens to destroy them long after they've left the battlefield.

Title: Beirut
Summary: Caught in the crossfires of civil war, CIA operatives must send a former U.S. diplomat to negotiate for the life of a friend he left behind.

Title: Madame Claude
Summary: Paris, in the late 1960s. Madame Claude is at the head of a flourishing business dedicated to prostitution that gives her power over both the French political and criminal worlds. But the end of her empire is closer than she thinks.

Title: One False Move
Summary: A small town police chief awaits the arrival of a gang of killers.

Title: Kensuke's Kingdom
Summary: Young Michael, shipwrecked on a remote island, must adapt to life alone. Over time, he feels another presence, learning that this world is home to both unimaginable danger and beauty. A gripping animated adaptation of a beloved novel.

Title: Light of My Life
Summary: A father and his child journey through the outskirts of society a decade after a pandemic has wiped out half the world's population. As the father struggles to protect his child from, their bond and the character of humanity are tested.

Title: A Hero
Summary: Rahim is in prison because of a debt he was unable to repay. During a two-day leave, he tries to convince his creditor to withdraw his complaint against the payment of part of the sum. But things don't go as planned.

Title: The Incredible Burt Wonderstone
Summary: A veteran Vegas magician tries to revive his career after his longtime partner quits, he gets fired from his casino act, and an edgy new "street magician" steals his thunder.

Title: Unleashed
Summary: A man enslaved by the mob since childhood and raised into behaving like a human attack dog escapes his captors and attempts to start a new life.

Title: The Comeback Trail
Summary: A film producer who owes money to a mobster tries to "accidentally" kill his aging movie star for an insurance scam so he can payoff his debt, but he begins to realize that the movie they're shooting is a masterpiece in the making.

Title: I Like Movies
Summary: Lawrence Kweller, a socially inept 17-year old cinephile, gets a job at a video store, where he forms a complicated friendship with his older female manager.

Title: Her Smell
Summary: A self-destructive punk rocker struggles with sobriety while trying to recapture the creative inspiration that led her band to success.

Title: The Driver
Summary: A getaway driver becomes the latest assignment for a tenacious detective.

Title: Shadowlands
Summary: C.S. Lewis, a world-renowned Christian theologian, writer and professor, leads a passionless life until he meets spirited poet Joy Gresham from the U.S.

Title: The Fabulous Baker Boys
Summary: The lives of two struggling musicians, who happen to be brothers, inevitably change when they team up with a beautiful, up-and-coming singer.

Title: L'Avventura
Summary: A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip. During the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.

Title: Close to the Horizon
Summary: When Jessica leaves home one night, she has no idea she is about to meet her great love. But Danny hides a dark secret and soon Jessica will be faced with the most difficult decision of her life.

Title: My Week with Marilyn
Summary: Colin Clark, an employee of Sir Laurence Olivier, documents the tense interaction between Olivier and Marilyn Monroe during the production of The Prince and the Showgirl (1957).

Title: The Lady Vanishes
Summary: While travelling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.

Title: Moonage Daydream
Summary: A cinematic odyssey exploring David Bowie's creative and musical journey. From visionary filmmaker Brett Morgen, and sanctioned by the Bowie estate.

Title: Standoff
Summary: A young girl photographs an assassin killing 4 at a cemetery. He wants no witnesses. Carter, a veteran in a farmhouse, is all standing between him and the girl.

Title: Quo Vadis, Aida?
Summary: Aida is a translator for the UN in the small town of Srebrenica. When the Serbian army takes over the town, her family is among the thousands of citizens looking for shelter in the UN camp.

Title: Ice Princess
Summary: With the help of her coach, her mom, and the boy who drives the Zamboni machine, nothing can stop Casey (Trachtenberg) from realizing her dream to be a champion figure skater.

Title: Playtime
Summary: Monsieur Hulot curiously wanders around a high-tech Paris, paralleling a trip with a group of American tourists. Meanwhile, a nightclub/restaurant prepares its opening night, but it's still under construction.

Title: The Taste of Christmas
Summary: Three separate groups navigate that most emotionally fraught of seasons Christmas.

Title: Where the Truth Lies
Summary: Karen O'Connor, a young journalist known for her celebrity profiles, is consumed with discovering the truth behind a long-buried incident that affected the lives and careers of showbiz team Vince Collins and Lanny Morris.

Title: The Rocker
Summary: In the 1980s, a drummer is abandoned by his band just before they become rock superstars. Twenty years later, the drummer sees his second chance at stardom arise when he is asked to perform with his teenage nephew's high school rock band.

Title: Blackfish
Summary: A documentary following the controversial captivity of killer whales, and its dangers for both humans and whales.

Title: Bride & Prejudice
Summary: A modern adaptation of Jane Austen's classic novel, Pride and Prejudice, that features the lives of four unmarried daughters in an Indian family.

Title: The Professional
Summary: Victim of a plot which has resulted in his imprisonment in a Central African jail for two years, a French secret agent arrives in Paris to settle accounts.

Title: Pretty Maids All in a Row
Summary: California State Police Captain Sam Surcher investigates a string of teenage-girl murders at Oceanfront High School.

Title: Rock-A-Doodle
Summary: In order to defeat the wicked Grand Duke of Owls, a young boy, transformed into a cat, teams up with a group of barnyard animals to find the rooster who can raise the sun.

Title: Strange Magic
Summary: Goblins, elves, fairies and imps, and their misadventures sparked by the battle over a powerful potion.

Title: We're No Angels
Summary: Two escaped cons only prayer to escape is to pass themselves off as priests and pass by the police blockade at the border into the safety of Canada.

Title: Turistas
Summary: A group of young backpackers' vacation turns sour when a bus accident leaves them marooned in a remote Brazilian rural area that holds an ominous secret.

Title: Sleuth
Summary: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.

Title: Do Not Expect Too Much of the End of the World
Summary: An overworked and underpaid production assistant has to shoot a workplace safety video commissioned by a multinational company. But an interviewee makes a statement that forces him to re-invent his story to suit the company's narrative.

Title: Spy Hard
Summary: Dick Steele, Agent WD-40 is assigned by his Director, to stop the evil General Rancor from destroying the world. WD-40 believed Rancor was dead and he teams up with the hot KGB Agent Veronique Ukrinsky to find Rancor and save the world.

Title: The Russia House
Summary: A British publisher is sent a manuscript detailing Soviet Union nuclear missile capabilities. British Intelligence intercept it and recruit him to investigate the author's editor, a beautiful Russian woman he claims never to have met.

Title: Hiroshima Mon Amour
Summary: A French actress filming an anti-war film in Hiroshima has an affair with a married Japanese architect as they share their differing perspectives on war.

Title: Horror in the High Desert
Summary: In July 2017, an outdoor enthusiast went missing in northern Nevada. He was never located. Friends and loved ones recall the events and, for the first time, talk about the horrific conclusion to his fate.

Title: Go West
Summary: A crazy group of pioneers brave the harsh elements and numerous mishaps to travel thousands of miles out west to find a place to call home.

Title: Intruders
Summary: Anna suffers from agoraphobia so crippling that when a trio of criminals break into her house, she cannot bring herself to flee. But what the intruders don't realize is that agoraphobia is not her only problem.

Title: Police Academy 4: Citizens on Patrol
Summary: The misfit Police Academy (1984) graduates now are assigned to train a group of civilian volunteers to fight crime once again plaguing the streets.

Title: Frankie and Johnny
Summary: Johnny has just been released from prison, and gets a job in a café beside waitress Frankie. Frankie is a bit of a loner, but Johnny is determined their romance will blossom.

Title: Deconstructing Harry
Summary: Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him.

Title: Half Sisters
Summary: Two half-sisters who bitterly hate each other become trapped in a farmhouse during a storm, as a couple of murderous intruders terrorize them from outside as they look for their $1M inheritance check.

Title: I Want to Eat Your Pancreas
Summary: A high school student discovers one of his classmates, Sakura Yamauchi, is suffering from a terminal illness. This secret brings the two together, as she lives out her final moments.

Title: Immortal Beloved
Summary: The life and death of the legendary Ludwig van Beethoven. Besides all the work he is known for, the composer once wrote a famous love letter to a nameless beloved, and the movie tries to find out who this beloved was--not easy, as Beethoven has had many women in his life.

Title: The Delinquents
Summary: Bank employee Morán schemes to steal enough money to never work again, then confess and serve prison time while his colleague hides the cash. Soon under investigative pressure, accomplice Román meets a woman who transforms him forever.

Title: Horrorplanet
Summary: A crew of interplanetary archaeologists is threatened when an alien creature impregnates one of their members, causing her to turn homicidal and murder them one by one.

Title: The Condemned
Summary: Jack Conrad is awaiting the death penalty in a corrupt Central American prison. He is "purchased" by a wealthy television producer and taken to a desolate island where he must fight to the death against nine other condemned killers from all corners of the world, with freedom going to the sole survivor.

Title: Undisputed
Summary: When heavyweight champion George "Iceman" Chambers lands in prison, the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champ.

Title: Igby Goes Down
Summary: A young man's peculiar upbringing renders him unable to competently cope with the struggle of growing up.

Title: Salvador
Summary: A burnt-out photojournalist becomes involved in a Central American revolution.

Title: Muscle
Summary: Build him up. Tear him apart.

Title: The Souvenir: Part II
Summary: In the aftermath of her tumultuous relationship, Julie begins to untangle her fraught love for him in making her graduation film, sorting fact from his elaborately constructed fiction.

Title: Dr. Giggles
Summary: A madman who believes he's a doctor comes to the town where his crazy father was killed, and soon begins murdering people and becoming infatuated with a teenage girl who has a heart condition.

Title: Blueback
Summary: Follows Abby, a child who befriends a magnificent wild blue groper while diving. When Abby realizes that the fish is under threat, she takes inspiration from her activist Mum, Dora, and takes on poachers to save her friend.

Title: Shattered Glass
Summary: The story of a young journalist who fell from grace when it was discovered he fabricated over half of his articles from the publication The New Republic magazine.

Title: Qala
Summary: Haunted by her past, a talented singer with a rising career copes with the pressure of success, a mother's disdain and the voices of doubt within her.

Title: The Todd Killings
Summary: An overgrown adolescent lives off his mother and leads small-town California teens astray.

Title: Shadow
Summary: In a Chinese royal court, an army commander secretly trains a "shadow" to retake a city against the wishes of the king.

Title: Fireworks
Summary: The troubled relationship between Gianni and Nino, set in the narrow-minded and prejudencial Sicily of 1982.

Title: Wil
Summary: Wilfried Wils must survive as an auxiliary policeman during the Nazi occupation of Antwerp.

Title: Grand Canyon
Summary: The fates of several people are randomly intertwining. Their sympathy of each other faces multiple differences in their lifestyles.

Title: Europa
Summary: Just after W.W.II, an American takes a railway job in Germany, but finds his position politically sensitive with various people trying to use him.

Title: Häxan
Summary: Fictionalized documentary showing the evolution of witchcraft, from its pagan roots to its confusion with hysteria in Eastern Europe.

Title: Modesty Blaise
Summary: Stylish ex-con Modesty Blaise and her partner Willie Garvin are tasked by the British Secret Service with preventing her rival Gabriel from stealing diamonds that are to be delivered to her adoptive father, a Sheikh.

Title: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco
Summary: When adventurous pets Chance, Shadow, and Sassy are accidentally separated from their vacationing humans, they're left to fend for themselves on the mean streets of San Francisco, searching for the "golden bridge" that will take them home.

Title: Fear Street: Part Three - 1666
Summary: The origins of Sarah Fier's curse are finally revealed as history comes full circle on a night that changes the lives of Shadysiders forever.

Title: My Name Is Nobody
Summary: A young, easy-going gunman worships and competes with a famed gunfighter, insisting that he must face down a gang of 150 outlaws before he can retire.

Title: Little Man Tate
Summary: A single mother raises a child prodigy on her own, struggling to give him every opportunity he needs to express his gift.

Title: Cop Out
Summary: Jimmy's rare baseball card is robbed. Since it's his only hope to pay for his daughter's upcoming wedding, he recruits his cop partner Paul to track down the robber, a memorabilia-obsessed gangster.

Title: Legally Blonde 3
Summary: Plot unknown. Third installment of 'Legally Blonde'.

Title: Siberia
Summary: When an American diamond trader's Russian partner goes missing, he journeys to Siberia in search of him, but instead begins a love affair.

Title: Left Behind: The Movie
Summary: The Biblical prophecy of Armegeddon begins when the Rapture instantly takes all believers in Christ from the Earth. A reporter left behind learns that the Anti-Christ will soon take power.

Title: Quicksand
Summary: Follows a married couple almost divorcing who become trapped in quicksand while hiking through a rainforest in Colombia. They will battle the elements of the jungle and must work together in order to survive.

Title: Thanks for Sharing
Summary: A romantic comedy that brings together three disparate characters who are learning to face a challenging and often confusing world as they struggle together against a common demon: sex addiction.

Title: Ten Inch Hero
Summary: An artist gets a job at a beachside sandwich shop, where she hangs out with a techie, a flirt, a rocker, a hippie, and a Wiccan.

Title: When You Finish Saving the World
Summary: Evelyn and her oblivious son Ziggy seek out replacements for each other as Evelyn desperately tries to parent an unassuming teenager at her shelter, while Ziggy fumbles through his pursuit of a brilliant young woman at school.

Title: The Panic in Needle Park
Summary: Follows the lives of heroin addicts who frequent "Needle Park" in New York City.

Title: I'm Gonna Git You Sucka
Summary: In this parody of blaxploitation movies, a black hero wannabe reunites former black heroes from the 70s to help him get revenge on Mr. Big.

Title: Stealth
Summary: Deeply ensconced in a top-secret military program, three pilots struggle to bring an artificial intelligence program under control before it initiates the next world war.

Title: IO
Summary: As a young scientist searches for a way to save a dying Earth, she finds a connection with a man who's racing to catch the last shuttle off the planet.

Title: The Kid
Summary: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put their relationship in jeopardy.

Title: Early Man
Summary: Set at the dawn of time, when prehistoric creatures and woolly mammoths roamed the earth, Early Man tells the story of Dug, along with sidekick Hognob as they unite his tribe against a mighty enemy Lord Nooth and his Bronze Age City to save their home.

Title: Seberg
Summary: Inspired by real events in the life of French New Wave icon Jean Seberg. In the late 1960s, Hoover's FBI targeted her because of her political and romantic involvement with civil rights activist Hakim Jamal.

Title: Year of the Dragon
Summary: A police detective cracks down on organized crime in Chinatown after the murders of Triad and Mafia leaders.

Title: Gloria
Summary: When a young boy's family is killed by the mob, their tough neighbor Gloria becomes his reluctant guardian. In possession of a book that the gangsters want, the pair go on the run in New York.

Title: Colors of Love
Summary: When librarian Taylor Harris suddenly loses her job, she visits her brother's small town in Montana, where she gets involved in helping save her brother's small-town hotel from tycoon, Joel Sheenan, who wants to renovate it.

Title: Once Upon a Crime
Summary: While at the royal ball with Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood finds herself in the middle of a mystery. Can she solve the case before midnight strikes?

Title: Young Sherlock Holmes
Summary: When assorted people start having inexplicable delusions that lead to their deaths, a teenage Sherlock Holmes decides to investigate.

Title: Delicious
Summary: France, 1789, just before the Revolution. With the help of a surprising talented young woman, a chef who has been sacked by his noble master finds the strength to free himself from his position as a servant and opens the first ever restaurant.

Title: Dil Se..
Summary: A radio broadcaster's intense attraction to a mysterious woman opens the door to a tidal wave of powerful emotions and desires.

Title: Rise of the Footsoldier: Origins
Summary: The origin story of how Tucker, Rolfie, and Pat Tate unite to form their own firm.

Title: Gallipoli
Summary: Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.

Title: Paranormal Activity: Next of Kin
Summary: Margot, a young woman who was abandoned by her mother as a baby, travels to a secluded Amish community with a documentary film crew seeking answers about her mother and extended family.

Title: Riddick: Furya
Summary: It follows Riddick as he returns to his home world, a place he barely remembers and one he fears might be left in ruins. He finds other Furyans fighting for their existence against a new enemy.

Title: The Survivor
Summary: After World War II, Harry Haft is a boxer who fought against his peers in concentration camps. Haunted by memories, he tries to use fighting legends as a way to find his love.

Title: The Bad Seed
Summary: Rhoda Penmark seems like your average, sweet eight-year-old girl. After her rival at school dies in mysterious circumstances at the school picnic, her mother starts to suspect that Rhoda was responsible.

Title: Carnival of Souls
Summary: After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.

Title: Three Men and a Little Lady
Summary: Three ex-dads quickly discover how empty life is without their little lady, and go to outrageous lengths in their efforts to win their daughter back in this critically acclaimed and equally charming sequel.

Title: As the Gods Will
Summary: A group of high school students are forced to play a game of death without knowing who, why or how.

Title: In the Earth
Summary: As the world searches for a cure to a disastrous virus, a scientist and park scout venture deep in the forest for a routine equipment run.

Title: Gods and Generals
Summary: The rise and fall of confederate general Thomas "Stonewall" Jackson, as he meets with military success against the Union from 1861 to 1863, when he is accidentally killed by his own soldiers.

Title: Waltz with Bashir
Summary: An Israeli film director interviews fellow veterans of the 1982 invasion of Lebanon to reconstruct his own memories of his term of service in that conflict.

Title: Dark Asset
Summary: A charming guy attempts to pick up a woman in a bar by spinning a tale involving spies, implanted microchips and the dangerous military scientist hunting him.

Title: The Magic of Belle Isle
Summary: Monty Wildhorn, an alcoholic novelist of Westerns, has lost his drive. His nephew pushes him to summer in quiet Belle Isle. He begrudgingly befriends a newly single mom and her 3 girls who help him find the inspiration to write again.

Title: Love Exposure
Summary: A bizarre love triangle forms between a young Catholic upskirt photographer, a misandric girl and a manipulative cultist.

Title: Battle of the Bulge
Summary: A dramatization of Nazi Germany's final Western Front counterattack of World War II.

Title: The Silencers
Summary: Retired agent Matt Helm is re-activated in order to stop an evil organization from exploding an atom bomb over the USA and starting WWIII.

Title: Greenberg
Summary: A man from Los Angeles, who moved to New York years ago, returns to L.A. to figure out his life while he house-sits for his brother. He soon sparks with his brother's assistant.

Title: Across the River and Into the Trees
Summary: Set in post-World War II Italian Venice, war-torn U.S. Army Colonel Richard Cantwell is a true hero who faces the news of his illness with indifference.

Title: Snatched
Summary: When her boyfriend dumps her before their exotic vacation, a young woman persuades her ultra-cautious mother to travel with her to paradise, with unexpected results.

Title: Colossus: The Forbin Project
Summary: Thinking this will prevent war, the US government gives an impenetrable supercomputer total control over launching nuclear missiles. But what the computer does with the power is unimaginable to its creators.

Title: Sssssss
Summary: A college student becomes lab assistant to a scientist who is working on a serum that can transform humans into snakes.

Title: Another 9½ Weeks
Summary: John heads to Paris hoping to meet his ex from Nine 1/2 Weeks (1986), but instead ends up with her former friend, Lea.

Title: Demonic
Summary: A young woman unleashes terrifying demons when supernatural forces at the root of a decades-old rift between mother and daughter are ruthlessly revealed.

Title: Rules of Engagement
Summary: An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a Middle Eastern country.

Title: They Shoot Horses, Don't They?
Summary: The lives of a disparate group of contestants intertwine in an inhumanely grueling dance marathon.

Title: Days of Being Wild
Summary: A man tries to find out who his real mother is after the woman who raised him tells him the truth.

Title: Don 2
Summary: Don turns himself in and escapes with Vardhaan from prison, following which he recruits a team to steal currency printing plates from a bank in Berlin.

Title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
Summary: Scientist Sherman Klump's inventions, his upcoming marriage to his pretty colleague Denise Gaines, and his reputation, are threatened by his evil clone Buddy Love.

Title: Cold Creek Manor
Summary: A family relocates from the city to a dilapidated house in the country that was once a grand estate. As they begin renovations, they discover their new home harbors a secret and may not be completely free of its former inhabitant.

Title: Final Girl
Summary: A man teaches a young woman how to become a complete weapon. Later, she is approached by a group of sadistic teens who kill blonde women for unknown reasons. The hunting season begins.

Title: Kedi
Summary: A profile of an ancient city and its unique people, seen through the eyes of the most mysterious and beloved animal humans have ever known, the Cat.

Title: Shock Treatment
Summary: Janet and Brad become contestants on a game show and wind up as captives.

Title: Cold Skin
Summary: A young man arrives at a remote island to take a post of weather observer only to find himself defending the watchtower from deadly creatures which live in the island shores.

Title: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring
Summary: A boy is raised by a Buddhist monk in an isolated floating temple where the years pass like the seasons.

Title: Manderlay
Summary: A story of slavery, set in the southern U.S. in the 1930s.

Title: All Is True
Summary: A look at the final days in the life of renowned playwright William Shakespeare.

Title: The Proposition
Summary: A lawman apprehends a notorious outlaw and gives him nine days to kill his older brother, or else they'll execute his younger brother.

Title: Self Reliance
Summary: Given the opportunity to participate in a life or death reality game show, one man discovers there's a lot to live for.

Title: Time Lapse
Summary: Three friends discover a mysterious machine that takes pictures twenty-four hours into the future, and conspire to use it for personal gain, until disturbing and dangerous images begin to develop.

Title: Death to Smoochy
Summary: A kids' show host, Rainbow Randolph, is fired in disgrace while his replacement, Sheldon Mopes, A.K.A. Smoochy the Rhino, finds himself a rising star. Unfortunately for Sheldon, the business of kids' television isn't all child's play.

Title: Mother/Android
Summary: In a post-apocalyptic world rocked by a violent android uprising, a young pregnant woman and her boyfriend desperately search for safety.

Title: I Feel Pretty
Summary: A woman struggling with insecurity wakes from a fall believing she is the most beautiful and capable woman on the planet. Her new confidence empowers her to live fearlessly, but what happens when she realizes her appearance never changed?

Title: The Players Club
Summary: A woman must contend with rival strippers and her boss in an attempt to make a legitimate living.

Title: Come Play
Summary: A monster named Larry manifests itself through smart phones and mobile devices. Feature film version of the 2017 short film.

Title: Southbound
Summary: Five interlocking tales of terror follow the fates of a group of weary travellers who confront their worst nightmares - and darkest secrets - over one long night on a desolate stretch of desert highway.
Director: David Bruckner(segment The Accident),Roxanne Benjamin(segment Siren),Roxanne Benjamin,David Bruckner,Matt Bettinelli-Olpin,Matt Bettinelli-Olpin(segments The Way In, The Way Out)

Title: Slave of the Cannibal God
Summary: A woman and her brother fly to New Guinea to look for a lost expedition, led by her husband, which has vanished in the jungle.

Title: In Her Shoes
Summary: Strait-laced Rose breaks off relations with her party girl sister, Maggie, over an indiscretion involving Rose's boyfriend. The chilly atmosphere is broken with the arrival of Ella, the grandmother neither sister knew existed.

Title: Fright Night Part 2
Summary: Charley Brewster and Peter Vincent must face more vampires, out for revenge.

Title: Extreme Movie
Summary: A sketch-comedy movie about the joys and embarrassments of teen sex. But mostly the embarrassments.

Title: Overdrive
Summary: Two car thief brothers, who journey to the south of France for new opportunities, wind up in the cross hairs of the local crime boss.

Title: The Exorcism of God
Summary: An American priest working in Mexico is possessed during an exorcism and ends up committing a terrible act. Eighteen years later, the consequences of his sin come back to haunt him, unleashing the greatest battle within.

Title: Marked for Death
Summary: A retired DEA agent is out to hunt down and take out a Jamaican drug posse that has targeted he and his family for murder.

Title: Red Tails
Summary: A crew of African American pilots in the Tuskegee training program, having faced segregation while kept mostly on the ground during World War II, are called into duty under the guidance of Col. A.J. Bullard.

Title: Bad Girls
Summary: Four prostitutes join together to travel the Old West.

Title: The Iron Lady
Summary: An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life, from girlhood to British prime minister, intervene.

Title: Red
Summary: A reclusive man sets out for justice and redemption when three troublesome teens kill his dog for no good reason.

Title: Lone Wolf McQuade
Summary: After helping the local police with some horse thieves, a Texas Ranger aims at a drug lord with arms trade as well. They're interested in the same woman and they're both into martial arts.

Title: The Rugrats Movie
Summary: The babies gets lost in the forest after Tommy Pickles gets a new baby brother.

Title: My Old Lady
Summary: An American inherits an apartment in Paris that comes with an unexpected resident.

Title: The Love Guru
Summary: Pitka, an American raised outside of his country by gurus, returns to the States in order to break into the self-help business. His first challenge is to settle the romantic troubles and subsequent professional skid of a star hockey player whose wife left him for a rival athlete.

Title: Punch

Title: House of Darkness

Title: Infinite Storm
Summary: When a climber gets caught in a blizzard, she encounters a stranded stranger and must get them both down the mountain before nightfall.

Title: Error
Summary: When a billionaire's daughter intent on bringing down a major crime syndicate is targeted by a group of professional assassins, a team of mercenaries must stop them before they kill her.

Title: The Poker House
Summary: A dramatization of Lori Petty's teenage years spent in small town Iowa.

Title: Bulworth
Summary: A suicidally disillusioned liberal politician puts a contract out on himself and takes the opportunity to be bluntly honest with his voters by affecting the rhythms and speech of hip-hop music and culture.

Title: The Advent Calendar
Summary: Eva is a paraplegic. On her birthday, her friend Sophie gives her a strange Advent calendar. It's not the traditional treats you find when you open each drawer, but quirky gifts that are scary and get bloodier.

Title: 21 & Over
Summary: The night before his big medical school interview, a promising student celebrates his 21st birthday with his two best friends.

Title: A Disturbance in the Force
Summary: In 1978, filmmaker George Lucas is persuaded to turn over Star Wars to the world of the '70s variety hour, culminating in The Star Wars Holiday Special (1978), often cited as one of the worst forms of entertainment of all time.

Title: Zombie Strippers!
Summary: A zombie epidemic spreads throughout a strip club in Nebraska.

Title: Hoot
Summary: A young man (Lerman) moves from Montana to Florida with his family, where he's compelled to engage in a fight to protect a population of endangered owls.

Title: Secrets
Summary: A dark tale of sexual experimentation and perversion when a young couple escape to a beach house in order to sort out their relationship, but find themselves entangled in a trap set by a seductive stranger.

Title: Dreamscape
Summary: A man who can enter and manipulate people's dreams is recruited by a government agency to help cure the President of the United States of his nightmares about nuclear war but stumbles upon an assassination plot.

Title: The Protector

Title: A Secret Promise
Summary: Hilarity ensues when a handsome businessman goes undercover in New York City as a "Homeless Billionaire."

Title: Vampire in Brooklyn
Summary: A Caribbean vampire seduces a Brooklyn police officer who has no idea that she is half-vampire.

Title: Cronos
Summary: A mysterious device designed to provide its owner with eternal life resurfaces after four hundred years, leaving a trail of destruction in its path.

Title: 20,000 Species of Bees
Summary: During a summer in a village house linked to beekeeping, an eight-year-old and her mother experience revelations that will change their lives forever.

Title: Holy Motors
Summary: A man boards a limousine to be driven to his day's work: nine mysterious "appointments."

Title: Tiffany Jones
Summary: Light-hearted and occasionally unclothed adaptation of a British comic strip in the over-the-top, on-beyond-Bond spy fantasy vein.

Title: Pet
Summary: A man bumps into an old crush and holds her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works.

Title: The Two Jakes
Summary: The sequel to Chinatown (1974) finds J.J. "Jake" Gittes investigating adultery and murder, and the money that comes from oil.

Title: Nightbooks
Summary: Alex, a boy obsessed with scary stories, is imprisoned by an evil young witch in her contemporary New York City apartment.

Title: Tekken
Summary: Jin Kazama witnesses the death of his mother Jun by Tekken in the slums known as Anvil. After finding a Tekken ID he decides to seek out vengeance for his mother's death.

Title: White Nights

Title: Proof of Life

Title: Tales from the Crypt: Demon Knight
Summary: High-level demons collect low-level demons as warriors in attempt to obtain a key containing the blood of Christ. The key is guarded by immortal warriors called Demon Knights.

Title: Kill Command

Summary: Ned and Conor are forced to share a bedroom at their boarding school. The loner and the star athlete at this rugby-mad school form an unlikely friendship until it's tested by the authorities.

Title: Dark Angel
Summary: A Renegade Cop is forced to work with an FBI Agent in order to bring down a group of Drug Dealers with sinister plans.

Title: 102 Dalmatians
Summary: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after the puppies once more.

Title: Separation
Summary: A young girl finds solace in her artist father and the ghost of her dead mother.

Title: Spy x Family Code: White

Title: Omar

Title: Woody Woodpecker
Summary: The hyperactive red-headed bird enters a turf war with a big city lawyer wanting to tear down his home in an effort to build a house to flip.

Title: Turkish Delight
Summary: A young love faces with old problems.

Title: Riding in Cars with Boys

Title: There's Someone Inside Your House

Title: Bones of Crows

Title: A Place in the Sun
Summary: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

Title: Trooper Hook
Summary: When Apache chief Nanchez is captured by the cavalry, his white squaw and infant son are returned to civilization by Sergeant Hook, but Nanchez escapes custody and attempts to re-claim his son.

Title: News Hounds
Summary: Working for the New York Daily Chronicle, Slip and the boys seek to expose rumored gamblers fixing sports events.

Title: Lilo & Stitch
Summary: Live-action remake of Disney's animated classic 'Lilo and Stitch'.

Title: Beau-père
Summary: After her mother dies, fourteen-year-old Marion falls in love with her stepfather, Remy.

Title: Why Did I Get Married Too?
Summary: Four couples struggle to save their marriages once again on their annual marriage retreat, while each of them battle through financial, physical, mental, and emotional issues.

Title: Make Me Believe
Summary: Two meddling grannies trick their adult grandkids into a meet-cute that reignites a childhood crush and old grudges.

Title: The House of the Spirits

Title: The Painted Bird
Summary: A young Jewish boy somewhere in Eastern Europe seeks refuge during World War II where he encounters many different characters.

Title: See You Up There

Title: The Funhouse
Summary: Four teenagers visit a local carnival for a night of innocent amusement, but soon discover that nothing there is innocent or amusing.

Title: Sex Cowboys
Summary: Marla and Simone are madly in love and have a very passionate relationship. They are also struggling to get by and are unable to pay the rent. In desperation they decide to make porn videos.

Title: Wolves
Summary: A boy is trying to find out about his family history and stumbles upon a town of lycans.

Title: 3000 Miles to Graceland
Summary: A gang of ex-cons rob a casino during Elvis convention week.

Title: Quo Vadis

Title: Apex
Summary: Six elite hunters pay to hunt down a man on a deserted island, only to find themselves becoming the prey.

Title: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
Summary: A small-town band hits it big, but it must battle a nefarious plot in the music industry.

Title: Chemical Hearts
Summary: A high-school transfer student finds a new passion when she begins to work on the school's newspaper.

Title: Rock 'n' Roll High School

Summary: After firing up a lost 1980s survival horror game, a young coder unleashes a hidden curse that tears reality apart, forcing her to make terrifying decisions and face deadly consequences.

Title: The Sentinel

Title: The Passion of Joan of Arc

Title: The 33
Summary: Based on the real-life event, when a gold and copper mine collapses, it traps 33 miners underground for 69 days.

Title: Radius
Summary: A man wakes up with no memory of who he is, and finds that everyone who comes within a certain distance of him suddenly dies.

Title: The Minute You Wake up Dead

Title: Orca
Summary: A hunter squares off against a killer whale seeking vengeance for the death of its mate.

Title: Hideaway
Summary: A homeless family lays claim to an abandoned house only to discover gangsters use it as a safe house after committing robberies.

Title: Dick

Title: The Big Boss
Summary: A young man sworn to an oath of non-violence works with his cousins in an ice factory where they mysteriously begin to disappear.

Title: The Goods: Live Hard, Sell Hard
Summary: Used-car liquidator Don Ready is hired by a flailing auto dealership to turn their Fourth of July sale into a majorly profitable event.

Summary: A group of cheerleaders from the local high school decide to show their school spirit for their football team by sleeping with the opponents the night before the game so that they can be so worn out the opposition won't be able to play.

Summary: A young pilot finds himself recruited unwittingly into a covert and corrupt CIA airlift operation in Laos during the Vietnam conflict.

Summary: Grieving hairdresser Justice goes on a road trip from South Central L.A. to Oakland on a mail truck alongside her friend and an obnoxious postal worker.

Summary: A beautiful but shy shepherdess plots vengeance on the men whose greedy conspiracy to acquire her father's land caused his death years earlier.

Summary: After living a long and colorful life, Allan Karlsson finds himself stuck in a nursing home. On his 100th birthday, he leaps out a window and begins an unexpected journey.

Title: Pillow Talk
Summary: An interior decorator and a playboy songwriter share a telephone party line and size each other up.

Title: Loveless
Summary: A couple going through a divorce must team up to find their son who has disappeared during one of their bitter arguments.
