Summary: An experiment in genetic engineering turns harmless sheep into bloodthirsty killers that terrorize a sprawling New Zealand farm.

Title: The Clan of the Cave Bear
Summary: A young Cro-Magnon woman is raised by Neanderthals.

Title: Florence Foster Jenkins
Summary: The story of Florence Foster Jenkins, a New York heiress who dreamed of becoming an opera singer, despite having a terrible singing voice.
The biopic promises to bring Muttiah Muralitharan's inspirational journey to a global audience, shedding light on the challenges and triumphs that defined his illustrious cricket career.

Title: Return of the Living Dead III
Summary: Having recently witnessed the horrific results of a top secret project to bring the dead back to life, a distraught youth performs the operation on his girlfriend after she's killed in a motorcycle accident.

Title: Asterix and Obelix vs. Caesar
Summary: Inhabitants of the last unconquered village in Gaul (ancient France) use a magical potion to hold their independence from Roman invaders.

Title: Barbershop
Summary: A day in the life of a South Side Chicago barbershop.

Title: Baby Shark's Big Movie!
Summary: Follow Baby Shark and his family as they leave Chomp City, the great city of sharks.

Title: The Thundermans Return
Summary: It centers on the family as they begin a new era of superhero crimefighting. When one save goes wrong, the Thundermans are sent back to Hiddenville.

Title: Jexi
Summary: Phil makes top 10 pop lists at work. His only "friend" is cellphone Siri. His new phone includes AI helper Jexi, who improves/controls his social life.

Title: Fun Mom Dinner
Summary: Four moms whose only common ground is their kids' preschool class, decide to get together for a harmless "fun mom dinner."

Title: Irish Wish
Summary: When the love of Maddie's life gets engaged to her best-friend, she puts her feelings aside to be a bridesmaid at their wedding in Ireland.

Title: Pootie Tang
Summary: "The Man" is baffled by a chill hero's invincible weapon: gibberish.

Title: The Senior
Summary: Follows a man who, 37 years ago, was kicked off his collegiate football team for an altercation. Now at 59, he still carries that burden. He decides to go back to school to get his degree and try out for the team to redeem his past.

Title: Pather Panchali
Summary: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

Title: Untitled Margot Robbie Ocean's Eleven Film
Summary: Plot under wraps

Title: Into the Forest
Summary: After a massive power outage, two sisters learn to survive on their own in their isolated woodland home.

Title: Frost/Nixon
Summary: A dramatic retelling of the post-Watergate television interviews between British talk-show host David Frost and former president Richard Nixon.

Summary: Alex, a burned out LA cyborg cop, is forced by commissioner Farnsworth to find his former cyborg partner and lover Jared who's about to deliver sensitive data to cyborg terrorists who wish to wage war against humans. Is he being played?

Title: Gray Matter
Summary: Aurora has known all her life from her mother that the superhuman abilities they have also make them dangerous. Now, Aurora will discover if her mother was speaking the truth on one fateful and fatal night.

Summary: Indians attack a stagecoach, and a disparate group of passengers must band together to fight them off.

Title: Holiday Harmony
Summary: A likeable and talented underdog gets momentarily sidelined from chasing her musical dreams when her van breaks down in a welcoming small town just before Christmas.

Title: Books of Blood
Summary: A journey into uncharted and forbidden territory through three tales tangled in space and time.

Title: Men & Chicken
Summary: Through getting to know their unknown family, two outcast brothers discover a horrible truth about themselves and their relatives.

Title: Heart of a Champion
Summary: When a girl finds a lost horse she enters a barrel racing competition and becomes champion.

Title: The Cabin in the Woods
Summary: Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin, where they get more than they bargained for, discovering the truth behind the cabin in the woods.

Title: Kung Fu Panda 4
Summary: Follow Po on his wide-eyed adventures in ancient China, whose love of kung fu is matched only by an insatiable appetite.

Title: Grown Ups
Summary: After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.

Title: Security
Summary: A security guard protects an eleven year-old girl who is being targeted by a gang for participating as a trial witness.

Title: Sleeping Beauty
Summary: A haunting portrait of Lucy, a young university student drawn into a mysterious hidden world of unspoken desires.

Title: I Don't Expect Anyone to Believe Me
Summary: A young man who wants to be a writer travels to Barcelona to study literature. In the Spanish city he is involved in a criminal business.

Title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
Summary: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

Title: The Blackout
Summary: Life on Earth is rapidly destroyed except for a small area in Eastern Europe.

Title: Forgotten Love
Summary: A once-respected surgeon professor Rafal Wilczur who's lost his family and his memory gets a chance at redemption when he reconnects with someone from his forgotten past who can help him finds the answers he needs.

Title: Ruby Gillman: Teenage Kraken
Summary: A shy adolescent learns that she comes from a fabled royal family of legendary sea krakens and that her destiny lies in the depths of the waters, which is bigger than she could have ever imagined.

Title: Robin Hood
Summary: In twelfth-century England, Robin Longstride and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.

Title: Thor
Summary: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

Title: The Retirement Plan
Summary: When Ashley and her young daughter Sarah get caught up in a criminal enterprise that puts their lives at risk, she turns to estranged father Matt, currently living the life of a retired beach bum in the Cayman Islands.

Title: What We Do in the Shadows
Summary: Viago, Deacon, and Vladislav are vampires who are struggling with the mundane aspects of modern life, like paying rent, keeping up with the chore wheel, trying to get into nightclubs, and overcoming flatmate conflicts.

Title: Love Again
Summary: A young woman tries to ease the pain of her fiancé's death by sending romantic texts to his old cell phone number, and forms a connection with the man the number has been reassigned to.

Title: Kung Fu Panda
Summary: To everyone's surprise, including his own, Po, an overweight, clumsy panda, is chosen as protector of the Valley of Peace. His suitability will soon be tested as the valley's arch-enemy is on his way.

Title: Small World
Summary: Follows policeman Robert Goc, who becomes engaged in an international investigation to find a girl who was kidnapped by Russian mafia.

Title: Your Name.
Summary: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.

Title: Now, Voyager
Summary: A frumpy spinster blossoms under therapy and becomes an elegant, independent woman.

Title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Summary: In 1938, after his father goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against the Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

Title: What Happens Later
Summary: Willa and Bill are ex-lovers that will see each other for the first time in years when they both find themselves snowed in, in-transit, at an airport overnight.

Title: Men in Black: International
Summary: The Men in Black have always protected the Earth from the scum of the universe. In this new adventure, they tackle their biggest threat to date: a mole in the Men in Black organization.

Title: Spencer's Mountain
Summary: Grand Teton quarryman and family patriarch carefully navigates issues of religion and education in order to eke out a brighter future for his family.

Title: It's a Wonderful Knife
Summary: After saving her town from a psychotic killer, Winnie Carruthers' life is less than wonderful. When she wishes she'd never been born, she finds herself in a nightmare parallel universe where without her, things could be much, much worse.

Title: Weird: The Al Yankovic Story
Summary: Explores every facet of Yankovic's life, from his meteoric rise to fame with early hits like 'Eat It' and 'Like a Surgeon' to his torrid celebrity love affairs and famously depraved lifestyle.

Title: The Wedding Singer
Summary: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

Title: Ready Player One
Summary: When the creator of a virtual reality called the OASIS dies, he makes a posthumous challenge to all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune and control of his world.

Title: The Great Race
Summary: In the early 20th century, two rivals, the heroic Leslie and the despicable Professor Fate, engage in an epic automobile race from New York to Paris.

Title: Shooter
Summary: A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after hearing of a plot to kill the President. After being-double crossed for the attempt and on the run, he sets out for the real killer and the truth.

Title: Last Sentinel
Summary: A platoon of soldiers are stranded in an abandoned military base on a near future Earth waiting for the relief or the enemy, whichever comes first.

Title: Office Space
Summary: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

Title: The Addams Family
Summary: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

Title: Jumanji
Summary: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades - and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

Title: Casablanca
Summary: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

Title: Better Off Dead...
Summary: After his girlfriend ditches him for a boorish ski jock, Lane decides that suicide is the only answer. However, his increasingly inept attempts bring him only more agony and embarrassment. Filled with the wildest teen nightmares.

Title: Captain America: The First Avenger
Summary: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a warmonger and a terrorist organization.

Title: Constantine
Summary: Supernatural exorcist and demonologist John Constantine helps a policewoman prove her sister's death was not a suicide, but something more.

Title: Big
Summary: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

Title: Remember Me
Summary: A romantic drama centered on two new lovers: Tyler, whose parents have split in the wake of his brother's suicide, and Ally, who lives each day to the fullest since witnessing her mother's murder.

Title: Suspiria
Summary: A darkness swirls at the center of a world-renowned dance company, one that will engulf the artistic director, an ambitious young dancer, and a grieving psychotherapist. Some will succumb to the nightmare. Others will finally wake up.

Title: Dan in Real Life
Summary: A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend.

Title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
Summary: Shang-Chi, the master of weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.

Title: Wedding Crashers
Summary: John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey, a pair of committed womanizers who sneak into weddings to take advantage of the romantic tinge in the air, find themselves at odds with one another when John meets and falls for Claire Cleary.

Title: Not Another Teen Movie
Summary: A sendup of all the teen movies that have accumulated in the past two decades.

Title: Thunderbolts
Summary: A group of supervillains are recruited to go on missions for the government.

Title: Showgirls
Summary: Carefree young drifter Nomi arrives in Las Vegas, Nevada to become a dancer and sets about clawing her way to the top of the Vegas showgirls.

Title: The Princess Diaries
Summary: Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her sixteenth year.

Title: Legends of the Fall
Summary: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

Title: Just Go with It
Summary: On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.

Title: Hostel
Summary: Three backpackers head to a Slovak city that promises to meet their hedonistic expectations, with no idea of the hell that awaits them.

Title: Only Yesterday
Summary: A twenty-seven-year-old office worker travels to the countryside while reminiscing about her childhood in Tokyo.

Title: As Good as Dead
Summary: Bryant befriends a troubled teen and introduces him to martial arts. As Bryant's mysterious and dangerous past catches up to him, he is forced into a life and death struggle to clear his name, save the boy and get back all he left behind.

Title: Breakheart Pass
Summary: John Deakin is being transported, as a prisoner, on a train with supplies and medicine to Fort Humboldt, Nevada.

Title: The Flight of the Phoenix
Summary: After an oil company plane crashes in the Sahara, the survivors are buoyed with hope by one of the passengers, an airplane designer who plans for them to build a flyable plane from the wreckage.

Title: Switch
Summary: A sexist womanizer is killed by one of his former lovers and then reincarnated as a woman.

Title: The Long Game
Summary: In 1955, five young Mexican-American caddies, out of the love for the game, were determined to learn how to play, so they created their own golf course in the middle of the South Texas desert.

Title: The Hive
Summary: A couple returns home from a night out to find two sadistic strangers waiting to terrorize them.

Title: Breathe
Summary: The inspiring true love story of Robin and Diana Cavendish, an adventurous couple who refuse to give up in the face of a devastating disease.

Title: Nothing to Lose
Summary: Nick's wife's in bed with his boss. He later gets a gun to his head by a carjacker but steps on the gas pedal. They end up friends after adventures together - holdups, burglary, reckless driving, revenge etc. Twists follow.

Title: Down with Love
Summary: In 1962 New York City, love blossoms between a playboy journalist and a feminist advice author.

Title: Back to Black
Summary: Follow the life and music of Winehouse, who started out as a jazz singer to eventually become a Grammy-winning music superstar. Her life would eventually be cut short in 2011 at age 27 after a long battle with alcohol and drugs.

Title: The Go-Between
Summary: A tale of torrid and forbidden love between a couple in the English countryside.

Title: The Rivals of Amziah King
Summary: Plot under wraps.

Title: She
Summary: In a post-apocalyptic world, She aids two brothers' quest to rescue their kidnapped sister. Along the way, they battle weird creatures before standing against the odds to defeat the evil Norks.

Title: The Housemaid
Summary: A man's affair with his family's housemaid leads to dark consequences.

Title: Run Silent Run Deep
Summary: A U.S. sub commander, obsessed with sinking a certain Japanese ship, butts heads with his first officer and crew.

Title: Planet 51
Summary: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.

Title: Queer
Summary: Lee, who recounts his life in Mexico City among American expatriate college students and bar owners surviving on part-time jobs and GI Bill benefits. He driven to pursue a young man named Allerton, who is based on Adelbert Lewis Marker.

Title: The Mutilator
Summary: A college student, who accidentally killed his mother as a child, decides to take his friends to his father's fishing cabin during fall break, not knowing that his crazed father is stalking the place.

Title: Ouija
Summary: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

Title: Krystal
Summary: A young man living a sheltered life develops a crush on an ex-stripper and joins her Alcoholics Anonymous group just so he can be in the same room with her.

Title: Sweetwater
Summary: In the fall of 1950, Nat 'Sweetwater' Clifton makes history in his journey to become the first African American to sign an NBA contract, forever changing the game of basketball.

Title: Valley Girl
Summary: A pair of young lovers from different backgrounds defy their parents and friends to stay together, set to a New Wave '80s soundtrack. A musical adaptation of the 1983 film.

Summary: An ex-union soldier is hired to transport gold from a mining community through dangerous territory. But what he doesn't realize is that his partner and old friend is plotting to double-cross him.

Title: Brahms: The Boy II

Title: Exit Through the Gift Shop

Title: Split Second

Summary: The Moorish General Othello is manipulated into thinking that his new wife Desdemona has been carrying on an affair with his Lieutenant Michael Cassio, when in reality, it is all part of the scheme of a bitter Ensign named Iago.

Title: Bachelorette
Summary: Three friends are asked to be bridesmaids at a wedding of a woman they used to ridicule back in high school.

Title: A Midsummer Night's Dream
Summary: The adventures of four young lovers, a group of amateur actors and their interactions with fairies come to light in a moonlit forest.

Title: I Think We're Alone Now

Title: The Black Stallion
Summary: After being shipwrecked with a magnificent horse off the coast of Africa in the 1940s, a boy bonds with the stallion, and trains him to race after their rescue.

Title: Who's That Knocking at My Door
Summary: A young man can't accept the girl he likes because of her bitter past.

Title: Summer of 85
Summary: When 16-year-old Alexis capsizes off the coast of Normandy, 18-year-old David heroically saves him. Alexis has just met the friend of his dreams, who opens his eyes to a new horizon of friendship, art and sexual bliss.

Summary: Each member of the Mermer family, struggles with their own problems. Serhan has difficulty adjusting Begüm, to their new life. While Serhat is now missing a woman in his life, Gazanfer struggles to keep his family together.

Title: Stan Helsing
Summary: A spoof on many horror movie series. Ending his shift at the video rental, Stan's picked up by his BFF and 2 cute girls, all going to a Halloween party. Will they even get there?

Title: Secret Admirer
Summary: An anonymous love letter left in Michael Ryan's locker on the last day of school wreaks havoc on his life and the lives of everyone who come in contact with it.

Title: When the Wind Blows
Summary: A naive elderly British rural couple survive the initial onslaught of a nuclear war.

Title: The First Day of My Life
Summary: A mysterious man gifts four strangers on the brink of suicide a chance to see what life would be like without them.

Title: It Be an Evil Moon
Summary: A disgraced scientist develops a hair growth formula derived from pickled wolfsbane.

Title: Problem Child 2
Summary: The worst child in the world makes an unthinkable discovery: there is another child even worse than he is--and it's a girl.

Title: Paint Your Wagon

Title: Clouds
Summary: Based on real events, a young musician discovers his cancer has spread, leaving him just a few months to live. With limited time, he follows his dream and makes an album, unaware that it will soon be a viral music phenomenon.

Title: Temptation: Confessions of a Marriage Counselor
Summary: An ambitious married woman's temptation by a handsome billionaire leads to betrayal, recklessness, and forever alters the course of her life.

Title: Sea Fever
Summary: The crew of a West of Ireland trawler, marooned at sea, struggle for their lives against a growing parasite in their water supply.

Summary: A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.

Title: The Secret Life of Bees

Title: Ida
Summary: A novice nun about to take her vows uncovers a family secret dating back to the German occupation.

Title: Step Up All In
Summary: All-stars from the previous Step Up installments come together in glittering Las Vegas, battling for a victory that could define their dreams and their careers.

Title: Bad Samaritan
Summary: A pair of burglars stumble upon a woman being held captive in a home they intended to rob.

Title: Gold Brick
Summary: Determined to even the scales and profit from his thankless job, a factory worker schemes to traffic luxury perfumes from under his employer's nose.

Title: Severance
Summary: During a team-building retreat in the mountains a group of sales representatives are hunted down one by one.

Title: Darkness Falls
Summary: A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before.

Title: Air Mata Di Ujung Sajadah

Title: Gigi
Summary: Weary of the conventions of Parisian society, a rich playboy and a youthful courtesan-in-training enjoy a platonic friendship which may not stay platonic for long.

Title: A Man Apart
Summary: A man known as Diablo emerges to head a drug cartel after the previous leader is imprisoned.

Title: Butt Boy

Title: Sunrise

Title: Swing Kids

Title: Lonesome
Summary: Casey, a country lad running from a small-town scandal, finds himself down and out in big city Sydney. When he meets city lad Tib both men find something they have been missing but neither of them knows quite how to negotiate it.

Title: To Live
Summary: After Fugui and Jiazhen lose their personal fortunes, they raise a family and survive difficult cultural changes during 1940s to 1970s China.

Title: Juliet, Naked
Summary: Annie (the long-suffering girlfriend of Duncan) has an unlikely transatlantic romance with once revered, now faded, singer-songwriter, Tucker Crowe, who also happens to be the subject of Duncan's musical obsession.

Title: To End All War: Oppenheimer & the Atomic Bomb
Summary: Exploring how one man's brilliance, hubris and relentless drive changed the nature of war forever.

Title: Rescued by Ruby
Summary: Chasing his dream to join an elite K-9 unit, a state trooper partners with a fellow underdog: clever but naughty shelter pup Ruby.

Title: County Line
Summary: When former sheriff Alden Rockwell's best friend is shot, he volunteers as a private investigator to find out the truth behind the shooting and discovers a criminal conspiracy between two counties.

Title: The Hottie & the Nottie
Summary: A woman agrees to go on a date with a man only if he finds a suitor for her unattractive best friend.

Title: Return of the Living Dead II
Summary: Curious kids unearth the barrels that previously helped revive the dead, which proves the second time's an undead charm.

Title: Trash Humpers
Summary: Follows the lives of a small group of sociopathic elderly people in Nashville, Tennessee.

Title: Passing
Summary: "Passing" follows the unexpected reunion of two high school friends, whose renewed acquaintance ignites a mutual obsession that threatens both of their carefully constructed realities.

Title: The Good Neighbor
Summary: The budding friendship between two very different neighbours takes a tragic turn when David runs over a young woman and causes her death.

Title: Oslo, August 31st

Title: Nim's Island
Summary: A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she's reading.

Title: 247°F
Summary: Four friends travel to a lakeside cabin for a carefree weekend, the fun turns into a nightmare when 3 of them end up locked in a hot sauna. Every minute counts and every degree matters as they fight for their lives in the heat up to 247°F.

Title: Thrashin'
Summary: Two skateboarding gangs battle each other for supremacy, and a member of one gang falls in love with the sister of his rival.

Title: Amar
Summary: Laura and Carlos love each other as if every day was the last, and perhaps that first love intensity is what will tear them apart a year later.

Title: Yoga Hosers
Summary: Two teenage yoga enthusiasts must do battle with an evil presence that is threatening to rise from its underground lair and endanger their major party plans.

Title: The Man Behind the Gun

Title: Antigang: La Relève

Summary: A year after Sheila is killed by a hit-and-run driver, her wealthy husband invites a group of friends to spend a week on his yacht playing a scavenger hunt mystery game. The game turns out to be all too real and all too deadly.

Title: Heavy
Summary: The life of an overweight, unhappy cook is changed after a kind, beautiful college drop-out comes to work as a waitress at his and his mother's road-side restaurant.

Title: Shaft
Summary: A crime lord hires black private eye, John Shaft, to find and retrieve his kidnapped daughter.

Title: After the Wedding
Summary: A manager of an orphanage in India is sent to Copenhagen, Denmark, where he discovers a life-altering family secret.

Title: Zeroville
Summary: A young ex-communicated seminarian, Ike "Vikar" Jerome, arrives in Los Angeles on the same August day in 1969 that a crazed hippie ''family'' led by Charles Manson commits five savage murders.

Summary: After a bad gambling bet, a schoolteacher is marooned in a town full of crazy, drunk, violent men who threaten to make him just as crazy, drunk, and violent.

Summary: Heather, an outcast teenage goalie, falls for newcomer Jonny, an alluring but tormented figure skater. As their relationship deepens, Heather's growing desires clash with her darkest secret, forcing her to control the animal within.

Title: Blackbird

Title: The Deep Dark
Summary: Miners are forced to take a professor underground with them, to take samples for his measurements. After a landslide prevents them from going back up, they discover a crypt from another time, unknowingly waking up a bloodthirsty creature.

Director: William A. Wellman,Harry d'Abbadie d'Arrast,Harry d'Abbadie d'Arrast(uncredited)

Title: Coffy
Summary: A sexy Black nurse takes vigilante justice against inner-city drug dealers after her sister becomes their latest victim.

Title: Feed
Summary: A group of social media experts are hired to help an old family business to thrive. But they soon find themselves stuck on a tiny island in a lake in which an ancient Swedish witch is said to live.

Title: In Hell
Summary: A man must survive a prison where hardened criminals battle to the death for the wardens' entertainment.

Title: Homesick
Summary: Two half-siblings who grew up apart meet for the first time as adults and fall in love.

Title: The Gorge
Summary: Two very dangerous young people who, despite the corrupt and lethal world they operate in, find a soulmate in each other.

Title: Dear Zoe
Summary: When Tess and her family suffer an unimaginable loss, she finds support from a surprising source: her biological father - a lovable slacker from the wrong side of the tracks - and the charming but dangerous juvenile delinquent next door.

Summary: A prepubescent chess prodigy is encouraged to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

Summary: A diverse group of people with a chronic fear of flying are stranded in the wintry north.

Title: Creep

Title: Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story

Title: Eugenie
Summary: An innocent girl goes to spend the weekend on an island with a woman and her brother, but soon finds herself entangled in a web of sexual experiments.

Title: Galveston
Summary: After escaping a set up, a dying hitman returns to his hometown of Galveston where he plans his revenge.

Title: Short Circuit 2
Summary: Robot Johnny Five comes to the city and gets manipulated by criminals who want him for their own purposes.

Title: A Difficult Year
Summary: Two swindlers, deep in debt, infiltrate a group of climate activists when they are attracted to the free food and drinks they are offered.

Title: Paris Paramount
Summary: A filmmaking duo, who after falling in and out of love, reunite on set to work together again.

Summary: A serpentine day in the life of ten seemingly desperate women: a porn star, a flight attendant, a psychiatrist, a masseuse, a bartender, a pair of call girls, an actress, a masseuse. All of them with one crucial thing in common. Trouble.

Title: The Unknown Soldier
Summary: A film adaptation of Väinö Linna's best selling novel The Unknown Soldier (1954) and the novel's unedited manuscript version, Sotaromaani.

Title: Japan
Summary: A daring robbery in a jewellery showroom kickstarts the hunt for Japan, a notorious robber, who is a law unto himself.

Summary: The Trick follows Balachandran, a man with a bad past, who marries Alagini,turning him into a jovial and loving person.The Jinn, a supernatural entity, takes control of Balachandran,causing him to lose trust and face horrific consequences.

Title: Fort Massacre
Summary: A cavalry troop finds itself under constant attack by Indians.

Title: Like Water for Chocolate
Summary: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.

Title: Spanking the Monkey
Summary: A med student is forced by his traveling salesman dad to cancel a top summer internship and look after his hot mom, who's bedridden with a broken leg. Applying lotion to her legs arouses him.

Title: 3 Days in Malay

Title: The Delivered

Title: Message in a Bottle

Title: Hitmen

Title: Sex, Lies, and Sugar
Summary: Steve Balderson's movie, "Sex, Lies, and Sugar" focuses on a group of 1960's era suburban housewives. Close-knit and neighborly, they are all bent on one-upping each other, trying to prove that each is "the hostess with the mostess." They begin a recipe club, holding dinner parties, testing out their new casseroles. But when the gatherings become increasingly boozy an... Read all

Title: Rising Sun
Summary: When an escort girl is found dead in the offices of a Japanese company in Los Angeles, detectives Web Smith and John Connor act as liaison between the company's executives and the investigating cop Tom Graham.

Title: Duck Soup
Summary: Rufus T. Firefly is named the dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of his wealthy backer Mrs. Teasdale, contending with two inept spies who can't seem to keep straight which side they're on.

Title: The Prince
Summary: When his daughter is kidnapped, a retired assassin is drawn back into the life he gave up. To rescue her, he must confront his former rival.

Summary: A mother and daughter find their lives adversely affected when a new man enters the picture. Will their family ever be what they expect?

Title: Black '47

Title: High Society
Summary: With socialite Tracy Lord about to remarry, her ex-husband - with the help of a sympathetic reporter - has 48 hours to convince her that she really still loves him.

Title: The Water Horse
Summary: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

Title: After Everything
Summary: A young couple's relationship develops quickly when one of them is diagnosed with a life-changing illness.

Title: Jim Jones
Summary: Plot under wraps.

Title: Rendezvous with Rama
Summary: A team of astronauts are sent on a mission to explore a giant interstellar spaceship hurtling toward the sun. Based on the novel by Arthur C. Clarke.

Summary: Phoebe is an obsessed fitness nerd who gets her big break on a sleazy workout video. After being ridiculed by her co-stars, Phoebe befriends a mafia princess wild child, who teaches her how to murder her way to the top.

Title: The Fast Lady

Title: Poison Ivy II

Summary: Doctor and patient try to unlock not only a traumatic event Anne is suppressing, but also who was there, why it happened, and why Anne's subconscious is fighting so hard to prevent her from talking about it.

Title: Six Minutes to Midnight
Summary: UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear from a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job six days later, secretly trying to find out what happened.

Title: Blue Mountain State: The Rise of Thadland
Summary: When the Dean of Blue Mountain State threatens to sell the Goat House, Alex throws Thad the party of his dreams in an effort to get him to buy it.

Title: Christmas in the Pines
Summary: Follows Ariel and Mark, who discover that their holiday break on an idyllic Christmas cottage may not be the only thing they love.

Title: What About Love
Summary: Two young lovers change the lives of their parents forever when the parents learn from the joyful experience of their kids, and allow themselves to again find their love.

Title: Never Goin' Back
Summary: Jessie and Angela, high school dropouts, are taking a week off to chill at the beach. Too bad their house got robbed, rent's due, they're about to get fired, and they're broke.

Title: The Absence of Eden
Summary: An ICE Agent struggling with the moral dilemmas of border security and an undocumented woman fighting to escape a ruthless cartel cross paths and work together to save the life of an innocent girl.

Title: The Survivalist
Summary: In a time of starvation, a survivalist lives off a small plot of land hidden deep in forest. When two women seeking food and shelter discover his farm, he finds his existence threatened.

Title: Felicity
Summary: Teenager Felicity studies at a remote Roman Catholic Church boarding school and seeks indulgence in popular erotic novels Story of O, Emmanuelle and in a lesbian love affair with her friend Jenny.

Title: The Transformers: The Movie
Summary: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

Title: Stay as You Are
Summary: Stuck in a dysfunctional marriage, a middle-aged architect has a chance encounter with an alluring student and they start an affair. He wants to be loved; she needs a meaningful relationship. However--could he be her missing father?

Title: A Waltons Thanksgiving
Summary: The Walton family enthusiastically prepares for the annual Harvest Festival Fair on Walton's Mountain in 1934, but a young boy's arrival dramatically changes their lives.

Title: In My Mother's Skin
Summary: Stranded in the Philippines during World War II, a young girl finds that her duty to protect her dying mother is complicated by her misplaced trust in a beguiling, flesh-eating fairy.

Title: Last Man Standing
Summary: A drifting gunslinger-for-hire finds himself in the middle of an ongoing war between the Irish and Italian mafia in a Prohibition era ghost town.

Title: Step Up Revolution
Summary: Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's development plans.

Title: Three of Us
Summary: A delicate thread of emotions about love, loss, healing, awareness and liberation.

Title: An Eye for an Eye
Summary: A SFPD undercover narcotics cop aims to avenge his partner's death and destroy a drug-smuggling ring operated by the Chinese Triads.

Title: The Hidden Fortress
Summary: Lured by gold, two greedy peasants unknowingly escort a princess and her general across enemy lines.

Title: She's the One
Summary: The love lives of two brothers, Mickey and Francis, interconnect as Francis cheats on his wife with Mickey's ex-girlfriend, while Mickey impulsively marries a stranger.

Title: Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead
Summary: Five different criminals face imminent death after botching a job quite badly.

Title: Beast
Summary: A troubled woman living in an isolated community finds herself pulled between the control of her oppressive family and the allure of a secretive outsider suspected of a series of brutal murders.

Title: Ataturk
Summary: The story of the life of the founder of the Turkish Republic and its first President, a towering figure of the 20th Century Mustafa Kemal ATATÜRK.

Title: Savage Grace
Summary: A dramatization of the shocking Barbara Daly Baekeland murder case, which happened in a posh London flat on Friday 17 November 1972. The bloody crime caused a stir on both sides of the Atlantic and remains one of the most memorable American Tragedies...

Title: Evangelion: 3.0+1.01 Thrice Upon a Time
Summary: Misato and her anti-NERV group WILLE arrive in Paris, a city now red from core-ization. Crew from the flagship Wunder land on a containment tower.

Title: To All the Boys: Always and Forever
Summary: Lara Jean's senior year of high school takes center stage when she returns from a family trip to Korea and considers her college plans--with and without Peter.

Title: Maudie
Summary: An arthritic Nova Scotia woman works as a housekeeper while she hones her skills as an artist and eventually becomes a beloved figure in the community.

Title: Sweet Movie
Summary: After winning the "most virgin" contest, Miss Canada is married to a rich milk tycoon. But she quickly flees the marriage to experience the world around her, full of sweetness and anarchy.

Title: Julia
Summary: Pauli is a sexually frustrated young man who's surrounded by sexually liberated women who will not give him the time of day. He meets a beautiful virgin woman, Andrea, who strongly resists his charms, which compounds his frustrations.

Title: Ju-on: The Grudge
Summary: A mysterious and vengeful spirit marks and pursues anybody who dares enter the house in which it resides.

Title: Pet Shop Days
Summary: Follows the affair between the impulsive Alejandro and the college-age pet store employee Jack, exploring the underbelly of New York and a romance that sends them down a rabbit hole of vice.

Title: What Lies Below
Summary: A 16-year-old girl returns home from camp and learns that her mother has a new boyfriend, one she intends to marry. A man whose charm, intelligence and beauty make him look like he's not human at all.

Title: Yellow Submarine
Summary: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his yellow submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music-hating Blue Meanies.

Title: The Venture Bros.: Radiant Is the Blood of the Baboon Heart
Summary: Doc's latest invention will either bankrupt the Ventures or launch them to new heights.

Title: Ein ganzes Leben
Summary: At the turn of the 20th century, a young orphan named Andreas Egger is sent to a valley where he will spend most of his life. Over eight decades, his life will be marked by poverty, war and violence, but also moments of bliss and love.

Title: ...And God Created Woman
Summary: In sunny St. Tropez, a young sexpot loves one brother but marries the other.

Title: She's Funny That Way
Summary: On the set of a playwright's new project, a love triangle forms between his wife, her ex-lover and the call-girl-turned-actress cast in the production.

Title: YPF
Summary: On a Tuesday night, five couples have separate sexual adventures.

Title: The Serpent and the Rainbow
Summary: An anthropologist goes to Haiti after hearing rumors about a drug used by black magic practitioners to turn people into zombies.

Title: Bulletproof Monk
Summary: Based on the very underground comic book of the same name, a Tibetan monk becomes a mentor to a young street punk and tries teaching him how to protect the scroll of ultimate power from a secret Nazi organization bent on world domination.

Title: Starred Up
Summary: Eric Love, 19, is locked up in prison. On his first day, he assaults another inmate and several guards. He's offered group therapy and his dad, an inmate as well, tries to talk sense into him. Can he be rehabilitated?

Title: Kane
Summary: Benny works for old school crime boss Abe, Abe has multiple personalities and is in a gang war with the notorious Frankie. Kane is the deadliest of Abe's personalities, the next 24 hours will be a killer. Today is a good day to die.

Title: Leatherface: Texas Chainsaw Massacre III
Summary: A California couple and a survivalist encounter Leatherface and his family.

Title: When in Rome
Summary: Beth is a young, ambitious New Yorker who is completely unlucky in love. However, on a whirlwind trip to Rome, she impulsively steals some coins from a reputed fountain of love, and is then aggressively pursued by a band of suitors.

Title: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid
Summary: A scientific expedition sets out for Borneo to seek a flower called the Blood Orchid, which could grant longer life. Meanwhile, they run afoul of snakes and each other.

Title: Bring Him to Me
Summary: Under orders from a ruthless crime boss, a getaway driver must battle his conscience and drive an unsuspecting crew member to an ambush execution. There is a long drive ahead.

Title: T-34
Summary: An SS Panzer Division uses a T-34 manned by Soviet POWs as a training target, but the prisoners plot a daring maneuver.

Title: While We're Young
Summary: A middle-aged couple's career and marriage are overturned when a disarming young couple enters their lives.

Title: Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House
Summary: The story of Mark Felt, who under the name "Deep Throat" helped journalists Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the Watergate scandal in 1972.

Title: Breathe
Summary: Air-supply is scarce in the near future, forcing a mother and daughter to fight to survive when two strangers arrive desperate for an oxygenated haven.

Title: Apt Pupil
Summary: A boy blackmails his neighbor after suspecting him to be a Nazi war criminal.

Title: Christmas Angel
Summary: Ashley feels alone at Christmas as she searches for a job. Her neighbor Nick offers her a job as his assistant in the best work: helping others. There's one catch she can't tell anyone that her new boss is a sort of Secret Santa.

Title: The Lady in the Van
Summary: A man forms an unexpected bond with a transient woman living in her van that's parked in his driveway.

Title: Z
Summary: The public murder of a prominent politician and doctor amid a violent demonstration is covered up by military and government officials. A tenacious magistrate is determined not to let them get away with it.

Title: Midori
Summary: The story based off of the controversial manga by Suehiro Maruo takes place where a little orphaned girl joins a freak-show circus troupe whose members rape and abuse her. She then finds a glimmer of hope in the enigmatic magician who joins the group.

Title: The Secret of Kells
Summary: A young boy in a remote medieval outpost under siege from barbarian raids is beckoned to adventure when a celebrated master illuminator arrives with an ancient book, brimming with secret wisdom and powers.

Title: Angel-A
Summary: A beautiful woman helps an inept scam artist get his game together.

Title: The Experiment
Summary: For two weeks, 20 male participants are hired to play prisoners and guards in a prison. The "prisoners" have to follow seemingly mild rules, and the "guards" are told to retain order without using physical violence.

Title: Beverly Hills Ninja
Summary: A man tries to rescue a woman with a little help from his half brother.

Title: Happily
Summary: A dark romantic comedy. Tom and Janet have been happily married for years. But a visit from a mysterious stranger leads to a dead body, a lot of questions, and a tense couples' trip with friends who may not actually be friends at all.

Title: The Rhythm Section
Summary: A woman seeks revenge against those who orchestrated a plane crash that killed her family.

Title: The General
Summary: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines.

Title: Hounddog
Summary: A drama set in the American South, where a precocious, troubled girl finds a safe haven in the music and movement of Elvis Presley.

Title: Revenge of the Nerds II: Nerds in Paradise
Summary: The rising college nerds set out to a convention in Florida, but are not welcomed by the Alpha Beta representatives.

Title: The Boy Who Could Fly
Summary: An autistic boy who dreams of flying touches everyone he meets, including a new family who has moved in after their father dies.

Title: Crimes of Passion
Summary: A mysterious woman, fashion designer by day and prostitute by night, is hounded by two men: a married father of two children and a sexually repressed preacher.

Title: Meet the Blacks
Summary: As Carl Black gets the opportunity to move his family out of Chicago in hope of a better life, their arrival in Beverly Hills is timed with that city's annual purge, where all crime is legal for twelve hours.

Title: Romance & Cigarettes
Summary: This down-and-dirty musical set in the world of working-class New York tells the story of a husband's journey into infidelity and redemption when he must choose between his seductive mistress and his beleaguered wife.

Title: Barber
Summary: Val Barber, a private investigator, is hired by a wealthy widow to find her missing granddaughter.

Title: Viva Las Vegas
Summary: A race-car driver preparing for the Grand Prix wiles his time in Las Vegas working as a waiter to pay for his new engine and soon strikes up a romance with a beautiful young woman.

Title: Witch Hunt
Summary: In a modern America where witches are real and witchcraft is illegal, a sheltered teenager must face her own demons and prejudices as she helps two young witches avoid law enforcement and cross the southern border to asylum in Mexico.

Title: The Cure
Summary: Erik, a loner, finds a friend in Dexter, an eleven-year-old boy with AIDS. They vow to find a cure for AIDS together and save Dexter's life in an eventful summer.

Title: The Last Thing He Wanted

Title: Bent
Summary: On his release from a prison sentence for crimes of which he was innocent, a shamed former cop connects a murder case to a government conspiracy involving rogue agents from a top spy agency.

Title: House of the Dead
Summary: A group of college students travels to a mysterious island to attend a rave, which is soon taken over by bloodthirsty zombies.

Title: Gun Fury
Summary: In Arizona, Frank Slayton's gang robs a stagecoach and kidnaps Ben Warren's fiancée, prompting Warren to pursue Slayton.

Title: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West
Summary: Fievel's family decides to move out to the West, unaware that they are falling into a trap perpetrated by a smooth-talking cat.

Title: Troop Zero
Summary: In rural 1977 Georgia, a misfit girl dreams of life in outer space. When a competition offers her a chance to be recorded on NASA's Golden Record, she recruits a makeshift troop of Birdie Scouts, forging friendships that last a lifetime.

Title: Clementine
Summary: Reeling from a one-sided breakup, heartbroken Karen breaks into her ex's lake house. There, she strikes up a complicated relationship with provocative younger woman Lana.

Title: The Water Diviner
Summary: An Australian man travels to Turkey after the Battle of Gallipoli to try to locate his three missing sons.

Title: Deseo
Summary: A succession of erotic encounters weaved into a daisy chain of delightful sensuality. DESEO is a modern-day adaptation of Reigen, the controversial stage-play by the celebrated XIX century Austrian playwright, Arthur Schnitzler.

Title: Coriolanus
Summary: A banished hero of Rome allies with a sworn enemy to take his revenge on the city.

Title: The Eye
Summary: Violinist Sydney Wells was accidentally blinded by her sister Helen when she was five years old. She submits to a cornea transplantation, and while recovering from the operation, she realizes that she is seeing dead people.

Title: Three O'Clock High
Summary: A nerd gets himself in hot water with the new bully, a quiet bad boy who challenges him to fight on the grounds of their high school after the day's end.

Title: Paramporul
Summary: Revolves around the smuggling mafia of sacred temple idols and a cop who involves with a smuggler to make money out of a sacred idol, possessed by a murder victim.

Title: All I See Is You
Summary: A blind woman's relationship with her husband changes when she regains her sight and discovers disturbing details about themselves.

Title: Twisted
Summary: Jessica, whose father killed her mother and committed suicide, is a police officer. While investigating a murder, she finds herself in the center of her own investigation, when her former lovers start being murdered.

Title: Two Queens and One Consort
Summary: At the deathbed of his used-to-be militant mother an older man looks back at his childhood, when he was in love with his sensual aunt Coleta.

Title: Soul Man
Summary: To achieve his dream of attending Harvard, a pampered teen poses as a young black man to receive a full scholarship.

Title: Love & Friendship
Summary: Lady Susan Vernon takes up temporary residence at her in-laws' estate and, while there, is determined to be a matchmaker for her daughter Frederica -- and herself too, naturally.

Title: 7th Secret
Summary: A young wife harboring a secret finds herself wrapped up in a double life.

Title: Croupier
Summary: An aspiring writer is hired as a croupier at a casino, where he realizes that his life as a croupier would make a great novel.

Title: London Boulevard
Summary: An ex-con with a reputation tries to go straight by working as a handy man for a reclusive actress but this is unfortunately not the wish of London's underground crime lord.

Title: Ivan's Childhood
Summary: During WWII, Soviet orphan Ivan Bondarev strikes up a friendship with three sympathetic Soviet officers while working as a scout behind the German lines.

Title: Grudge Match
Summary: A pair of aging boxing rivals are coaxed out of retirement to fight one final bout, thirty years after their last match.

Title: Glisten and the Merry Mission
Summary: Follows Marzipan, a young elfling, and her mother Cinnameg, as Marzipan must believe in the magic of the season and goes on an adventure to rediscover the enchanted snow deer named Glisten and save Christmas.

Title: Blinded by the Light
Summary: In England in 1987, a teenager from an Asian family learns to live his life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of American rock star Bruce Springsteen.

Title: The Bay
Summary: Chaos breaks out in a small Maryland town after an ecological disaster occurs.

Title: No Good Deed
Summary: An unstable escaped convict terrorizes a woman who is alone with her two children.

Title: Shoulder Dance
Summary: The slippery lines between friends and lovers threaten to trip up two couples-one gay, one straight-over a wild weekend of seductive games, all-out indulgence, and unraveling revelations in this award-winning romantic drama.

Title: Johnny Be Good
Summary: Johnny's the top high-school football player and many colleges want him. His girlfriend, coach and best friend want him in the college, serving themselves most.

Title: Resurrected
Summary: In a dystopian future, the Vatican knows how to resurrect people. A priest discovers a conspiracy behind the resurrections and their possible link to a series of murders.

Title: The Perfect Match
Summary: A playboy named Charlie, convinced that all his relationships are dead, meets the beautiful and mysterious Eva. Agreeing to a casual affair, Charlie then wants a bit more from their relationship.

Title: The Emerald Forest
Summary: After the son of engineer Bill Markham is abducted by an aboriginal tribe on the edge of the rain forest, the engineer spends the next 10 years searching for him.

Title: Trouble Every Day
Summary: Two American newlyweds in Paris experience a love so strong, it almost devours them.

Title: Hell on the Border
Summary: Arkansas, 1875, After shooting 5 men to save a judge and then going into Indian Territory after a lethal outlaw, Bass Reeves becomes the first black deputy marshal west of Mississippi.

Title: Theater of Blood
Summary: A Shakespearean actor takes poetic revenge on the critics who denied him recognition.

Title: Merry Mystery Christmas
Summary: A rising star reporter must uncover the identity of a local late-night bandit who has been stealing beautiful home Christmas displays across the city.

Title: Nowhere to Run
Summary: Sam, an escaped convict, lands up on a farmland owned by a widow. When he learns that a ruthless contractor is trying to take over her land, he helps her to fight against the injustice.

Title: My Name Is Vendetta
Summary: After old enemies kill his family, a former mafia enforcer and his feisty daughter flee to Milan, where they hide out while plotting their revenge.

Title: Mustang
Summary: When five orphan girls are seen innocently playing with boys on a beach, their scandalized conservative guardians confine them while forced marriages are arranged.

Title: The Boxer
Summary: Young Danny Flynn is released from prison 14 years after "taking the rap" for the IRA and tries to rebuild his life in his old Belfast neighborhood.

Title: Amateur Teens
Summary: A modern tragedy about a group of 14-year-old schoolchildren whose daily life is shaped by the power of social media and ever increasing sexualisation through the Internet.

Title: The Girlfriend Experience
Summary: A drama set in the days leading up to the 2008 Presidential election, and centered on a high-end Manhattan call girl meeting the challenges of her boyfriend, her clients, and her work.

Title: Allan Quatermain and the Lost City of Gold
Summary: Allan Quatermain once again teams up with Jesse Huston where the discovery of a mysterious old gold piece sends Quatermain looking for his long-lost brother, missing in the wilds of Africa after seeking a lost white race.

Title: The Invisible Guardian
Summary: A female inspector confronts a serial killer while dealing with the ghosts of her past.

Title: Summer Catch
Summary: A rich girl whose family summers on Cape Cod has a romance with a local poor boy who hopes to become a major league baseball player.

Title: El Cid
Summary: The fabled Spanish hero Rodrigo Diaz de Vivar (a.k.a. El Cid) overcomes a family vendetta and court intrigue to defend Christian Spain against the Moors.

Title: Tom and Huck
Summary: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

Title: The Phantom of the Opera
Summary: A mad, disfigured composer seeks love with a lovely young opera singer.
Director: Ernst Laemmle(uncredited),Ernst Laemmle,Rupert Julian,Lon Chaney(uncredited),Lon Chaney

Title: Take This Waltz
Summary: A happily married woman falls for the artist who lives across the street.

Title: Violet Evergarden: The Movie
Summary: After the aftermath of a war, a young girl who was used as a 'tool' for war learned to live. With the scars of burns, she goes back to her past to feel the true feelings of the Major's, "I love you."

Title: Running with the Devil
Summary: The CEO of an international conglomerate sends two of his most regarded executives to investigate why shipments of cocaine are being hijacked and over cut somewhere on the supply chain.

Title: Black Clover: Sword of the Wizard King
Summary: In a world where magic is everything, Asta, a boy who was born with no magic, aims to become the "Wizard King" to overcome adversity, prove his power, and keep his oath with his friends.

Title: Fearless
Summary: A man's personality is dramatically changed after surviving a major airline crash.

Title: I Know Who Killed Me
Summary: A young woman who was missing reappears, but she claims to be someone else entirely.

Title: Hondo
Summary: Army dispatch rider Hondo Lane discovers a woman and young son living in the midst of warring Apaches and becomes their protector.

Title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
Summary: Greg Heffley is an ambitious kid with an active imagination and big plans to be rich and famous. The problem is that he has to survive middle school first.

Title: The Featherweight
Summary: Set in 1964, a camera crew follows Willie Pep, retired featherweight boxing champion. Down and out in Hartford CT, married to a woman half his age and with a drug-addled son and mounting debts, Pep decides to make a return to the ring.

Title: Black Sunday
Summary: Black Sunday is the powerful story of a Black September terrorist group attempting to blow up a Goodyear blimp hovering over the Super Bowl stadium with 80,000 people and the president of the United States in attendance.

Title: Queen & Slim
Summary: A couple's first date takes an unexpected turn when a police officer pulls them over.

Title: Queen of Bones
Summary: A folktale about twin siblings who suspect their father is hiding secrets to their deceased mother's connection with the supernatural.

Title: The Missouri Breaks
Summary: Tom Logan is a horse thief. Rancher David Braxton has horses, and a daughter, worth stealing. But Braxton has just hired Lee Clayton, an infamous "regulator", to hunt down the horse thieves; one at a time.

Title: They Came Together
Summary: Molly owns a quaint little sweet shop. Joel works for a gigantic candy company threatening to shut her down. How they meet, fall in love, break up and get back together is hilariously recounted in this rom-com spoof.

Title: Hounds of Love
Summary: Vicki Maloney is randomly abducted from a suburban street by a disturbed couple. As she observes the dynamic between her captors she quickly realises she must drive a wedge between them if she is to survive.

Title: Tiger, Blood in the Mouth
Summary: Ramón Alvia is a professional boxer who, although he has won several international championships, is old and is at the end of his career. He resists. In the gym, Ramon discovers among the young boxers Deborah, a beautiful girl.

Title: Next of Kin
Summary: Truman, a Chicago cop, sets out to find the killer of his brother. Meanwhile, another of his brothers, Briar (a hillbilly) decides to find the killer himself.

Title: Getaway
Summary: To save his kidnapped wife, Brent Magna must drive at the orders of a mysterious man.

Title: In God's Hands
Summary: Three pro surfers - gifted Shane, once-great Mickey and rising young star Keoni travel to Madagascar, Bali and Hawaii in search for the ultimate wave.

Title: 16 Blocks
Summary: An aging alcoholic cop is assigned the task of escorting a witness from police custody to a courthouse 16 blocks away. There are, however, chaotic forces at work that prevent them from making it in one piece.

Title: Wunderschön
Summary: Five women of different ages are confronted with their self-image and the demands of themselves and others.

Title: Christmas Angel
Summary: A mega star, with the world at her feet, is unraveling at the core. When her car breaks down and a stranger offers to help her, a whole new chapter in her life starts.

Title: The Underdoggs
Summary: Plot under wraps.

Title: Blade of the Immortal
Summary: Cursed with a life of immortality, a samurai is tasked by a young girl to help avenge the death of her father. Based on the manga series by Hiroaki Samura.

Title: Regression
Summary: A detective and a psychoanalyst uncover evidence of a satanic cult while investigating a young woman's terrifying past.

Title: Holiday Rush
Summary: After his sudden firing, a popular radio DJ moves in with his aunt, bringing along his four spoiled children, and a plan to return to the airwaves.

Title: Trial by Fire
Summary: The tragic and controversial story of Cameron Todd Willingham, who was sentenced to death in Texas for killing his three children even after scientific evidence and expert testimony bolstered his claims of innocence.

Title: Rheingold
Summary: Capturing the life of German hip-hop rapper, entrepreneur, and ex-convict Giwar Hajabi.

Title: Nine Queens
Summary: Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps (the "nine queens").

Title: The Villain
Summary: Facing hanging, a bank robber makes a deal with the corrupt banker to avoid execution in exchange for a dirty assignment.

Title: Butter
Summary: In Iowa, a girl in foster care discovers her talent for butter carving and finds herself pitted against an ambitious local woman in their town's annual contest.

Title: La Cérémonie
Summary: A newly hired maid for a rich countryside family befriends a post-office clerk who encourages her to rebel against her employers.

Title: Starcrash
Summary: An outlaw smuggler and her alien companion are recruited by the Emperor of the Galaxy to rescue his son and destroy a secret weapon by the evil Count Zarth Arn.

Title: Hick
Summary: A Nebraska teen gets more than she bargained for when she sets out for the bright lights of Las Vegas.

Title: Initial D
Summary: After winning his first competition, Takumi focuses his attention on drift racing, a sport he has unknowingly perfected while delivering tofu in his father's Toyota AE86.

Title: Any Which Way You Can
Summary: A trucker turned prize fighter, his brother and their pet orangutan have a series of misadventures involving the mob, corrupt cops, motorcycle gangs and pretty dames.

Title: The Way of the Gun
Summary: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother carrying a baby for a powerful, shady man.

Title: A Brighter Summer Day
Summary: Based on a true story, primarily on a conflict between two youth gangs, a 14-year-old boy's girlfriend conflicts with the head of one gang for an unclear reason, until finally the conflict comes to a violent climax.

Title: Nick of Time
Summary: An unimpressive, everyday man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.

Title: Praise This
Summary: A young woman with dreams of being a superstar joins an underdog Atlanta praise-team choir in the lead up to the national competition

Title: Alice
Summary: A slave in the antebellum South escapes her secluded plantation only to discover a shocking reality that lies beyond the tree line.

Title: Luna
Summary: While touring in Italy, a recently-widowed American opera singer has an incestuous relationship with her 15-year-old son to help him overcome his heroin addiction.

Title: 7 Days in Entebbe
Summary: Inspired by the true events of the 1976 hijacking of an Air France flight en route from Tel Aviv to Paris, and the most daring rescue mission ever attempted.

Title: The Price We Pay
Summary: After a pawn shop robbery goes askew, two criminals take refuge at a remote farmhouse to try to let the heat die down, but find something much more menacing.

Title: Attachment
Summary: Maja, a Danish has-been actress, falls in love with Leah, a Jewish academic from London. Leah suffers a mysterious seizure, and Maja returns with her to London. There, she meets Leah's mother, Chana, a woman who could hold dark secrets.

Title: The Replacement Killers
Summary: A troubled hitman seeks aid from a forger to help him get papers to China. However, the drug lord has hired replacements to finish the job, and kill the hitman.

Title: Russkaya Lolita
Summary: The events of the controversial novel "Lolita" by Vladimir Nabokov pick up in modern day Russia.

Title: The Public Enemy
Summary: An Irish-American street punk tries to make it big in the world of organized crime.

Title: Roll Bounce
Summary: In the summer of 1978, a teenager and his group of friends face new challenges when their neighborhood roller-skating rink closes, forcing them to visit a different rink.

Title: Tamasha
Summary: A boy meets a girl, in Corsica. They decide not to reveal their real name or personality.

Title: The Great Raid
Summary: Taking place towards the end of WWII, 500 American Soldiers have been entrapped in a camp for 3 years. Beginning to give up hope they will ever be rescued, a group of Rangers goes on a dangerous mission to try and save them.

Title: Royalteen
Summary: Follows prince Karl Johan and newcomer Lena, who have feelings for each other but are aware that their relationship might put them in an impossible situation, while he has to carry a nation on his shoulders, she carries lies on hers.

Title: Grind
Summary: Four skaters follow their idol on his summer tour in an attempt to get noticed, get sponsored, and become stars themselves.

Title: Babe: Pig in the City
Summary: Babe, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest, returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, but after Farmer Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe has to go to the big city to save the farm.

Title: Ride Along 2
Summary: As his wedding day approaches, Ben heads to Miami with his soon-to-be brother-in-law James to bring down a drug dealer who's supplying the dealers of Atlanta with product.

Title: Ayla: The Daughter of War
Summary: Sergeant Süleyman finds a little girl on a battlefield during the Korean War. He takes her and names her Ayla. Fifteen months later, Süleyman's brigade is told they will be returning to Turkey, and he is reluctant to leave her behind.
